## Anakin Skywalker Darth Vader

## Biographical information

### Homeworld

[Tatooine](/wiki/Tatooine "Tatooine")[[1]](#cite_note-swe-Anakin-1)

### Born

[41 BBY](/wiki/41_BBY "41 BBY"),[[2]](#cite_note-Timelines-2) Tatooine[[3]](#cite_note-TSWB-3) (disputed)[[4]](#cite_note-backstories-4)

### Died

[4 ABY](/wiki/4_ABY "4 ABY"),[[2]](#cite_note-Timelines-2) [DS-2 Death Star II Mobile Battle Station](/wiki/DS-2_Death_Star_II_Mobile_Battle_Station "DS-2 Death Star II Mobile Battle Station"), [Endor system](/wiki/Endor_system "Endor system")[[5]](#cite_note-Episode_VI-5)

## Descriptive information

### Species

[Human](/wiki/Human "Human")[[1]](#cite_note-swe-Anakin-1)

### Gender

[Male](/wiki/Gender "Gender")[[1]](#cite_note-swe-Anakin-1)

### Pronouns

He/him[[1]](#cite_note-swe-Anakin-1)

### Height

1.35 [meters](/wiki/Meter "Meter") (4 [ft](/wiki/Foot "Foot"), 5 in)[[6]](#cite_note-Journeys_TPM-6) - 1.88 meters (6 ft, 2 in),[[1]](#cite_note-swe-Anakin-1) later 2.03 meters (6 ft, 8 in) in [armor](/wiki/Darth_Vader%27s_armor "Darth Vader's armor")[[7]](#cite_note-Join_the_Battle-7)

### Mass

120 [kilograms](/wiki/Kilogram "Kilogram") in armor[[8]](#cite_note-AEYNTK-8)

### Hair color

[Blond](/wiki/Color "Color"),[[9]](#cite_note-DeathTime-9) light,[[10]](#cite_note-Vergence-10) and dark[[11]](#cite_note-Disturbance-11)

### Eye color

Blue,[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12) later yellow and red ([dark side](/wiki/Dark_side_of_the_Force "Dark side of the Force"))[[13]](#cite_note-Episode_III-13)

### Skin color

Light,[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12) later pale[[5]](#cite_note-Episode_VI-5)

### Cybernetics

[Cybernetic](/wiki/Cybernetics "Cybernetics") right arm;[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14) later [prosthetic arms](/wiki/Mechno-arm "Mechno-arm") and legs, and a [life-support](/wiki/Life_support "Life support") system[[13]](#cite_note-Episode_III-13)

:   "*Do you believe you are the Chosen One?*"  
    "*How can I know?*"  
    "*I can tell you what I believe. I believe you will bring balance to the Force. That you will face your demons and save the universe.*"
:   ―[Qui-Gon Jinn](/wiki/Qui-Gon_Jinn "Qui-Gon Jinn") and Anakin Skywalker — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a0/QuiGonAnakinMortis.flac/revision/latest?cb=20251007211816)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:QuiGonAnakinMortis.flac "File:QuiGonAnakinMortis.flac"))[[31]](#cite_note-Ghosts_of_Mortis-31)

**Anakin Skywalker** was a legendary [Force-sensitive](/wiki/Force-sensitive "Force-sensitive") [human](/wiki/Human "Human") [male](/wiki/Gender "Gender") who was a [Jedi Knight](/wiki/Jedi_Knight "Jedi Knight") of the [Galactic Republic](/wiki/Galactic_Republic "Galactic Republic") and the prophesied [Chosen One](/wiki/Chosen_One "Chosen One") of the [Jedi Order](/wiki/Jedi_Order "Jedi Order"), destined to bring balance to [the Force](/wiki/The_Force "The Force"). Also known as "**Ani**" during his childhood, Skywalker earned the moniker "[Hero With No Fear](/wiki/Hero_With_No_Fear "Hero With No Fear")" from his accomplishments in the [Clone Wars](/wiki/Clone_Wars "Clone Wars"). His alter ego, **Darth Vader**, the [Dark Lord of the Sith](/wiki/Dark_Lord_of_the_Sith "Dark Lord of the Sith"), was created when Skywalker turned to the [dark side of the Force](/wiki/Dark_side_of_the_Force "Dark side of the Force"), pledging his allegiance to the [Sith Lord](/wiki/Sith_Lord "Sith Lord") [Darth Sidious](/wiki/Darth_Sidious "Darth Sidious") at the end of the [Republic Era](/wiki/Republic_Era "Republic Era").

A [vergence](/wiki/Vergence "Vergence") in the Force, Anakin Skywalker was [born](/wiki/Reproduction "Reproduction") on the [desert](/wiki/Desert "Desert") [planet](/wiki/Planet "Planet") of [Tatooine](/wiki/Tatooine "Tatooine") in the [Outer Rim Territories](/wiki/Outer_Rim_Territories "Outer Rim Territories") in [41 BBY](/wiki/41_BBY "41 BBY"). He was the son of [Shmi Skywalker](/wiki/Shmi_Skywalker_Lars "Shmi Skywalker Lars"), a [slave](/wiki/Slavery "Slavery") who conceived a [child](/wiki/Youngling "Youngling") without a [father](/wiki/Parent "Parent"). His [blood](/wiki/Blood "Blood") contained over twenty-thousand [midi-chlorians](/wiki/Midi-chlorian "Midi-chlorian"), surpassing [Grand Master](/wiki/Grand_Master "Grand Master") [Yoda](/wiki/Yoda "Yoda") and all other [Jedi](/wiki/Jedi "Jedi") in [the galaxy](/wiki/The_galaxy "The galaxy"). [Qui-Gon Jinn](/wiki/Qui-Gon_Jinn "Qui-Gon Jinn"), the [Jedi Master](/wiki/Jedi_Master "Jedi Master") who discovered Skywalker during the [Invasion of Naboo](/wiki/Invasion_of_Naboo "Invasion of Naboo") in [32 BBY](/wiki/32_BBY "32 BBY"), theorized that Skywalker was conceived by the midi-chlorians. Following the [Battle of Naboo](/wiki/Battle_of_Naboo "Battle of Naboo"), the [Jedi High Council](/wiki/Jedi_High_Council "Jedi High Council") admitted Anakin Skywalker into the Order as the [Padawan](/wiki/Padawan "Padawan") of Jedi Knight [Obi-Wan Kenobi](/wiki/Obi-Wan_Kenobi "Obi-Wan Kenobi") despite feeling that he was too old and emotional to adhere to the [Jedi Code](/wiki/Jedi_Code "Jedi Code"). Skywalker remained a Padawan through the beginning of the Clone Wars, instigated by events set in motion by [Count](/wiki/Count "Count") [Dooku](/wiki/Dooku "Dooku"). Although Jedi [doctrine](/wiki/Religion "Religion") prohibited romantic relationships, Anakin Skywalker had a secret [wife](/wiki/Marriage "Marriage"), [Senator](/wiki/Senator "Senator") [Padmé Amidala](/wiki/Padm%C3%A9_Amidala "Padmé Amidala") of [Naboo](/wiki/Naboo "Naboo"). During the early [days](/wiki/Standard_day "Standard day") of the Clone Wars, Skywalker served as a [Jedi General](/wiki/Jedi_General "Jedi General") in the [Grand Army of the Republic](/wiki/Grand_Army_of_the_Republic "Grand Army of the Republic"), commanding the [clone troopers](/wiki/Clone_trooper "Clone trooper") of the elite [501st Legion](/wiki/501st_Legion "501st Legion") against the [Confederacy of Independent Systems](/wiki/Confederacy_of_Independent_Systems "Confederacy of Independent Systems"). After receiving his knighthood, Skywalker oversaw the [Jedi training](/wiki/Jedi_training "Jedi training") of his own apprentice, [Ahsoka Tano](/wiki/Ahsoka_Tano "Ahsoka Tano"). By [19 BBY](/wiki/19_BBY "19 BBY"), when Tano walked away from the Jedi Order, Skywalker began to struggle with feelings of failure towards his apprentice and the Order itself.

Following the [death](/wiki/Death "Death") of Count Dooku during the [Battle of Coruscant](/wiki/Battle_of_Coruscant "Battle of Coruscant"), Anakin Skywalker's faith in the Jedi was further shaken when he was put on the Jedi Council without the rank of master. He also learned that [Supreme Chancellor](/wiki/Supreme_Chancellor "Supreme Chancellor") Sheev Palpatine was [Darth](/wiki/Darth "Darth") Sidious, the elusive Dark [Lord](/wiki/Lord "Lord") of the [Sith](/wiki/Sith "Sith") who orchestrated the war in order to take over the [galaxy](/wiki/Galaxy "Galaxy"). Manipulated into believing that the Jedi had failed him and coupled with his fear of losing Amidala in childbirth, Skywalker betrayed and turned against the Jedi Order, believing Sidious had the knowledge to [cheat](/wiki/Immortality "Immortality") death. Consumed by the persona of Darth Vader, the fallen Jedi Knight marched his [legion](/wiki/Legion "Legion") on the [Jedi Temple](/wiki/Imperial_Palace "Imperial Palace") of [Coruscant](/wiki/Coruscant "Coruscant") where they executed its inhabitants, including [Jedi younglings](/wiki/Jedi_Initiate "Jedi Initiate"), as part of [Order 66](/wiki/Order_66 "Order 66") and the [Great Jedi Purge](/wiki/Great_Jedi_Purge "Great Jedi Purge"). Vader was then sent to [Mustafar](/wiki/Mustafar "Mustafar") to [exterminate](/wiki/Mission_to_Mustafar "Mission to Mustafar") the [Separatist Council](/wiki/Executive_Separatist_Council "Executive Separatist Council") at the behest of his [Sith Master](/wiki/Sith_Master "Sith Master"), who became the [self-proclaimed](/wiki/Proclamation_of_the_New_Order "Proclamation of the New Order") [Galactic Emperor](/wiki/Galactic_Emperor "Galactic Emperor"). Vader subsequently sustained severe injuries in his [duel](/wiki/Duel_on_Mustafar "Duel on Mustafar") with Kenobi, and was [rebuilt](/wiki/Cybernetics "Cybernetics") as an [armored](/wiki/Darth_Vader%27s_armor "Darth Vader's armor") [cyborg](/wiki/Cyborg "Cyborg") while his wife died of a broken [heart](/wiki/Heart "Heart"), though not before giving birth to the [twins](/wiki/Twin "Twin") [Luke Skywalker](/wiki/Luke_Skywalker "Luke Skywalker") and [Princess](/wiki/Princess "Princess") [Leia Organa](/wiki/Leia_Skywalker_Organa_Solo "Leia Skywalker Organa Solo") who were hidden from their father and the [Emperor](/wiki/Emperor "Emperor") as the [Galactic Empire](/wiki/Galactic_Empire "Galactic Empire") rose to power.

Being the [Emperor's Fist](/wiki/Emperor%27s_Fist "Emperor's Fist") and later being elevated to the position of [supreme commander of the Imperial fleet](/wiki/Supreme_commander_of_the_Imperial_fleet "Supreme commander of the Imperial fleet"), Vader enforced the rule of the [New Order](/wiki/New_Order "New Order") as the Emperor's [Sith apprentice](/wiki/Sith_apprentice "Sith apprentice") throughout most of the [Imperial Era](/wiki/Imperial_Era "Imperial Era") and was thus seen as *de facto* [Commander-in-Chief](/wiki/Commander-in-Chief "Commander-in-Chief") of the entire [Imperial Military](/wiki/Imperial_Military "Imperial Military"). In the aftermath of killing Kenobi in a [duel aboard the Death Star](/wiki/Rescue_of_Princess_Leia "Rescue of Princess Leia") and the subsequent [Battle of Yavin](/wiki/Battle_of_Yavin "Battle of Yavin"), he discovered the existence of his son and was determined to turn Luke to the dark side. Luke sought to become a Jedi, like his father before him, and believed that Vader had the potential to turn back to the [light side of the Force](/wiki/Light_side_of_the_Force "Light side of the Force"). Vader was defeated by Luke during the [Battle of Endor](/wiki/Battle_of_Endor "Battle of Endor") in [4 ABY](/wiki/4_ABY "4 ABY"), but the young Jedi refused to strike down his father in anger, causing the Emperor to [torture](/wiki/Torture "Torture") Luke with [Force lightning](/wiki/Force_lightning "Force lightning"). The pain inflicted on his son awakened the part of Vader that was still Anakin, resulting in a redeemed Skywalker killing Sidious at the cost of his own life. Having destroyed the Sith and fulfilled his [destiny](/wiki/Destiny "Destiny") as the Chosen One, Skywalker made peace with his son and became [one with the Force](/wiki/Force_spirit "Force spirit").

Anakin Skywalker was one of the most powerful Jedi and Sith in [galactic history](/wiki/Timeline_of_galactic_history "Timeline of galactic history"). The Force was especially strong in the [Skywalker bloodline](/wiki/Skywalker_family "Skywalker family"), which culminated in Anakin's grandson, [Ben Solo](/wiki/Ben_Solo "Ben Solo"), Organa's son who was born by the [end](/wiki/Galactic_Concordance "Galactic Concordance") of the [Galactic Civil War](/wiki/Galactic_Civil_War "Galactic Civil War") in [5 ABY](/wiki/5_ABY "5 ABY"). Solo would turn to the dark side as well, becoming the [dark warrior](/wiki/Knights_of_Ren "Knights of Ren") Kylo Ren during the [rise](/wiki/New_Republic_Era "New Republic Era") of the [First Order](/wiki/First_Order "First Order"). Like his grandfather, however, Solo found redemption by sacrificing his life for the love of another—the Jedi apprentice [Rey](/wiki/Rey_Skywalker "Rey Skywalker"), who heard Skywalker's voice telling her to restore the balance, as he once had, during the [Battle of Exegol](/wiki/Battle_of_Exegol "Battle of Exegol") in [35 ABY](/wiki/35_ABY "35 ABY"). Solo's death ended the Skywalker bloodline, although Rey, the [granddaughter](/wiki/Palpatine_family "Palpatine family") of Sidious, rejected her true heritage and took their surname to honor their legacy.

## Biography

### Early life

#### Childhood on Tatooine

:   "*Had he been born in the Republic, we would have identified him early. The Force is unusually strong with him, that much is clear. Who was his father?*"  
    "*There was no father. I carried him, I gave birth, I raised him, I can't explain what happened.*"
:   ―Qui-Gon Jinn and Shmi Skywalker — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/32/ThereWasNoFather.flac/revision/latest?cb=20251104032832)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:ThereWasNoFather.flac "File:ThereWasNoFather.flac"))[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

 [![Shmi Skywalker and her baby, Anakin Skywalker](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/77/Baby_Ani.png/revision/latest?cb=20210617223502) [![Shmi Skywalker and her baby, Anakin Skywalker](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/77/Baby_Ani.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/210?cb=20210617223502)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/77/Baby_Ani.png/revision/latest?cb=20210617223502) 

Shmi Skywalker and her baby, Anakin Skywalker

 

Believed to have been conceived by the [midi-chlorians](/wiki/Midi-chlorian "Midi-chlorian"),[[32]](#cite_note-DB-bio-32) Anakin Skywalker was [born](/wiki/Reproduction "Reproduction") to the [slave](/wiki/Slavery "Slavery") [Shmi Skywalker](/wiki/Shmi_Skywalker_Lars "Shmi Skywalker Lars").[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12) Although Skywalker was listed as being born on the [desert](/wiki/Desert "Desert") [planet](/wiki/Planet "Planet") of [Tatooine](/wiki/Tatooine "Tatooine")[[3]](#cite_note-TSWB-3) in some sources, confusion existed as to where Skywalker was actually born; whereas some records reported his birthplace as Tatooine, others claimed he moved to the planet with his mother at a very young age.[[4]](#cite_note-backstories-4) Regardless, Tatooine was Skywalker's homeworld.[[1]](#cite_note-swe-Anakin-1) While living on Tatooine, Skywalker and his [mother](/wiki/Parent "Parent") were originally owned by [Gardulla](/wiki/Gardulla_Besadii_the_Elder "Gardulla Besadii the Elder") the [Hutt](/wiki/Hutt "Hutt") until she lost them to the [Toydarian](/wiki/Toydarian "Toydarian") [Watto](/wiki/Watto "Watto") in a [podracing](/wiki/Podracing "Podracing") bet when Skywalker was around age 3. Affectionately nicknamed "Ani," he worked in [his master's shop](/wiki/Watto%27s_junkshop "Watto's junkshop"), located in [Mos Espa](/wiki/Mos_Espa "Mos Espa").[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

Even at a young age, Skywalker exhibited exceptional [piloting](/wiki/Pilot "Pilot") skills, and built the [protocol droid](/wiki/Protocol_droid "Protocol droid") [C-3PO](/wiki/C-3PO "C-3PO"), specially modified to withstand Tatooine's sand and heat[[33]](#cite_note-BtPotDS!-33) for his mother.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12) Once, while he was working in Watto's scrapyard, he found a broken [servomotor](/wiki/Servomotor "Servomotor") which he thought he could repair and use on the droid that he was building and asked his master for it. With a glance, Watto saw that it was worthless and grunted that he could, but as Skywalker walked away, Watto told him nothing was free and had him work harder the next day.[[33]](#cite_note-BtPotDS!-33) On one occasion, Skywalker and his mother were lost in a sandstorm, but the boy refused to listen to her when she demanded he return home if he could see it. Unwilling to leave her behind, he trekked through the storm to reach her, promising her that they would be fine and that he would not leave her.[[34]](#cite_note-DV_2020_26-34)

 [![Skywalker used salvaged parts to rebuild a protocol droid for household duties and to help his mother.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/85/AnakinGetsThreepioPhotoreceptors-Ashcan.png/revision/latest?cb=20210920073730) [![Skywalker used salvaged parts to rebuild a protocol droid for household duties and to help his mother.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/85/AnakinGetsThreepioPhotoreceptors-Ashcan.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20210920073730)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/85/AnakinGetsThreepioPhotoreceptors-Ashcan.png/revision/latest?cb=20210920073730) 

Skywalker used salvaged parts to rebuild a protocol droid for household duties and to help his mother.

 

Skywalker got the [photoreceptors](/wiki/Photoreceptor "Photoreceptor") for the droid at a [market](/wiki/Mos_Espa_Market "Mos Espa Market") in Mos Espa. Though a [Gran](/wiki/Gran "Gran") wanted them too and chased him through the market, Skywalker escaped by destroying an [Ithorian](/wiki/Ithorian "Ithorian")'s stall and blocking the Gran's pursuit.[[35]](#cite_note-Ashcan-35) Before he had even turned nine, Skywalker's work had ensured 3PO was operational.[[36]](#cite_note-Anakin_Encyclopedia-36) He was close friends with fellow slaves [Kitster Banai](/wiki/Kitster_Banai "Kitster Banai") and [Wald](/wiki/Wald "Wald"), as well as the elderly [Jira](/wiki/Jira "Jira"). He also built [his own podracer](/wiki/Anakin_Skywalker%27s_Podracer "Anakin Skywalker's Podracer"), which would eventually help him win a podracing contest.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

Over the course of his life on Tatooine, Skywalker never saw it rain.[[37]](#cite_note-There_is_Always_Another-37) At some point, Watto told Anakin to go and throw away some scrap. When looking at it, Anakin found an ultra power cell, just what he needed for his pod. Suddenly, a swoop gang with a [Devaronian](/wiki/Devaronian "Devaronian") member attacked the streets and shot the generator for the medical center. When Anakin examined it to see if he could repair the generator he saw that it needed a power cell. So, he took his power cell and saved the medical center. A week later, Anakin participated in a pod race with [Sebulba](/wiki/Sebulba "Sebulba") who made him lose by cheating. Anakin stated that if he would have used the power cell on his own pod, he would have won but it was more important for the medical center to receive it.[[38]](#cite_note-SWA_6-38)

On hard nights, Anakin's mother would tell him the story of the [sun-dragon](/wiki/Sun-dragon "Sun-dragon"). Generations of Tatooine dwellers told of the sun-dragon myth with their own personal significance, but only Shmi's held the most feeling. The sun-dragon was a creature that lived inside the core of a [star](/wiki/Star "Star"). It could survive and withstand anything because it had the biggest [heart](/wiki/Heart "Heart") in the galaxy. It guarded everything it loved and treasured, through fire and flame. Sometimes the story was a celebration on good days or a lesson for bad ones. Anakin normally heard it on days where Watto was exceptionally cruel. Her intent was always clear, however. To Shmi, Anakin *was* the sun-dragon. He had the strongest heart in the galaxy and it would always guide him to do what he needed, so long as he trust in it. It was a story Anakin kept extremely close to his heart and shared with very few other people.[[18]](#cite_note-Brotherhood-18)

#### Helping a Tusken slave

 [![Skywalker dreamed of becoming a Jedi from a very young age.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/08/JediAnakinDream-TPM25th.png/revision/latest?cb=20240520154701) [![Skywalker dreamed of becoming a Jedi from a very young age.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/08/JediAnakinDream-TPM25th.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20240520154701)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/0/08/JediAnakinDream-TPM25th.png/revision/latest?cb=20240520154701) 

Skywalker dreamed of becoming a Jedi from a very young age.

 

One day, Anakin dreamed he was a Jedi, saving his mother from slavery. He was awoken from his dream by his mother, who told him that there were no Jedi in the Outer Rim. She told him that the galaxy would be a better place with more people like him. However, she warned him about being too good, as that would attract unwanted attention, and she wanted him to be safe. Then an [Otoga-222 maintenance droid](/wiki/Otoga-222_maintenance_droid "Otoga-222 maintenance droid") came in and warned them both of the work Watto wanted them to do while he was gone. The Toydarian needed young Skywalker to go to [Mos Eisley](/wiki/Mos_Eisley "Mos Eisley") [spaceport](/wiki/Spaceport "Spaceport") to pick up a shipment. The droid reminded them of the [transmitter chip](/wiki/Transmitter_chip "Transmitter chip") inside their bodies that would blow up if they tried to run.[[39]](#cite_note-TPM_25th-39)

Skywalker went to the spaceport, but could only pay the person delivering the shipment on credit. Just then a [landspeeder](/wiki/Landspeeder "Landspeeder") with a trio of [slavers](/wiki/Enslaver "Enslaver") arrived with their new [Tusken slave](/wiki/Unidentified_Tusken_Raider_(Anakin_Skywalker) "Unidentified Tusken Raider (Anakin Skywalker)"). Skywalker overheard one of the slavers mention that he hadn't put a transmitter chip in the slave yet, so he messed with the wiring of the speeder causing the speeder to fly away on its own. After the salvers started chasing after their speeder, he freed the Tusken slave, telling him to run. When the [Nikto](/wiki/Kajain%27sa%27Nikto "Kajain'sa'Nikto") slaver asked Skywalker where the slave went, he pointed them in the wrong direction. Skywalker walked home that day, happy that he was able to save someone. He told his mother that he stayed out of trouble, and went to bed.[[39]](#cite_note-TPM_25th-39)

### Discovery

#### Found by the Jedi

:   "*There's something about this boy.*"
:   ―Qui-Gon Jinn — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/72/SomethingAboutThisBoy.flac/revision/latest?cb=20251104033255)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:SomethingAboutThisBoy.flac "File:SomethingAboutThisBoy.flac"))[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

 [![Skywalker introduced himself to Padmé Amidala, who was surprised to learn that the boy was enslaved.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/1/16/Anakin_Meets_Padme.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140716004211) [![Skywalker introduced himself to Padmé Amidala, who was surprised to learn that the boy was enslaved.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/1/16/Anakin_Meets_Padme.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20140716004211)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/1/16/Anakin_Meets_Padme.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140716004211) 

Skywalker introduced himself to Padmé Amidala, who was surprised to learn that the boy was enslaved.

 

One day, at the age of 9, Watto shouted for him to come inside the junk shop, to find a tall man, a young woman, a [Gungan](/wiki/Gungan "Gungan"), and an [astromech droid](/wiki/Astromech_droid "Astromech droid"), conversing with Watto.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12) Skywalker had first seen the young woman, [Padmé Naberrie](/wiki/Padm%C3%A9_Amidala "Padmé Amidala"), when he looked up from his work, mistaking her for an [angel](/wiki/Diathim "Diathim"),[[40]](#cite_note-Peril-40) a species he had overheard spacers talk about, from the moons of [Iego](/wiki/Iego "Iego"). Unknown to Skywalker, Naberrie was in fact Padmé Amidala, the [Monarch of Naboo](/wiki/Monarch_of_Naboo "Monarch of Naboo"), who had switched places with one of her [Royal Handmaidens](/wiki/Naboo_Royal_Handmaidens "Naboo Royal Handmaidens"), to visit Tatooine.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

At Watto's instructions, Skywalker manned the shop while Watto took the man, [Qui-Gon Jinn](/wiki/Qui-Gon_Jinn "Qui-Gon Jinn"), into the junkyard. Skywalker was fascinated by the beauty of Padmé, so much that he asked her if she was an angel. Shortly after Watto and Jinn returned to the shop, Jinn informed his companions that they were leaving.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

Fortunately for Skywalker, Watto allowed him to leave after he cleaned up the mess that [Jar Jar Binks](/wiki/Jar_Jar_Binks "Jar Jar Binks") had made. As he headed home, Skywalker came across Binks, who was being attacked by Sebulba after the clumsy Gungan had disrupted the racer's meal. Breaking up the fight, Skywalker greeted Naberrie and the rest of her group when they arrived to see what was happening, and he convinced the group to follow him to Jira's fruit stand nearby. As he gave one of the pallies to Jinn, the boy was astonished to see a [lightsaber](/wiki/Qui-Gon_Jinn%27s_lightsaber "Qui-Gon Jinn's lightsaber") on the man's waist when his poncho opened. When Jira warned the group that a sandstorm was coming, Skywalker insisted that the unprepared group come with him to his home.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

When they reached his house, he introduced the group to his mother and explained about the sandstorm before pulling Naberrie into his room to show her his project. Naberrie was genuinely impressed by Skywalker's work on C-3PO, prompting him to turn the droid on, and he also told her about the podracer he was constructing. The group stayed at the Skywalkers' as the sandstorm continued to rage, and during a meal, he began to explain life as a slave, though a brief argument between Naberrie and Shmi about slavery led Anakin to the subject of podracing. Mustering his courage, Skywalker asked Jinn about his lightsaber, and he refused to believe the Jedi's statement that he was not there to free the slaves. As the conversation turned to the group's damaged [Naboo Royal Starship](/wiki/Naboo_Royal_Starship "Naboo Royal Starship"), Skywalker volunteered to race in the [Boonta Eve Classic](/wiki/Boonta_Eve_Classic "Boonta Eve Classic") podrace so that Jinn could get the prize money. When his mother objected, Anakin reminded Shmi of her belief that people needed to help one another, convincing her to allow Anakin to race for Jinn.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

The next morning, Jinn and the others accompanied Skywalker to Watto's shop, and the boy began to tell Watto about Jinn's proposal when Naberrie stopped Jinn outside for a brief conversation. When Watto asked how Jinn intended to sponsor the boy, Jinn proposed that that his ship would cover the entry fee. Watto initially suggested they split the winnings fifty-fifty, when Jinn proposed that Watto front the cash for the entry, and keep all of the winnings minus the cost of a new hyperdrive. Watto accepted the deal, and Skywalker was dismissed immediately with instructions to check out Jinn's podracer. As Skywalker worked, his friends, Banai and Wald among them, arrived, but Wald and the others were skeptical of Skywalker's chances and left to go play elsewhere, except for Banai. Despite Skywalker's warnings, Binks became caught between the podracer's energy binders, causing his face to go numb. Anakin used a power pack that Jinn had lifted from Watto's shop to start the podracer, and the group was heartened to witness the engines activating and running perfectly.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

That afternoon, Skywalker sustained a cut on his arm, though he did not notice it until later that night when Jinn tended to it and took a sample of his blood. Before Skywalker could get Jinn to tell him what he was doing with his blood, his mother called him inside their house for bedtime. He then sent this blood sample to Kenobi, who found that the young boy had even more midi-chlorians than esteemed Jedi Grandmaster Yoda.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

##### Racing to freedom

:   "*Remember, concentrate on the moment. Feel, don't think. Use your instincts."  
    "I will."  
    "May the Force be with you.*"
:   ―Qui-Gon Jinn advises Anakin before the beginning of the podrace — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/f0/FeelDontThink.flac/revision/latest?cb=20251104033556)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:FeelDontThink.flac "File:FeelDontThink.flac"))[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

With two eopies, Naberrie, Banai, Shmi, Anakin, R2-D2, and C-3PO hauled the podracer to the arena hangars, where Jinn had gone to meet with Watto. The Toydarian angrily left the hangar just as they arrived, confusing Skywalker with a comment about Jinn and betting, but Banai unintentionally revealed to Naberrie and the others that Skywalker had never actually finished a race, causing Naberrie to lose hope in the boy's chances.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

A little while later, the racers and their pods entered the arena and lined up for the race, and Shmi stopped her son to ask him to be safe before he headed out to his racer. Not even Sebulba's threats rattled Skywalker as Jinn helped him into the podracer [cockpit](/wiki/Cockpit "Cockpit"). But to Skywalker's dismay, when the starting light turned green, the pod's engines stalled immediately thanks to Sebulba's sabotage, leaving him stuck at the starting line with only [Ben Quadinaros](/wiki/Ben_Quadinaros "Ben Quadinaros") and his stalled racer as the rest of the competitors flew off. Realizing that he had left out one step to start the pod, he rapidly flipped switches and adjusted settings to reset the engines and succeeded in starting the engines, flying out of the arena and chasing after the others.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

 [![Skywalker entered the Boonta Eve Classic to help his new friends, unaware that he was also competing for his freedom.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/4f/Defensive_Racing_WotF.png/revision/latest?cb=20190428010800) [![Skywalker entered the Boonta Eve Classic to help his new friends, unaware that he was also competing for his freedom.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/4f/Defensive_Racing_WotF.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190428010800)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/4f/Defensive_Racing_WotF.png/revision/latest?cb=20190428010800) 

Skywalker entered the Boonta Eve Classic to help his new friends, unaware that he was also competing for his freedom.

 

He soon caught up to the other racers, passing two before they even noticed him, and he prepared to pass the [Troiken](/wiki/Troiken "Troiken") [Gasgano](/wiki/Gasgano "Gasgano") as they approached Arch Canyon. Gasgano blocked his first few attempts, but Skywalker overtook him as they dropped over a short mesa and proceeded to slip into [Arch Canyon](/wiki/Arch_Canyon "Arch Canyon") quickly and without any trouble. [Teemto Pagalies](/wiki/Teemto_Pagalies "Teemto Pagalies") tried to push him into the rock, but Skywalker was able to pass him with a twist. Sebulba tossed a piece of debris behind him and into [Mars Guo](/wiki/Mars_Guo "Mars Guo")'s left engine intake, clogging the motors inside. The engine intake stopped working before the entire engine combusted. With Guo crashing into the desert sands, Skywalker was free to move ahead, going neck and neck with Sebulba as they passed the grid line into the third lap.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

Going into the third lap, Sebulba still held the lead, as narrow as it was. With Skywalker close behind, and now out of surprise tricks, Sebulba resorted to sheer brutality in order to either keep Skywalker behind him or batter the boy enough to destroy his pod. Approaching the [Laguna Caves](/wiki/Laguna_Caves "Laguna Caves"), a part of the course where [Tyerell](/wiki/Ratts_Tyerell "Ratts Tyerell") had crashed earlier, Sebulba rammed Skywalker off course, forcing him onto a steep service ramp. Boosting, Skywalker sped up the ramp at an exhilarating speed, propelling himself into the sky. The boy was quick to act and adjusted his pod accordingly, leveling his podracer's nosedive as he headed back for the ground. Not only did he save himself from an explosive wreck, but his jump off of the ramp put him directly in front of a surprised Sebulba. Skywalker continued to hold the lead until they ran into a series of archways. Suddenly, Skywalker's left engine bucked and began to give off a stream of dense smoke. Sebulba's earlier sabotage was beginning to take effect as Skywalker pushed his pod to its limit. Skywalker managed to resolve his engine difficulties and quickly regained his ground, passing up several other podracers before gaining a tail on Gasgano. Although Skywalker had had issues with passing the [Xexto](/wiki/Xexto "Xexto") earlier in the race, this time he swerved past Gasgano with little effort and eventually flew parallel with Sebulba as they headed for the final stretch of the course.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

As they approached the arena, Sebulba blocked every attempt of Skywalker's to pass, and he finally swerved his larger racer into Skywalker's in anger at the boy's repeated attempts—only for the two racers' steering rods to be caught together. When Skywalker's rod finally snapped completely, his podracer began to shudder violently but broke free of Sebulba's racer, the engines of which shot forward and went flying out of control, slamming into rock and sand and exploding. As Sebulba's pod skidded to a halt, Skywalker shot toward the arena and across the finish line, winning the Boonta Eve Classic.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

As Skywalker came to a halt, the crowd swarmed his racer. Jinn hoisted Skywalker onto his shoulders in celebration. In the hangar, Skywalker met up with his family and friends who gave him hugs and congratulations for winning the race.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12) Jinn then beckoned Skywalker over. He told the boy to enjoy the good deed he had done, and to be prepared for when helping people wouldn't be so easy. Skywalker figured out that Jinn was talking about him becoming a Jedi. Jinn told him that path ahead would be difficult, and would require discipline and sacrifice. Skywalker wasn't dissuaded by this, saying that he wanted to help people no matter what. He then went to celebrate with Kitster and Wald.[[39]](#cite_note-TPM_25th-39)

##### Farewell to home

:   "*Be brave. And don't look back.*"
:   ―Shmi Skywalker's parting words to her son — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d0/ShmiBeBrave.flac/revision/latest?cb=20251104033926)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:ShmiBeBrave.flac "File:ShmiBeBrave.flac"))[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

 [![Shmi Skywalker and her emancipated son said goodbye to each other, the latter leaving Tatooine to join the Jedi Order.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/5d/Anakinandmom.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20080407231343) [![Shmi Skywalker and her emancipated son said goodbye to each other, the latter leaving Tatooine to join the Jedi Order.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/5d/Anakinandmom.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/266?cb=20080407231343)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/5d/Anakinandmom.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20080407231343) 

Shmi Skywalker and her emancipated son said goodbye to each other, the latter leaving Tatooine to join the Jedi Order.

 

Returning home with Jinn, Skywalker ecstatically showed his mother the credits he got from selling his podracer. His happiness only increased when Jinn told him that he had been freed and Jinn wanted him to travel with him and become a Jedi. Anakin was so excited that it was several minutes before he realized that Shmi had not been freed as well, and he was dismayed when Shmi insisted that Anakin go with Jinn to a better future without her. Packing his stuff, Skywalker bid goodbye to C-3PO, but when it came time to leave, Anakin's resolve broke and he ran back to his mother. He promised that he would return and free her. Despite their sorrow at parting, Shmi convinced her son to go with the Jedi.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

As they raced towards the starship that Naberrie and Jinn had come to Tatooine on, Skywalker was suddenly ordered to drop to the ground and complied just as a dark-[robed](/wiki/Robe "Robe") figure, [Sith Lord](/wiki/Sith_Lord "Sith Lord") [Darth](/wiki/Darth "Darth") [Maul](/wiki/Maul "Maul"), shot overhead on a speeder. The man leaped at Jinn, drawing a red-bladed lightsaber and attacking the Jedi as Jinn urged Skywalker to get aboard the ship and to take off. He rushed aboard, and Naberrie took him to the cockpit to tell Jinn's apprentice, [Obi-Wan Kenobi](/wiki/Obi-Wan_Kenobi "Obi-Wan Kenobi"), what had happened. The pilot [Ric Olié](/wiki/Ric_Oli%C3%A9 "Ric Olié") followed Kenobi's instructions to fly towards the fight, and Skywalker scrambled into a seat as Kenobi raced to the landing ramp and helped Jinn escape from the dark warrior. Skywalker and Kenobi rushed to help Jinn as the ship took off and left Tatooine. When they were convinced Qui-Gon was fine, the Jedi master introduced Obi-Wan to Anakin, who was happy to meet another Jedi.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

##### Before the Jedi Council

:   "*He* is *the Chosen One. You* must *see it!*"
:   ―Qui-Gon Jinn pleads to the Council to train Anakin — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/4c/QuiGonChosenOne.flac/revision/latest?cb=20251104034144)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:QuiGonChosenOne.flac "File:QuiGonChosenOne.flac"))[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

 [![Qui-Gon Jinn believed Skywalker was the Chosen One, though the Jedi High Council deemed him too old and emotionally compromised.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/91/Young_Anakin_before_the_Council.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20151002173801) [![Qui-Gon Jinn believed Skywalker was the Chosen One, though the Jedi High Council deemed him too old and emotionally compromised.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/91/Young_Anakin_before_the_Council.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/299?cb=20151002173801)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/91/Young_Anakin_before_the_Council.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20151002173801) 

Qui-Gon Jinn believed Skywalker was the Chosen One, though the Jedi High Council deemed him too old and emotionally compromised.

 

Later that night, aboard the ship, which Skywalker learned was the personal starship of the Queen of the planet Naboo, Skywalker struggled to fall asleep in the central chamber, as the ship's temperature was radically different to the constant heat of Tatooine that he was used to. As he huddled in silence, Skywalker witnessed Naberrie enter the room and watch a recording of a plea for help from the [Naboo](/wiki/Naboo "Naboo") official [Sio Bibble](/wiki/Sio_Bibble "Sio Bibble"). She then noticed him and gave him her blanket, and the two discussed the Trade Federation's invasion of Naboo and Naberrie's hopes that the Republic's Galactic Senate could resolve the crisis. Skywalker gave her a [japor ivory wood pendant](/wiki/Japor_snippet "Japor snippet") that he had carved for her so that she would remember him, and Naberrie comforted him as he became sad as he remembered his mother.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

Amidala accepted Skywalker's gift and came to wear the japor snippet as a necklace, which she wore for years to come. She came to view it as a way to represent remembrance and luck.[[16]](#cite_note-Queen's_Shadow-16) When they finally arrived at the Republic capital of Coruscant, Skywalker watched from the cockpit in awe as they approached the city-planet, and the ship was greeted when it landed by Supreme Chancellor Finis Valorum, Senator Palpatine of Naboo, and a contingent of Senate Guards. The Queen and her handmaidens—including Naberrie—departed with Palpatine, though they brought Skywalker and Binks along with them to Palpatine's office and left them outside while they discussed the situation. Before he went to the [Jedi Temple](/wiki/Imperial_Palace "Imperial Palace"), Skywalker went to the Queen's chambers in search of Naberrie, but the Queen promised to pass on his message when the handmaiden was absent. Unbeknownst to Skywalker, however, the Queen was in fact Padmé.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

Harboring strong premonitions he had received on Tatooine, Qui-Gon Jinn believed Anakin Skywalker to be the [Chosen One](/wiki/Chosen_One "Chosen One") of prophecy who, it was foretold, would bring "balance to [the Force](/wiki/The_Force "The Force")"; Jinn revealed his belief and Anakin's corroborative midi-chlorian test results to members of the [Jedi High Council](/wiki/Jedi_High_Council "Jedi High Council") before bringing the boy before them for their consideration of the boy's aptitude for life as a Jedi.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12) At the Jedi Temple, Skywalker took a moment to look out across the city and down at his hand before Jinn told him it was time to meet the Council.[[34]](#cite_note-DV_2020_26-34) With Skywalker before the twelve Jedi Masters on the Council, Mace Windu tested Skywalker's abilities by asking him to determine what images were appearing on a [testing screen](/wiki/Jedi_testing_screen "Jedi testing screen") that the Jedi was holding but that the boy could not see. Skywalker named them all with perfect accuracy. However, when Windu and Master Yoda questioned him about his feelings and his mother, Skywalker asked how that was relevant. Yoda explained that fear was the starting point on the path to the dark side. The ancient Jedi Master said he sensed a lot of fear in Skywalker.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

As night fell, Skywalker, Kenobi, and Jinn were called before the Council. The Jedi Masters acknowledged Skywalker's great power but refused to train him on account of his age—causing Jinn to declare that he would take the boy on as his own apprentice. The Council would initially refuse this, as Jinn already had his own apprentice, who was Kenobi but Jinn stated that he believed that Kenobi was already ready to become a Jedi Knight. However, Windu declared that the matter would be dealt with later, as the Naboo problem was more pressing.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12) After, Skywalker talked with Binks about the Council's decision. He told Binks that he might never be a Jedi. Binks told him that all Gungans miss their family and worry for them. Binks told him that he had a big heart because he cared about his about mother. The Council permitted Skywalker to accompany Jinn, and the three returned to the Queen's starship. Skywalker told R2 that they are going to Naboo on a secret mission, but as he said this he overheard Kenobi calling him dangerous.[[39]](#cite_note-TPM_25th-39) Skywalker told Jinn that he didn't want to be a problem, to which Jinn reassured him about his presence on the mission. He then questioned Jinn about midi-chlorians, and Jinn explained to him the nature of them and their connection to the Force. The Queen and her retinue departed not long afterward, leaving Coruscant and heading back to the occupied Naboo in hopes of freeing the world from the Trade Federation.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

##### First Battle of Naboo

:   "*Now* this *is podracing!*"
:   ―Anakin, escaping the droid control ship — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/b0/NowThisIsPodracing.flac/revision/latest?cb=20251104034501)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:NowThisIsPodracing.flac "File:NowThisIsPodracing.flac"))[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

On the way to Naboo, Skywalker asked Jinn if he was dangerous as Kenobi had said. Jinn told him that his emotions were normal, but that as Jedi they needed to be held at higher standard. He told Skywalker that he needed training, which Jinn would ensure that he got.[[39]](#cite_note-TPM_25th-39) As they came out of [hyperspace](/wiki/Hyperspace "Hyperspace") and approached the [Naboo system](/wiki/Naboo_system "Naboo system"), Skywalker sat in the cockpit with Olié and learned about the ship's controls while Queen Amidala held a meeting with the Jedi and her staff and announced her intentions to ally with the Gungans in order to drive the Trade Federation off Naboo. The group landed in the swamps of Naboo and sent Binks to the Gungan capital city of [Otoh Gunga](/wiki/Otoh_Gunga "Otoh Gunga"). When Binks finally returned, he explained that Otoh Gunga was empty, but he took the group to the [Gungan Sacred Place](/wiki/Gungan_Sacred_Place "Gungan Sacred Place"), where the Gungans had no doubt fled after the Trade Federation invaded.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

 [![Skywalker participated in the Battle of Naboo, piloting the starfighter that destroyed the Trade Federation's droid control ship.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/55/Anakin_Naboo_Battle.png/revision/latest?cb=20201017162147) [![Skywalker participated in the Battle of Naboo, piloting the starfighter that destroyed the Trade Federation's droid control ship.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/55/Anakin_Naboo_Battle.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/281?cb=20201017162147)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/55/Anakin_Naboo_Battle.png/revision/latest?cb=20201017162147) 

Skywalker participated in the Battle of Naboo, piloting the starfighter that destroyed the Trade Federation's droid control ship.

 

When the group was brought before [Boss](/wiki/Boss "Boss") [Rugor Nass](/wiki/Rugor_Nass "Rugor Nass"), the leader of the Gungans, Skywalker was astonished to learn that Naberrie was, in fact, Padmé Amidala, the Queen of Naboo and that she had been posing as her double's handmaiden as a safety precaution. Skywalker, the Jedi, and Amidala's handmaidens joined the Queen in dropping to their knees before Boss Nass in a plea for Gungan aid, and Nass agreed to lend his army to the Queen's cause. In the hours that followed the meeting, Amidala and the Jedi began strategizing with the Gungan generals, leaving Skywalker to wander over to the Gungan sentries who were keeping watch for the returning [Captain](/wiki/Captain "Captain") Panaka.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

As everyone prepared for the coming battle, Skywalker spotted and approached the handmaiden who had been acting as the Queen. Asking for her name, Skywalker told the girl, [Sabé](/wiki/Sab%C3%A9 "Sabé"), that he was happy to meet her and thanked her for keeping Naberrie safe. He was then called away by Jinn, but Sabé was left touched nevertheless.[[40]](#cite_note-Peril-40)

Anakin was a member of the group which, led by Amidala, grabbed the chance to recapture the [Theed Royal Palace](/wiki/Theed_Royal_Palace "Theed Royal Palace"). When the group entered the [Theed hangar](/wiki/Theed_Hangar "Theed Hangar") bay, Skywalker heeded Jinn's command for him to stay hidden in the cockpit of one of the hangar's [N-1 starfighters](/wiki/N-1_starfighter "N-1 starfighter"). When several [droidekas](/wiki/Droideka "Droideka") cornered the Naboo personnel in a firefight, Skywalker attempted to aid them with the N1's blaster cannons, although he accidentally activated the ship to go into space in the process. Skywalker fought in the [Battle of Naboo](/wiki/Battle_of_Naboo "Battle of Naboo") in a vicious [starfighter](/wiki/Starfighter "Starfighter") battle above the planet,[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12) coming to realize how much he loved flying over the course of the battle.[[40]](#cite_note-Peril-40) After accidentally joining the battle in orbit, Skywalker single-handedly destroyed the orbiting [Droid Control Ship](/wiki/Lucrehulk-class_battleship "Lucrehulk-class battleship") from within the ship, thus rendering the Trade Federation's ground forces inactive and saving the [Gungan Grand Army](/wiki/Gungan_Grand_Army "Gungan Grand Army") from destruction.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12) After the battle Skywalker landed his starfighter in the Theed hangar and talked with a distraught Kenobi. Trying to reassure him, Kenobi told him that he just saved everyone, but Skywalker already knew that Jinn was dead. Thinking about what Kenobi said earlier about him, he started to walk away teary-eyed. Kenobi grabbed him and Skywalker admitted that Jinn was the only one who had faith in him. Kenobi told him that it was Jinn's last wish to train him, and that he was adamant about following through with that promise.[[39]](#cite_note-TPM_25th-39) Skywalker was present during the following arrest of [Rune Haako](/wiki/Rune_Haako "Rune Haako") and [Nute Gunray](/wiki/Nute_Gunray "Nute Gunray"). Kenobi and Skywalker were then greeted by Chancellor Palpatine, who said that everyone would be watching his career with great interest. They then greeted [Ki-Adi-Mundi](/wiki/Ki-Adi-Mundi "Ki-Adi-Mundi"),[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12) but Skywalker's mind was clouded by the things Ki-Adi-Mundi had said to him before. As Skywalker watched Palpatine congratulate the Queen, his thoughts continued to be clouded with visions of his mother and of the dream he had of saving her. Kenobi grabbed Skywalker's shoulder, startling him. He told the boy that his mind was clouded, but that he, as well as Jinn, believed in him.[[39]](#cite_note-TPM_25th-39)

### Joining the Jedi Order

:   "*What will happen to me now?*"  
    "*The council has given me permission to train you. You will be a Jedi, I promise.*"
:   ―Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/28/AnakinWhatWillHappen.flac/revision/latest?cb=20251104034849)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:AnakinWhatWillHappen.flac "File:AnakinWhatWillHappen.flac"))[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

 [![Accepted into the ranks of the Jedi Order, Padawan Skywalker attended the victory celebration on Naboo.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9a/Naboo_celebration.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20111008202536) [![Accepted into the ranks of the Jedi Order, Padawan Skywalker attended the victory celebration on Naboo.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9a/Naboo_celebration.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/276?cb=20111008202536)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9a/Naboo_celebration.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20111008202536) 

Accepted into the ranks of the Jedi Order, Padawan Skywalker attended the victory celebration on Naboo.

 

During the Master's funeral, Kenobi told him that the Council granted permission for him to train Skywalker to become a Jedi.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12) The two did not leave the site of the funeral until the last embers of the fire had gone out. The only others to remain as long as them were Amidala and her court.[[40]](#cite_note-Peril-40) Later, Skywalker and his fellow Jedi attended a parade, held by the [Naboo](/wiki/Naboo_(people) "Naboo (people)") and the Gungans, in [Theed](/wiki/Theed "Theed") to celebrate their victory and mark their newfound friendship.[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12) Afterward, Skywalker and the other Jedi left Naboo,[[40]](#cite_note-Peril-40) marking the last time Skywalker would see Amidala for a decade.[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14)

### Kenobi's Padawan

:   "*Confer on you the level of Jedi Knight, the Council does. But agree with your taking this boy as your Padawan learner, I do not.*"  
    "*Qui-Gon believed in him.*"  
    "*The Chosen One, the boy may be. Nevertheless, grave danger, I fear, in his training.*"  
    "*Master Yoda, I gave Qui-Gon my word. I will train Anakin... without the approval of the Council, if I must.*"  
    "*Qui-Gon's defiance, I sense in you. Need that, you do not. Agree with you, the Council does. Your apprentice, Skywalker will be.*"
:   ―Yoda and Obi-Wan Kenobi — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/33/YodaObiWanApprentice.flac/revision/latest?cb=20251104035340)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:YodaObiWanApprentice.flac "File:YodaObiWanApprentice.flac"))[[12]](#cite_note-Episode_I-12)

#### The Chosen One trains

:   "*His education is... complicated. He came to us later than we would ordinarily have liked. Obi-Wan took on an extremely difficult task when he accepted Anakin as his Padawan.*"
:   ―Mace Windu to Sheev Palpatine, on Skywalker's training[[41]](#cite_note-OW&A_1-41)

As he grew, Skywalker's exceptional skills made him cocky,[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14) but he nevertheless idolized Kenobi,[[42]](#cite_note-OW&A_3-42)[[13]](#cite_note-Episode_III-13) thinking there was "no one better" than his master.[[43]](#cite_note-OW&A_2-43) Having given up his life with his mother and lost Jinn, Skywalker clinged to his master, not wanting to lose him; throughout his first year as a Padawan, he had a habit of sleeping on the floor next to Kenobi's bed, wanting to ensure his mentor would not vanish in the night. Kenobi sometimes awoke at night and saw this.[[37]](#cite_note-There_is_Always_Another-37) During one of their many adventures, he also rescued Kenobi after he fell into a nest of [gundarks](/wiki/Gundark "Gundark").[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14)

Shortly after becoming Kenobi's Padawan, a surge in overwhelming emotions shut Skywalker off from the Force entirely. This was able to give Skywalker temporary relief from his worries and fears for a time, but he soon realized that avoiding the Force was not the answer, and he reconnected to the Force.[[18]](#cite_note-Brotherhood-18) During his time as Kenobi's apprentice, Skywalker was distrustful of teachers who corrected him, wondering if they were trying to help him or simply put him in his place, knowing that many had not wanted him trained in the first place.[[4]](#cite_note-backstories-4) Even so, there were many Jedi who had faith in him, seeing his potential.[[44]](#cite_note-Jedi_vs_Sith-44)

Skywalker and Kenobi were at one point joined by Jedi Master [Shaak Ti](/wiki/Shaak_Ti "Shaak Ti") for a complicated mission to [Naran-Shiv](/wiki/Naran-Shiv "Naran-Shiv").[[18]](#cite_note-Brotherhood-18) In addition to struggling to control his emotions,[[44]](#cite_note-Jedi_vs_Sith-44) he found it hard to make friends, as his fellow [Padawans](/wiki/Padawan "Padawan") were all aware of the rumors of him being the Chosen One. Often lonely, he generally spent his free time in his quarters tinkering with machinery he found in trips outside the Jedi Temple. He also harbored a lingering resentment regarding the fate of his mother.[[4]](#cite_note-backstories-4)

#### Mission to Dallenor

:   "*With the little kids. I'm already so far ahead of them.*"
:   ―Anakin Skywalker[[45]](#cite_note-Age_of_Republic_-_Obi-Wan_Kenobi_1-45)

 [![Skywalker was apprenticed to Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi, who was himself apprenticed to the late Qui-Gon Jinn.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/bb/AnakinAndKenobiMeditating-AORObiWan1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190414010609) [![Skywalker was apprenticed to Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi, who was himself apprenticed to the late Qui-Gon Jinn.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/bb/AnakinAndKenobiMeditating-AORObiWan1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/220?cb=20190414010609)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/bb/AnakinAndKenobiMeditating-AORObiWan1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190414010609) 

Skywalker was apprenticed to Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi, who was himself apprenticed to the late Qui-Gon Jinn.

 

Sometime after his enrollment into the Order, Skywalker was meditating with his master while also holding together many pebbles using the Force. However, when Master [Tosan](/wiki/Tosan "Tosan") informed his master that he had a mission from the Council, Anakin's concentration broke due to the surprise of him leaving again. The [mission](/wiki/Mission_to_Dallenor "Mission to Dallenor") was to go to the planet [Dallenor](/wiki/Dallenor "Dallenor") so that he could collect an ancient [Jedi holocron](/wiki/Jedi_holocron "Jedi holocron") from a [dig site](/wiki/Dallenor_Excavation "Dallenor Excavation"). Obi-Wan told Anakin that he would be back shortly and that he would be training with Yoda in the meantime. Skywalker, displeased, complained that he would have to be in the class with "little kids" and that he was far ahead of them in his training. However, he complied and spent his time with the [younglings](/wiki/Youngling "Youngling"), although he did not enjoy himself. However, after some encouragement from Yoda, Kenobi took Skywalker along with him on the mission in a [T-6 shuttle](/wiki/T-6_shuttle "T-6 shuttle").[[45]](#cite_note-Age_of_Republic_-_Obi-Wan_Kenobi_1-45)

Skywalker was glad that he was finally in space again and asked if he could pilot the shuttle. Kenobi told him that he could when they got closer to Dallenor. Skywalker asked what Obi-Wan's life was like before joining the Jedi Order. Kenobi told him that he did not remember as he was taken in at a very young age. Anakin, sadly, expressed that he was always a Jedi and nothing else. Kenobi tried to reassure him by telling him that he still needed to train and was a Padawan when they both met. However, Skywalker was unconvinced and stated that his life was already set out for him and that he was not anything else, unlike him who was a slave. He concluded that this must be why the Jedi Council said he was too old to be trained. Obi-Wan tried to reassure him again by saying that the Council was not perfect and that Qui-Gon Jinn chose him just like he chose Kenobi. Skywalker, angered, proclaimed that Kenobi's master was dead and that now he was stuck with him. Before Kenobi could reassure Anakin, he walked away.[[45]](#cite_note-Age_of_Republic_-_Obi-Wan_Kenobi_1-45)

 [![Skywalker and Kenobi both felt that they had been forced to become Master and apprentice as a result of Jinn's death.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/55/MissionToDallenor-AORObiWan1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190105195733) [![Skywalker and Kenobi both felt that they had been forced to become Master and apprentice as a result of Jinn's death.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/55/MissionToDallenor-AORObiWan1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/261?cb=20190105195733)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/55/MissionToDallenor-AORObiWan1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190105195733) 

Skywalker and Kenobi both felt that they had been forced to become Master and apprentice as a result of Jinn's death.

 

Upon arriving on Dallenor, Kenobi and Skywalker encountered a female [Togruta](/wiki/Togruta "Togruta") [archaeologist](/wiki/Archaeologist "Archaeologist") named [Clatriffe](/wiki/Clatriffe "Clatriffe"). She was glad that they arrived so they could take the [holocron](/wiki/Holocron "Holocron") away due to the fact that it was causing problems. She explained that the local pirates wanted to get it and she had to hire local guards to keep them at bay. Kenobi ordered Skywalker to stay outside to keep watch whilst he and Clatriffe went inside the facility to obtain the holocron. After they went inside, Skywalker noticed that the pirates had arrived.[[45]](#cite_note-Age_of_Republic_-_Obi-Wan_Kenobi_1-45)

Kenobi, Skywalker, and Clatriffe went out to meet them and were introduced to the [Krypder Riders](/wiki/Krypder_Riders "Krypder Riders") and their leader [Hudso Shaku](/wiki/Hudso_Shaku "Hudso Shaku"), who knew that the holocron was something important due to offworlders wanting to get it. Kenobi stated that they had come in peace but were willing to defend themselves. He activated his lightsaber, whereupon Shaku ordered his pirates to attack him because he found the laser sword to be more valuable than the things that they dug up. Kenobi quickly disarmed the pirates but, while Skywalker froze up due to the suddenness of the attack, Shaku captured him by placing his sword under his chin. He ordered a trade, the boy for the lightsaber, but was taken down by Skywalker using the Force to assault Shaku with small pebbles. With Shaku knocked unconscious and the pirates' weapons destroyed, they surrendered to the Jedi.[[45]](#cite_note-Age_of_Republic_-_Obi-Wan_Kenobi_1-45)

On the shuttle home, Kenobi praised Skywalker for his great work on his first mission. Skywalker, however, exclaimed that he froze up and was not ready for a mission even though he believed otherwise. Kenobi reassured Skywalker that it was he who was not ready. He asked how he could save his Padawan if he could not save his master from dying. Skywalker, with renewed confidence, stated that they would save each other and that that was what Qui-Gon would have wanted. Kenobi agreed and then recalled that Anakin wanted to fly the shuttle. Skywalker, in response, said yes enthusiastically.[[45]](#cite_note-Age_of_Republic_-_Obi-Wan_Kenobi_1-45)

#### A chancellor for a friend

:   "*I have an errand to run, of sorts, and I thought Anakin might accompany me.*"
:   ―Sheev Palpatine to Obi-Wan Kenobi[[42]](#cite_note-OW&A_3-42)

By the time he was 12 in [29 BBY](/wiki/29_BBY "29 BBY"), he had built [his first lightsaber](/wiki/Anakin_Skywalker%27s_first_lightsaber "Anakin Skywalker's first lightsaber");[[41]](#cite_note-OW&A_1-41) after its construction, Kenobi said to him, "Anakin, this weapon is your life."[[46]](#cite_note-Hostage_Crisis-46)[[47]](#cite_note-The_Big_Bang-47) Like he had helped Kenobi before, Jedi [Battlemaster](/wiki/Battlemaster "Battlemaster") [Cin Drallig](/wiki/Cin_Drallig "Cin Drallig") helped Skywalker train in [lightsaber combat](/wiki/Lightsaber_combat "Lightsaber combat"), with Skywalker learning a great deal from Drallig's unparalleled expertise.[[48]](#cite_note-Cin_Drallig_card-48) When Kenobi was assigned to study a [dead star system](/wiki/Unidentified_dead_star_system "Unidentified dead star system") that orbited a [black dwarf](/wiki/Black_dwarf "Black dwarf"), Skywalker decided to join his master without permission but fell asleep during the journey. Upon being found by Kenobi as he slept, Skywalker's mentor decided to bring him along for the mission, showing him the dead star before them as an example of why the Jedi needed to avoid attachment because all things, even the brightest of stars, would pass on.[[18]](#cite_note-Brotherhood-18)

 [![Skywalker considered Chancellor Palpatine a friend and a mentor.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/24/DarthSidiousAndFutureApprentice-ObiWanAnakin3.png/revision/latest?cb=20210623053328) [![Skywalker considered Chancellor Palpatine a friend and a mentor.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/24/DarthSidiousAndFutureApprentice-ObiWanAnakin3.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/225?cb=20210623053328)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/24/DarthSidiousAndFutureApprentice-ObiWanAnakin3.png/revision/latest?cb=20210623053328) 

Skywalker considered Chancellor Palpatine a friend and a mentor.

 

That year, which which point three [years](/wiki/Standard_year "Standard year") had passed since the Battle of Naboo, Skywalker sought to impress his peers at the Jedi Temple. During a training session, he defeated a [training droid](/wiki/Jedi_training_droid "Jedi training droid"), which he had programmed to mimic the appearance of the Sith of Naboo. All the while, [Mace Windu](/wiki/Mace_Windu "Mace Windu"), Kenobi, and [Supreme Chancellor](/wiki/Supreme_Chancellor "Supreme Chancellor") [Sheev Palpatine](/wiki/Darth_Sidious "Darth Sidious") watched—the last of whom was impressed.[[41]](#cite_note-OW&A_1-41) Sometime later, Skywalker struggled to learn the [skill of taming creatures](/wiki/Taming_beasts "Taming beasts") when Kenobi told him that the Chancellor wanted to see him. The two arrived at [his office](/wiki/Emperor%27s_office "Emperor's office"), where Palpatine requested that Skywalker accompany him on an errand, declining Kenobi's company. Left alone, Skywalker escorted Palpatine to [Club Kasakar](/wiki/Club_Kasakar "Club Kasakar") in [Level 2685](/wiki/Level_2685 "Level 2685"), all the while listening to Palpatine express concern for the situation on the sub-surface levels of Coruscant,[[43]](#cite_note-OW&A_2-43) the inability of the Jedi to respond efficiently,[[49]](#cite_note-OW&A_4-49) and the corruption that plagued the Senate, such as [Colandrus](/wiki/Colandrus "Colandrus")—subtly, and unbeknownst to Skywalker, marking the beginning of his influence over him.[[42]](#cite_note-OW&A_3-42)

At the end of the errand, Palpatine asked if Skywalker was happy as he was. Though Skywalker answered that he was and that "training to become a Jedi [was] all [he] ever wanted," it did plant a seed of doubt in his mind. Later, at the Jedi Temple, Skywalker confided in Kenobi that he wished to leave the Order, feeling uncomfortable at the prospect of his entire life being decided when he was only nine years old, and surrendered his [lightsaber](/wiki/Lightsaber "Lightsaber") to his master. Though Kenobi took the weapon, he pleaded for Skywalker to reconsider.[[49]](#cite_note-OW&A_4-49)

#### Mission to Carnelion IV

:   "*The road lies before you, Anakin Skywalker. Will you walk it alone?*"  
    "*No, Master. As a Jedi. If you'll show me the way.*"
:   ―Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker[[50]](#cite_note-OW&A_5-50)

Before Skywalker could give his definite answer, at Yoda's behest, both student and master [responded](/wiki/Mission_to_Carnelion_IV "Mission to Carnelion IV") to a mysterious distress signal from the supposedly dead world of [Carnelion IV](/wiki/Carnelion_IV "Carnelion IV") that specifically called for Jedi intercession. They began their journey to the coordinates, but their shuttle was damaged due to the planet's [atmospheric](/wiki/Atmosphere "Atmosphere") debris field, and the two had to eject from the doomed vessel, landing below the [Celadon Sea](/wiki/Celadon_Sea "Celadon Sea"). Not too long afterward, they came to be aware of life on the planet as a sky battle raged over them, and Kenobi returned his lightsaber to him so that he could defend himself. As one of the combatant airships began to fall, Skywalker and Kenobi saved its two-person crew by delaying the crash.[[41]](#cite_note-OW&A_1-41)

 [![Though tempted by the prospects of life outside of the Jedi Order, Skywalker chose to continue his training under Kenobi.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/2e/OpenClosedWar-ObiWanAnakin2.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160903030912) [![Though tempted by the prospects of life outside of the Jedi Order, Skywalker chose to continue his training under Kenobi.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/2e/OpenClosedWar-ObiWanAnakin2.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20160903030912)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/2e/OpenClosedWar-ObiWanAnakin2.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160903030912) 

Though tempted by the prospects of life outside of the Jedi Order, Skywalker chose to continue his training under Kenobi.

 

The two survivors, [Kolara](/wiki/Kolara "Kolara") and [Mother](/wiki/Mother_(title) "Mother (title)") [Pran](/wiki/Pran "Pran"), who identified themselves as "[Open](/wiki/Open "Open")," knew nothing about what a Jedi was.[[41]](#cite_note-OW&A_1-41) They were forced to take cover when a "[Closed](/wiki/Closed "Closed")" airship, which Kenobi fell; Skywalker saved its pilot, [Grecker](/wiki/Grecker "Grecker"), from falling to his death. But due to the historical feud between their factions, Grecker and Pran tried to murder each other, forcing Skywalker and Kenobi to destroy their weapons and to escort them to safety. To facilitate their journey, they used the intact parts of each of their airships to form a new one in order to fly to their destination. During the conversations that ensued, Skywalker mentioned his and Kenobi's purpose on the planet: to find the person who had sent the Jedi distress signal,[[43]](#cite_note-OW&A_2-43) which alerted Pran and Grecker to the location of "[the scavenger](/wiki/Sera "Sera")."[[42]](#cite_note-OW&A_3-42)

During the journey, Kolara told Skywalker about the mysterious kites, before noticing that he was good at fixing things, as he made an adjustment to his lightsaber. Kolara and Pran then had Skywalker repair a bag of [droid brains](/wiki/Droid_brain "Droid brain") and, seeing his usefulness, threw away his lightsaber and abducted him when a horde of [fishers](/wiki/Fisher_(Carnelion_IV) "Fisher (Carnelion IV)") attacked the ship, leaving Kenobi alone with Grecker as the airship crashed[[42]](#cite_note-OW&A_3-42) below the Celadon Sea. Skywalker was taken to one of the Open's fortresses, where he witnessed as Pran used the processors he had repaired to activate some battle droids. As they left to wage war on the mysterious [scavenger](/wiki/Scavenger "Scavenger") (who reminded both Open and Closed of everything they had lost and how badly they had failed),[[49]](#cite_note-OW&A_4-49) Skywalker remained with the younger Open, whom he convinced to protect the scavenger and help him get back to Kenobi.[[50]](#cite_note-OW&A_5-50)

Using their help, Skywalker fixed the remaining droids and intervened in the skirmish between the Open and Closed unfolding right next to [Sera's fortress](/wiki/Sera%27s_fortress_museum "Sera's fortress museum"). He saved his master from Mother Pran and met with Kolara and Sera, but rather than try to stop the fight, Kenobi had Skywalker repair a communications unit and called the Republic for aid. Soon enough, a task force arrived and forced the natives to cease hostilities. In the aftermath, his master offered Skywalker his lightsaber, asking if he was still adamant about leaving the Order, but Skywalker decided to remain a member.[[50]](#cite_note-OW&A_5-50)

#### Inquiring about lightsabers

:   "*The lightsaber symbolizes the care with which we approach our gifts through the force and the care with which we wield them. It reminds others that while we* could *do more... we* very purposely *do not.*"
:   ―Obi-Wan Kenobi[[51]](#cite_note-The_Lesson_Anakin-51)

 [![Skywalker asked his master about why the Jedi use lightsabers](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/33/AnakinAsksAboutLightsabers-TheLesson.png/revision/latest?cb=20240116123213) [![Skywalker asked his master about why the Jedi use lightsabers](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/33/AnakinAsksAboutLightsabers-TheLesson.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/220?cb=20240116123213)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/33/AnakinAsksAboutLightsabers-TheLesson.png/revision/latest?cb=20240116123213) 

Skywalker asked his master about why the Jedi use lightsabers

 

Some time after his and his master's mission to Carnelion IV,[[52]](#cite_note-Date_note_Lesson-52) Skywalker and Kenobi were about to spar in the [Jedi Temple training grounds](/wiki/Jedi_Temple_training_ground "Jedi Temple training ground") when Anakin asked his master why the Jedi use lightsabers as opposed to any other weapon powered by [kyber crystals](/wiki/Kyber_crystal "Kyber crystal"). Upon hearing this question, Kenobi used the force to take Skywalker's weapon and told him how when he was young, Kenobi had the idea for two [short lightsabers](/wiki/Shoto_lightsaber "Shoto lightsaber") to be connected by a chain. Upon revealing this tidbit to his apprentice, Kenobi told him the same thing Qui-Gon Jinn had told Kenobi; that wielding a lightsaber shows intent and that the user put thought behind wielding the weapon before drawing it, enforcing the idea that Jedi are protectors as opposed to destroyers.[[51]](#cite_note-The_Lesson_Anakin-51)

#### Rescuing Master Yoda

At some point after the mission to Carnelion IV,[[53]](#cite_note-Date_note_Yoda-53) Skywalker was being tested by Kenobi, who was having the Padawan attempt to defend from a group of [Marksman-H training remotes](/wiki/Marksman-H_training_remote "Marksman-H training remote") using a wooden stick rather than his lightsaber, in the presence of Yoda, Windu, and Master [Bant Eerin](/wiki/Bant_Eerin "Bant Eerin"). When Skywalker used the Force to grab his master's lightsaber, completing the trial using it instead, he and Kenobi began to argue with one another, which made Yoda, Windu, and Eerin walk away. As Kenobi left with a team of [Jedi Temple Guards](/wiki/Jedi_Temple_Guard "Jedi Temple Guard"), investigating a disturbance in the Force, he ordered Skywalker to remain there and clean up.[[54]](#cite_note-Obi-Wan_&_Anakin-54)

 [![Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi fight a supposed-battle droid incursion into the Jedi Temple.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/90/Fake-Temple-Attack.png/revision/latest?cb=20211222050842) [![Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi fight a supposed-battle droid incursion into the Jedi Temple.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/90/Fake-Temple-Attack.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20211222050842)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/90/Fake-Temple-Attack.png/revision/latest?cb=20211222050842) 

Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi fight a supposed-battle droid incursion into the Jedi Temple.

 

Disobeying Kenobi and riding down to the Temple storage level by using two training remotes to travel through the Temple's vents, Skywalker followed the Force to the training stores, where he was attacked by the cause of the disturbance: a team of battle droids. As the droids and Skywalker fought, the Padawan was forced to use the Force and [electroblades](/wiki/Electroblade_training_sword "Electroblade training sword") he found in a nearby box, as Kenobi had taken his lightsaber after his training maneuver. However, Kenobi and the guard team quickly arrived, giving Skywalker back his lightsaber and joining the fight, only for Skywalker to leave upon having a [Force vision](/wiki/Force_vision "Force vision") about the Council chambers. Rushing to the council chambers and past a seemingly-knocked out guard, Skywalker was held back as a masked enemy, disguised as a Temple Guard, appeared to [kidnap Yoda](/wiki/Rescue_of_Yoda "Rescue of Yoda") himself, with Skywalker failing to catch up the escaping enemy on a jetpack. After being returned to the council chamber after the jetpack failed him, Skywalker reported what he had seen, with one temple guard finding the seemingly-unconscious guard to actually be a disguised battle droid.[[54]](#cite_note-Obi-Wan_&_Anakin-54)

When Skywalker spotted a non-[Techno Union](/wiki/Techno_Union "Techno Union") logo on the droid's head, Kenobi and him traveled to the Temple archives, where they learned it was the symbol of the [Nova Crime Syndicate](/wiki/Nova_Crime_Syndicate "Nova Crime Syndicate"). Traveling to the syndicate's base-of-operations on [the Wheel](/wiki/The_Wheel "The Wheel") [space station](/wiki/Space_station "Space station"), albeit in disguise to not disrupt the uneasy truce the Jedi held with its [Baron Administrator](/wiki/Baron_Administrator "Baron Administrator") [Jaspara](/wiki/Jaspara "Jaspara"), the two Jedi located whom they believed to [Grynask Sanberge](/wiki/Grynask_Sanberge "Grynask Sanberge"), the leader of the Nova syndicate. With their mind tricks appearing to work, the supposed criminal gave them new information that pointed them to the planet [Glee Anselm](/wiki/Glee_Anselm "Glee Anselm"), where they encountered several [aquatic battle droids](/wiki/Aquatic_battle_droid "Aquatic battle droid") and found the fake Temple Guard's underwater base of operations. Upon finding Yoda trapped in the base within a thick [seaweed](/wiki/Seaweed "Seaweed") and besting the fake Temple Guard, Kenobi allowed Skywalker to unmask their foe as thanks for noticing the Nova symbol on the battle droid back at the Temple.[[54]](#cite_note-Obi-Wan_&_Anakin-54)

Upon unmasking the enemy, however, Skywalker and Kenobi were shocked to see it was Eerin. Their confusion was only increased when Sanberge appeared, only to reveal himself to be a Force-sensitive and then remove his mask, showing himself to actually be Windu in disguise. When Skywalker realized the entire adventure had been a test, Yoda easily freed himself from the seaweed and confirmed Skywalker's theory, revealing it was a test for Skywalker and Kenobi both. Having seen how well they could work together instead of arguing, Skywalker and Kenobi began to view each other as brothers. To leave the world, the two lifted their [shuttle](/wiki/Shuttle "Shuttle") off the seabed together.[[54]](#cite_note-Obi-Wan_&_Anakin-54)

#### A memorable training session

:   "*You are a great warrior, Anakin. But your need to prove yourself is your undoing. Until you overcome it, a Padawan, you will still be.*"
:   ―Obi-Wan Kenobi, to Anakin Skywalker — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/8a/ObiWanAnakinKenobiV.flac/revision/latest?cb=20251104035821)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:ObiWanAnakinKenobiV.flac "File:ObiWanAnakinKenobiV.flac"))[[55]](#cite_note-Part_V-55)

 [![Skywalker and Kenobi spar within the Jedi Temple](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/1/19/Ani_Obi_Temple_Fight.png/revision/latest?cb=20220725161454) [![Skywalker and Kenobi spar within the Jedi Temple](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/1/19/Ani_Obi_Temple_Fight.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20220725161454)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/1/19/Ani_Obi_Temple_Fight.png/revision/latest?cb=20220725161454) 

Skywalker and Kenobi spar within the Jedi Temple
