Later, Skywalker was waiting for his master in one of the Jedi Temple's training areas, where he gazed out the window until Kenobi joined him for a sparring session. After exchanging light-hearted remarks with his master, whom he had started to think would not be coming, Skywalker and Kenobi began their duel, during which Skywalker showed extreme aggression. Kenobi warned his Padawan that the fighting style was antithetical to the Jedi mission to protect life, but Skywalker, certain his aggression would win him the duel, rebutted by claiming mercy was no way to defeat an enemy. He continued his aggressive strikes until Kenobi was backed into a corner, where he locked sabers with his master and demanded he admit defeat. Instead, Kenobi slipped away when Skywalker raised his blade and inadvertently created an opening. The duel carried on as Skywalker again continued to beat Kenobi back until he knocked his master's lightsaber away, which Skywalker took as a sign that the duel was over.[[55]](#cite_note-Part_V-55)

However, Kenobi noticed his Padawan was blinded by a need for victory, telling him as such before continuing the duel without a lightsaber. Kenobi managed to get behind Skywalker and use the Force to claim his lightsaber as his own, using it as proof that Skywalker's need to prove himself would always keep him back. While admitting his Padawan was a great warrior, he told his apprentice he would never advance to become a Jedi Knight if he failed to overcome his need to show his worth. Skywalker was given back his lightsaber by Kenobi, who smiled at his apprentice after his warning. Skywalker then followed Kenobi out of the room. Both men remembered the training session for years to come.[[55]](#cite_note-Part_V-55) At some other point, Skywalker and Kenobi were also involved in a [mission to Taris](/wiki/Mission_to_Taris "Mission to Taris"), during which Skywalker worked on a [RazBohan high-encryption comlink](/wiki/RazBohan_high-encryption_comlink "RazBohan high-encryption comlink").[[18]](#cite_note-Brotherhood-18)

### Protecting Padmé Amidala

#### Reuniting

:   "*Ani? My goodness, you've grown.*"
:   ―Padmé Amidala and Anakin Skywalker — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/65/YouveGrown.flac/revision/latest?cb=20251104040117)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:YouveGrown.flac "File:YouveGrown.flac"))[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14)

 [![Skywalker was tasked with protecting Senator Amidala, whom he had not seen in a decade, an experience he described as intoxicating.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/1/19/Anakin_Padme_Reunite.png/revision/latest?cb=20140716004451) [![Skywalker was tasked with protecting Senator Amidala, whom he had not seen in a decade, an experience he described as intoxicating.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/1/19/Anakin_Padme_Reunite.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/294?cb=20140716004451)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/1/19/Anakin_Padme_Reunite.png/revision/latest?cb=20140716004451) 

Skywalker was tasked with protecting Senator Amidala, whom he had not seen in a decade, an experience he described as intoxicating.

 

Ten years after the Battle of Naboo in [22 BBY](/wiki/22_BBY "22 BBY"),[[2]](#cite_note-Timelines-2) as the [Separatist Crisis](/wiki/Separatist_Crisis "Separatist Crisis") threatened to tear the [Galactic Republic](/wiki/Galactic_Republic "Galactic Republic") apart,[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14) the 19 year old[[56]](#cite_note-Fascinating_facts-56) Skywalker[[36]](#cite_note-Anakin_Encyclopedia-36) and Kenobi[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14) were involved in an important mission[[36]](#cite_note-Anakin_Encyclopedia-36) to settle a [border dispute on Ansion](/wiki/Border_dispute_on_Ansion "Border dispute on Ansion"). Upon their return to Coruscant, an [assassination](/wiki/Assassin "Assassin") [attempt](/wiki/Plot_to_assassinate_Senator_Amidala "Plot to assassinate Senator Amidala") on Padmé Amidala, now Senator of Naboo, prompted the Jedi Council—at the behest of Chancellor Palpatine—to send Skywalker and Kenobi to protect Amidala from future attacks. Anakin was delighted to see her after so many years; he had thought about her every day since they parted.[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14) In at least her first year in the Senate, Amidala had at times thought about the boy she had met on Tatooine, such as when she passed the Jedi Temple. She also dispatched Sabé to free slaves on Tatooine with the particular mission to free Shmi, feeling as though she had made an unofficial promise to set her free, but Sabé was unable to locate Skywalker's mother.[[16]](#cite_note-Queen's_Shadow-16) When Padmé said she wanted to know who wanted her dead, and Obi-Wan started to explain that they were only there to protect her life, not to investigate, Anakin promised Padmé to find who was responsible, annoying Obi-Wan. When Padmé retreated to her chambers, Anakin was disappointed, claiming that Padmé hardly even recognized him.[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14)

However, Jar Jar, who was a representative in the Senate during this time, said Padmé was very happy to see him too. During that night, Anakin and Padmé agreed on a plan of using her as bait, in order to capture the assassin, much to Obi-Wan's dismay. Anakin told him that although Padmé had covered the cameras in her bedchamber, he was certain he would sense if anything were to happen in the room. Kenobi had doubts about his Padawan's power. Shortly after, when his master noticed that Skywalker was tired, he admitted that he had constant nightmares about his mother; he also revealed his powerful affection for Amidala. Obi-Wan warned him to control his emotions, saying that Padmé was a politician after all, and could not be trusted. This led the two into a debate about whether every politician, including Amidala and Palpatine, was corrupt. As Skywalker expressed his faith in Palpatine's benevolence, he sensed something in Padmé's room. He arrived just in time to cut two venomous [kouhuns](/wiki/Kouhun "Kouhun") in half, just a few centimeters from the senator's face. Obi-Wan noticed the assassin's droid at the window and threw himself out, grabbing it.[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14)

 [![Skywalker and Kenobi chasing Zam Wesell](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/dd/Koro-2.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20091202160120) [![Skywalker and Kenobi chasing Zam Wesell](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/dd/Koro-2.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/231?cb=20091202160120)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/dd/Koro-2.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20091202160120) 

Skywalker and Kenobi chasing Zam Wesell

 

Anakin rushed to a row of speeders parked near Padmé's apartment. When the bounty hunter [Zam Wesell](/wiki/Zam_Wesell "Zam Wesell") shot her droid down, Skywalker arrived upon the scene as his Master was in free fall. Catching Kenobi, the Padawan continued the pursuit of Wesell's [airspeeder](/wiki/Koro-2_all-environment_Exodrive_airspeeder "Koro-2 all-environment Exodrive airspeeder"). Spotting the Jedi, Wesell took her speeder on a nosedive—plunging several meters toward the lower levels of Coruscant. With the Jedi relentlessly pursuing her, Wesell flew through the exhaust flames of the [Kerdos Company recycling plant](/wiki/Kerdos_Company_recycling_plant "Kerdos Company recycling plant"), hoping that the flames would scorch her adversaries in the open-top speeder. Seeing the pair still chasing her and unharmed by the flames, Wesell fired at the couplings of a nearby electrical plant, causing the Jedi's speeder to be inundated by electrical shock.[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14)

Skywalker, an expert pilot himself, quickly caught up to Wesell. The bounty hunter steered her craft into a network of skytunnels, aiming once again to lose the pursuing Jedi. Skywalker did not chase directly into the tunnel but opted to travel an alternate route. Wesell wove through the local network of tunnels. Anakin and Obi-Wan thought they lost her, but just a few minutes later Anakin noticed the bounty hunter's airspeeder below, and jumped out, let his body drop the intervening distance through the air, then latched a firm hand-grip to its rear canopy handle. He ultimately was forced to let go when she shot at him, although not before getting a good look at her, wherein he deduced that Zam was not only a female but also a changeling (he'd briefly glimpsed Wesell's true form when she looked up). The Jedi ignited his lightsaber and sliced at the windscreen, knocking out the guidance systems. Wesell shot the lightsaber out of Skywalker's hand, but the ensuing struggle caused Wesell to misfire her blaster pistol, damaging the control pipes. Meanwhile, Kenobi, who was behind Wesell at this point, caught Skywalker's lightsaber. The airspeeder began to plummet toward the surface, crashing near the [Outlander Club](/wiki/Outlander_Club "Outlander Club"). Wesell crawled from the crash site and fled into the club.[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14)

Anakin was about to follow Zam into the building when Obi-Wan stopped him, returning to him his lightsaber, reiterating, "this weapon is your life." As they headed to the Outlander, Kenobi said he had the feeling his apprentice would be the death of him. Anakin indignantly responded that Obi-Wan was like a father to him. Inside the Outlander Club, Anakin was instructed by his master to search the premises while he went for a drink at the bar. Wesell hid until the two Jedi separated, then slowly approached the seemingly vulnerable Jedi at the bar. To secure the accuracy of her shot, she continued approaching the Jedi with her weapon drawn while Kenobi, through the Force, sensed the bounty hunter's intentions. In an instant, Kenobi ignited his lightsaber, spun around, and severed Wesell's arm below the elbow.[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14)

Skywalker and Kenobi took the wounded bounty hunter and dragged her from the club, setting her in an alley behind the club for interrogation. Wesell was initially reluctant to give any information about who had hired her, replying that it had simply been a job. As Skywalker pressed her, however, Wesell prepared to divulge the information. Suddenly, a [mysterious figure](/wiki/Jango_Fett "Jango Fett") fired a toxic dart into Zam's neck.[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14)

#### Return to Tatooine

:   "*Ani? Is it you? Ani?*"  
    "*I'm here, Mom, you're safe.*"
:   ―Shmi Skywalker and Anakin Skywalker — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/24/AnakinShmiDeath.flac/revision/latest?cb=20251109025411)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:AnakinShmiDeath.flac "File:AnakinShmiDeath.flac"))[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14)

Subsequently, the Council sent the Master and Padawan on separate missions—Skywalker, on his first solo mission, would protect Amidala on Naboo, whereas Kenobi continued an investigation into Amidala's aggressors that took him to [Kamino](/wiki/Kamino "Kamino"). Joined by R2-D2, Skywalker and Amidala departed for Naboo aboard the *[Jendirian Valley](/wiki/Jendirian_Valley "Jendirian Valley")*, a refugee ship leaving[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14) from the [western spaceport](/wiki/Western_spaceport "Western spaceport").[[57]](#cite_note-Coruscant_Altaya-57) On Naboo, the two visited Amidala's family home, and Skywalker noticed how much she loved the flower garden maintained by her father, [Ruwee Naberrie](/wiki/Ruwee_Naberrie "Ruwee Naberrie").[[58]](#cite_note-Queen's_Hope-58)

 [![Skywalker, at the funeral of his mother, Shmi](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/35/Shmi-grave.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20070313234516) [![Skywalker, at the funeral of his mother, Shmi](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/35/Shmi-grave.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/253?cb=20070313234516)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/35/Shmi-grave.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20070313234516) 

Skywalker, at the funeral of his mother, Shmi

 

While on Naboo, as he experienced inner conflict between his strong desires for her and his duties as a Jedi, Skywalker revealed to Amidala his love for her, but she refused since Skywalker was not supposed to form attachments as a Jedi, even though she felt the same for him. Skywalker was also troubled by [dreams](/wiki/Force_vision "Force vision") of his mother suffering, which prompted him to return to Tatooine and [rescue](/wiki/Mission_to_rescue_Shmi_Skywalker_Lars "Mission to rescue Shmi Skywalker Lars") her, to which Amidala agreed to accompany him. On Tatooine, the two located Watto, who revealed that he had sold Shmi to a [moisture farmer](/wiki/Moisture_farmer "Moisture farmer") named [Cliegg Lars](/wiki/Cliegg_Lars "Cliegg Lars"). The couple then visited the [Lars farm](/wiki/Lars_homestead "Lars homestead") only to discover that Shmi had been abducted by [Tusken Raiders](/wiki/Tusken_Raider "Tusken Raider") about a month before their arrival, and was feared to be dead. Determined to save her at all costs, Skywalker took the [swoop bike](/wiki/Zephyr-G_swoop "Zephyr-G swoop") of his stepbrother, [Owen Lars](/wiki/Owen_Lars "Owen Lars"), and searched for his mother.[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14)

Though he managed to find her in a [Tusken camp](/wiki/Unidentified_Tusken_village "Unidentified Tusken village"), she had her wrists tied up to a stick, and she had a cut on the side of her face and then she died in his [arms](/wiki/Limb "Limb") moments later. Consumed with grief and rage, Skywalker slaughtered the entire village of Tusken Raiders—men, women, and children. Only then did Skywalker bring his mother's body back to the homestead, where her [funeral](/wiki/Funeral "Funeral") was held, and when he claimed he would become so powerful in the Force he could stop the people he loved from dying.[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14) The event left him full of pain and guilt, for failing her and failing as a Jedi, as well as haunted by the prospect of letting go of the people he loved.[[59]](#cite_note-Overlords-59)

#### First Battle of Geonosis

:   "*You call this a diplomatic solution?*"  
    "*No, I call it aggressive negotiations.*"
:   ―Anakin Skywalker and Padmé Amidala — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9b/AggressiveNegotiations-AOTC.flac/revision/latest?cb=20250403184712)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:AggressiveNegotiations-AOTC.flac "File:AggressiveNegotiations-AOTC.flac"))[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14)

 [![Skywalker and Padmé Amidala at the first Battle of Geonosis](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/58/Battle_couple_on_Geonosis.png/revision/latest?cb=20151119054344) [![Skywalker and Padmé Amidala at the first Battle of Geonosis](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/58/Battle_couple_on_Geonosis.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/257?cb=20151119054344)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/58/Battle_couple_on_Geonosis.png/revision/latest?cb=20151119054344) 

Skywalker and Padmé Amidala at the first Battle of Geonosis

 

It was then that Skywalker received a [message](/wiki/Hologram "Hologram") from Kenobi telling him of [Separatist](/wiki/Confederacy_of_Independent_Systems "Confederacy of Independent Systems") presence on [Geonosis](/wiki/Geonosis "Geonosis"), which they retransmitted to Coruscant so that the Jedi Council could see it for themselves. Upon learning he had been captured, Skywalker and Amidala departed for the planet, where they entered one of the [factories](/wiki/Factory "Factory") (where his lightsaber was destroyed) but were subsequently captured and placed with Kenobi into the [Petranaki Arena](/wiki/Petranaki_Arena "Petranaki Arena") to be executed by beasts. However, the trio managed to avoid the creatures (in Skywalker's case, a [reek](/wiki/Reek "Reek")), only to be surrounded by droidekas on [Count](/wiki/Count "Count") [Dooku](/wiki/Dooku "Dooku")'s orders.[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14)

 [![Count Dooku cuts off Anakin's right forearm](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/41/TisButAScratch-AotC.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20111001151243) [![Count Dooku cuts off Anakin's right forearm](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/41/TisButAScratch-AotC.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/220?cb=20111001151243)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/41/TisButAScratch-AotC.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20111001151243) 

Count Dooku cuts off Anakin's right forearm

 

However, a [Jedi assault team](/wiki/Jedi_assault_team "Jedi assault team"), led by Mace Windu, arrived to rescue them. Anakin was given a green-bladed lightsaber lent to him by another Jedi named [Nicanas Tassu](/wiki/Nicanas_Tassu "Nicanas Tassu"). Nevertheless, they fought a losing battle against an overwhelming amount of [battle droids](/wiki/Battle_droid "Battle droid"), including droidekas, [B1-series battle droids](/wiki/B1-series_battle_droid "B1-series battle droid"), and [B2-series super battle droids](/wiki/B2-series_super_battle_droid "B2-series super battle droid"), until Master Yoda arrived with the newly established [Grand Army of the Republic](/wiki/Grand_Army_of_the_Republic "Grand Army of the Republic") and safely boarded the survivors of the arena onto [LAAT/i gunships](/wiki/Low_Altitude_Assault_Transport/infantry "Low Altitude Assault Transport/infantry"). As the [battle](/wiki/First_Battle_of_Geonosis "First Battle of Geonosis") raged between the [clone troopers](/wiki/Clone_trooper "Clone trooper") and the [Separatist Droid Army](/wiki/Separatist_Droid_Army "Separatist Droid Army"), they caught sight of Dooku. When Amidala and a [clone trooper](/wiki/Unidentified_clone_trooper_2_(Geonosis) "Unidentified clone trooper 2 (Geonosis)") were knocked from the [troop](/wiki/Troop "Troop") bay by a [cannon](/wiki/Cannon "Cannon") blast, Skywalker argued with Kenobi about going after her. After he proclaimed he did not care if he would be expelled from the Jedi Order if it meant saving her, Skywalker only agreed to continue when Kenobi reminded him Amidala would continued on her duties if she had been in a similar crisis. Skywalker then looked back at where she had fallen as they continued to race after Dooku.[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14)

Kenobi and Skywalker pursued the Count to a secret hangar, where they engaged him in a [duel](/wiki/Lightsaber_duel "Lightsaber duel"). Both were defeated, and though Kenobi suffered minor wounds, Skywalker lost his right forearm. It was then that Yoda arrived and fought Dooku until the Sith Lord made his escape on [his](/wiki/Count_Dooku%27s_solar_sailer "Count Dooku's solar sailer") [solar sailer](/wiki/Punworcca_116-class_interstellar_sloop "Punworcca 116-class interstellar sloop"). The battle marked the start of the pan-galactic [Clone Wars](/wiki/Clone_Wars "Clone Wars"), and Skywalker received a [cybernetic](/wiki/Cybernetics "Cybernetics") replacement for his lost arm.[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14)

#### Marriage to Padmé Amidala

 [![Skywalker marries Padmé Amidala on Naboo.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/c1/Wedding_of_Anakin_and_Padme.png/revision/latest?cb=20221002182656) [![Skywalker marries Padmé Amidala on Naboo.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/c1/Wedding_of_Anakin_and_Padme.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/280?cb=20221002182656)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/c1/Wedding_of_Anakin_and_Padme.png/revision/latest?cb=20221002182656) 

Skywalker marries Padmé Amidala on Naboo.

 

While Kenobi returned to Coruscant, Skywalker accompanied Amidala to Naboo, where they were [secretly](/wiki/Wedding_of_Anakin_Skywalker_and_Padm%C3%A9_Amidala "Wedding of Anakin Skywalker and Padmé Amidala") [married](/wiki/Marriage "Marriage"), their sole attendants being their faithful droids R2-D2 and C-3PO.[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14) As he still needed to recover from the Battle of Geonosis, Skywalker was able to remain on Naboo[[60]](#cite_note-TBotCW-60) for several days,[[18]](#cite_note-Brotherhood-18) enjoying his honeymoon and time after it with Amidala.[[60]](#cite_note-TBotCW-60)

### The Clone Wars begin

#### Serving as a Jedi Commander

:   "*I was afraid, before I left Kamino. We don't really know what happens to unusual clones. But my brothers never let me doubt. I wasn't sure if the Jedi would understand.*"  
    "*The Jedi are all about transcending things. I don't think we can complain if you've transcended gender.*"  
    "*Transcended gender. We'll work on it, but I like where it's heading.*"
:   ―Sister and Anakin Skywalker — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/83/Sister2-QH.flac/revision/latest?cb=20250304010922)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:Sister2-QH.flac "File:Sister2-QH.flac"))[[58]](#cite_note-Queen's_Hope-58)

Following the engagement on Geonosis, Skywalker built a [new lightsaber](/wiki/Skywalker_lightsaber "Skywalker lightsaber") to replace the one he lost.[[13]](#cite_note-Episode_III-13)[[19]](#cite_note-CloneWarsFilm-19) Early in the war, Skywalker quickly came to have encounters with Dooku's personal agents.[[18]](#cite_note-Brotherhood-18) Later, Skywalker served with his Jedi Master as[[58]](#cite_note-Queen's_Hope-58) an informal[[18]](#cite_note-Brotherhood-18) [Jedi Commander](/wiki/Jedi_Commander "Jedi Commander"), participating in [battles on a rocky planet](/wiki/Battles_on_a_rocky_planet "Battles on a rocky planet") alongside Kenobi's[[58]](#cite_note-Queen's_Hope-58) [7th Sky Corps](/wiki/7th_Sky_Corps "7th Sky Corps")[[17]](#cite_note-Queen's_Hope_note-17) and [Clone Marshal Commander](/wiki/Clone_Marshal_Commander "Clone Marshal Commander") [Cody](/wiki/Cody "Cody"). Afterwards, Skywalker encountered the clone trooper known as [Sister](/wiki/Sister "Sister"), who was arranging the [helmets](/wiki/Helmet "Helmet") of her fallen brothers beneath a [tree](/wiki/Tree "Tree") as a memorial.[[58]](#cite_note-Queen's_Hope-58)

Skywalker spoke with Sister, and she explained that she was saddened by her brothers' [deaths](/wiki/Death "Death"), as well as the origins of her name and the camaraderie her clone brothers had shown for her and her gender identity. Skywalker shared that the Jedi supported such identity and the belief of rising above things, such as Sister's transcendence of the concepts of gender. Sister agreed, and both moved to rendezvous with Kenobi at his location. A short time later,[[58]](#cite_note-Queen's_Hope-58) Skywalker was promoted to the rank of Jedi Knight. This was initially done informally as a result of the increased need for Jedi in the battlefield. Though the Jedi were not yet formally integrated within the Grand Army of the Republic, his appointment to Knighthood made Skywalker an acting [Jedi General](/wiki/Jedi_General "Jedi General").[[18]](#cite_note-Brotherhood-18)

#### Business on Cato Neimoidia

:   "*You don't always have to be the sun-dragon.*"
:   ―Mill Alibeth to Anakin Skywalker — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/8c/MillAnakinSunDragon.flac/revision/latest?cb=20251109025942)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:MillAnakinSunDragon.flac "File:MillAnakinSunDragon.flac"))[[18]](#cite_note-Brotherhood-18)

Skywalker's knighthood was soon legitimized by a [Knighting Ceremony](/wiki/Anakin_Skywalker%27s_Knighting_Ceremony "Anakin Skywalker's Knighting Ceremony"). Skywalker spent the night after his Knighting ceremony with Amidala in which he presented her with a [Padawan braid pendant](/wiki/Padawan_braid_pendant "Padawan braid pendant") he had made for her after his [Padawan braid](/wiki/Padawan_braid "Padawan braid") was cut. Shortly after his knighting ceremony,[[18]](#cite_note-Brotherhood-18) the [Purse World](/wiki/Purse_world "Purse world") of [Cato Neimoidia](/wiki/Cato_Neimoidia "Cato Neimoidia"), the headquarters of the Trade Federation,[[61]](#cite_note-Battles_that_Changed_the_Galaxy-61) was rocked by a destructive explosion that was blamed on the Republic. Kenobi, now a Jedi Master and an acting Council member, was selected to travel to Cato Neimoidia to investigate the explosion. Wanting to clear any Separatist involvement, Dooku sent his own agent to Cato Neimoidia as well, which was later revealed to be the [Dark Acolyte](/wiki/Dark_Acolyte "Dark Acolyte") [Asajj Ventress](/wiki/Asajj_Ventress "Asajj Ventress").[[18]](#cite_note-Brotherhood-18)

Skywalker expressed his desire to accompany Kenobi on this [mission](/wiki/Mission_to_Cato_Neimoidia_(Kenobi_and_Skywalker) "Mission to Cato Neimoidia (Kenobi and Skywalker)") but was instead assigned to instruct a group of younglings, passing on what he had learned as a Padawan, much to his dismay. Before Kenobi left for Cato Neimoidia, Skywalker gave him a RazBohan high-encryption comlink so they could remain in contact. He later accompanied the younglings on an [aid mission to Langston](/wiki/Aid_mission_to_Langston "Aid mission to Langston") in which he was given command of the [302nd Battalion](/wiki/302nd_Battalion "302nd Battalion"), with Clone Commander [Theo](/wiki/Theo_(clone_trooper) "Theo (clone trooper)") serving as his second-in command. While enroute to [Langston](/wiki/Langston "Langston"), Skywalker became acquainted with the youngling [Mill Alibeth](/wiki/Mill_Alibeth "Mill Alibeth"), a [Zabrak](/wiki/Zabrak "Zabrak") girl who was experiencing nausea as a result of a unique connection to the Force. Empathizing with her struggles as a mirror to his own, Skywalker chose to guide and instruct Alibeth as she grew to accept the Force and her connection to it. Kenobi eventually contacted Skywalker, asking him to analyze data he found that incriminated the Republic in the bombing. When he lost contact with Kenobi, Skywalker disobeyed orders to rescue his former master with Alibeth by his side.[[18]](#cite_note-Brotherhood-18)

 [![Skywalker and Kenobi on Cato Neimoidia](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9c/Mission-to-Cato-Neimoidia-final.png/revision/latest?cb=20220421234615) [![Skywalker and Kenobi on Cato Neimoidia](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9c/Mission-to-Cato-Neimoidia-final.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/280?cb=20220421234615)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9c/Mission-to-Cato-Neimoidia-final.png/revision/latest?cb=20220421234615) 

Skywalker and Kenobi on Cato Neimoidia

 

Shortly after arriving on Cato Neimoidia, Skywalker and Alibeth found a series of bombs planted in important Neimoidian landmarks which they later discovered were planted by [Ketar Nor](/wiki/Ketar_Nor "Ketar Nor") to send a message to the Republic. They came to find that Kenobi was on trial for conspiracy against Cato Neimoidia after Ventress found the data that incriminated the Republic. Skywalker rescued Kenobi moments before rifles from Neimoidian guards fired on him. With the help of [Ruug Quarnom](/wiki/Ruug_Quarnom "Ruug Quarnom") and Amidala, the Republic was cleared of any involvement in the bombing. Instead, revealing that an outside actor orchestrated the bombing to point to the Republic and Separatists in order to play on the fear of both sides of the new war.[[18]](#cite_note-Brotherhood-18)

When they returned to Coruscant, Palpatine passed the [Jedi Military Integration Act](/wiki/Jedi_Military_Integration_Act "Jedi Military Integration Act"), officially making the Jedi a part of the Grand Army of the Republic and marking the beginnings of General Skywalker and General Kenobi. Skywalker also told Alibeth of a myth from his childhood about the [sun-dragon](/wiki/Sun-dragon "Sun-dragon") of Tatooine in order to steady her emotions. Becoming apprenticed to [Rig Nema](/wiki/Rig_Nema "Rig Nema") to avoid the war and instead provide special medical and spiritual assistance, Alibeth bid farewell to Skywalker and Kenobi, thanking the former for his guidance and letting him know he did not always have to act like the story's sun-dragon, leaving Skywalker speechless as he considered her words.[[18]](#cite_note-Brotherhood-18)

The time surrounding the Cato Neimoidia affair taught Skywalker and Kenobi to become brothers-in-arms, instead of master and apprentice.[[18]](#cite_note-Brotherhood-18) The mission was also one of several Skywalker counted as the times he saved Kenobi's life, but Kenobi, however, insisted that "the business on Cato Neimoidia" did not count towards the tally.[[13]](#cite_note-Episode_III-13) Skywalker also believed the operation was the first time he encountered Ventress, but he recognized her [*Ginivex*-class fanblade starfighter](/wiki/Ginivex-class_fanblade_starfighter "Ginivex-class fanblade starfighter") and she already knew his name. Skywalker and Kenobi also launched a [rescue of Ruug Quarnom](/wiki/Rescue_of_Ruug_Quarnom "Rescue of Ruug Quarnom") as she was hunted by battle droids.[[18]](#cite_note-Brotherhood-18)

#### Rescue at Staggec

:   "*Good to see you alive.*"  
    "*Did you have doubts?*"  
    "*Just for a moment.*"
:   ―Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi[[62]](#cite_note-Hyperspace_Stories_1-62)

 [![Skywalker cut down battle droids on Staggec](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a6/AnakinStaggecSlice-HyperspaceStories1.png/revision/latest?cb=20221112002154) [![Skywalker cut down battle droids on Staggec](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a6/AnakinStaggecSlice-HyperspaceStories1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/280?cb=20221112002154)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a6/AnakinStaggecSlice-HyperspaceStories1.png/revision/latest?cb=20221112002154) 

Skywalker cut down battle droids on Staggec

 

With the passage of the Military Integration Act, Skywalker and Kenobi, like all Jedi, were offered body armor,[[18]](#cite_note-Brotherhood-18) but neither immediately adopted that gear as part of their day-to-day attire.[[63]](#cite_note-Hyperspace_Stories_5-63) When Senators Amidala and [Yarua](/wiki/Yarua "Yarua") were ambushed by [General](/wiki/General "General") [Grievous](/wiki/Grievous "Grievous") on the [Moon of Staggec](/wiki/Moon_of_Staggec "Moon of Staggec"), Kenobi volunteered himself and Skywalker for the [mission](/wiki/Mission_to_the_moon_of_Staggec "Mission to the moon of Staggec"). Shortly after they arrived on the moon, Skywalker followed a trail of footprints into a nearby forest. There, he and Kenobi discovered Yarua's daughter, [Viiveenn](/wiki/Viiveenn "Viiveenn"), who gave Skywalker a [flower](/wiki/Flower "Flower") and led the Jedi to the ship where her father had been taken. When Viiveenn headed for the ship, Kenobi ran after her, causing him to be captured by the surrounding battle droids. Skywalker attacked the battle droids and tried to stop Kenobi and Viiveenn from being captured, but he was too late.[[62]](#cite_note-Hyperspace_Stories_1-62)

As the ship left, Skywalker lamented not leaving any droids intact for interrogation. Calming his mind, he meditated to think of a solution. Skywalker then used the Republic shuttle they'd arrived in to sneak onto the [*Providence*-class Dreadnought](/wiki/Providence-class_Dreadnought "Providence-class Dreadnought") Grievous was commanding. Alongside Kenobi, Skywalker cut down the remaining droids and ran off to find Amidala while Kenobi went to confront Grievous. By the time he reached her however, he found that the senator had already rescued herself and her associates. Skywalker then returned with the group to the Republic shuttle. Kenobi arrived shortly after with Viiveenn, informing the group that Yarua had died saving his daughter. After leaving the ship and escaping into hyperspace, Kenobi reported to Yoda while Skywalker checked on Amidala, who comforted Viiveenn over her loss.[[62]](#cite_note-Hyperspace_Stories_1-62)

#### Lesson on Naboo

 [![Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker in his Jedi Commander armor](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/83/AnakinSkywalkerJediGeneral-CGSWG.png/revision/latest?cb=20241205044800) [![Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker in his Jedi Commander armor](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/83/AnakinSkywalkerJediGeneral-CGSWG.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20241205044800)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/83/AnakinSkywalkerJediGeneral-CGSWG.png/revision/latest?cb=20241205044800) 

Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker in his Jedi Commander armor

 

While on Naboo with Kenobi, Skywalker noticed and hastily attacked Ventress, who was amongst the crowd. As she ran Kenobi told him to wait, but Skywalker ignored his master and ran after anyways. When Skywalker lost Ventress, Kenobi caught up with him and told him a lesson about patience and trusting others. Listening in, Ventress heard Kenobi tell Skywalker that he cares about him staying alive. Ventress initially saw this as a sign of weakness, but would go onto intentionally fail [her mission](/wiki/Mission_to_Naboo_(Asajj_Ventress) "Mission to Naboo (Asajj Ventress)") because she realized Dooku did not care for her like Kenobi did for Skywalker.[[63]](#cite_note-Hyperspace_Stories_5-63)

#### General of the 501st

:   "*You fought in the Clone Wars?*"  
    "*Yes. I was once a Jedi Knight, the same as your father.* […] *He was the best star pilot in the galaxy and a cunning warrior.* […] *And he was a good friend.*"
:   ―Luke Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi, on Anakin Skywalker — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/26/ObiWanRecallsAnakin.flac/revision/latest?cb=20251109030627)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:ObiWanRecallsAnakin.flac "File:ObiWanRecallsAnakin.flac"))[[21]](#cite_note-Episode_IV-21)

The [501st Legion](/wiki/501st_Legion "501st Legion") was under Skywalker's command during the war effort, with his "first-in-command" often being [Clone Captain](/wiki/Clone_Captain "Clone Captain") [CT-7567](/wiki/Rex "Rex"), who was also known by his nickname "Rex."[[64]](#cite_note-Darkness_on_Umbara-64) At some point before[[65]](#cite_note-501_Plus_One-65) he received a scar over his right eye,[[13]](#cite_note-Episode_III-13) Skywalker participated in the [Battle of Arantara](/wiki/Battle_of_Arantara "Battle of Arantara") with his troops. During the battle, Rex was wounded and rendered unconscious. After being found by Skywalker, Rex was surprised to see that he had come back for him. Skywalker responded that it should have been him in his place, telling his captain that a true leader always led from the front.[[65]](#cite_note-501_Plus_One-65)

After that, Skywalker and Rex soon developed a mutual respect and even became friends.[[2]](#cite_note-Timelines-2) While at first Rex needed to adapt to his maverick Jedi General because of the Clone Captain's by-the-book and no-nonsense nature, Rex would come to admire, and even would sometimes emulate, Skywalker's willingness to bend the rules and genius for improvisation,[[66]](#cite_note-Rex-66) and Skywalker and Rex would even become friends. Some time after the Battle of [Arantara](/wiki/Arantara "Arantara"),[[65]](#cite_note-501_Plus_One-65) Skywalker received a scar over his right eye, it was believed he got this in a battle against Asajj Ventress.[[67]](#cite_note-Star_Wars_Battle_Encyclopedia-67)

 [![Anakin Skywalker during the early Clone Wars](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9c/AnakinNoScar-501PlusOne.png/revision/latest?cb=20210302143650) [![Anakin Skywalker during the early Clone Wars](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9c/AnakinNoScar-501PlusOne.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20210302143650)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9c/AnakinNoScar-501PlusOne.png/revision/latest?cb=20210302143650) 

Anakin Skywalker during the early Clone Wars

 

The [*Venator*-class Star Destroyer](/wiki/Venator-class_Star_Destroyer "Venator-class Star Destroyer") *[Resolute](/wiki/Resolute "Resolute")* served as his personal [flagship](/wiki/Flagship "Flagship"), under the [admiralty](/wiki/Admiral "Admiral") of [Wullf Yularen](/wiki/Wullf_Yularen "Wullf Yularen").[[19]](#cite_note-CloneWarsFilm-19)[[68]](#cite_note-Ryloth_1-68) During the war, Skywalker cut the B1 battle droid [R0-GR](/wiki/R0-GR "R0-GR") down on a number of occasions. Years later, after R0-GR met C-3PO and learned the protocol droid had been built by Skywalker, he thought this fact practically made him and the 3PO unit family.[[69]](#cite_note-Droidography-69)

#### Siege of Hisseen

 [![Skywalker, Koon, and Kenobi fight battle droids during the siege](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/44/NotAFairFight-TCWBattleTales1.png/revision/latest?cb=20210619213343) [![Skywalker, Koon, and Kenobi fight battle droids during the siege](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/44/NotAFairFight-TCWBattleTales1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/190?cb=20210619213343)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/44/NotAFairFight-TCWBattleTales1.png/revision/latest?cb=20210619213343) 

Skywalker, Koon, and Kenobi fight battle droids during the siege

 

Sometime later, the Jedi Council sent Skywalker, along with Kenobi and Jedi Master [Plo Koon](/wiki/Plo_Koon "Plo Koon"), along with their respective battalions to the [besieged](/wiki/Siege_of_Hisseen "Siege of Hisseen") planet of [Hisseen](/wiki/Hisseen "Hisseen") in order to stop a Separatist victory on the planet. While protecting a [village](/wiki/Unidentified_village_(Hisseen) "Unidentified village (Hisseen)") from oncoming droid forces, the clones required backup before Skywalker, Kenobi, and Koon arrived to rescue them. The three jumped into combat as Koon used the Force to push several droids into one another, destroying them. After a short battle with the droids, the Republic emerged victorious over that wave of droid forces. With this, Skywalker deactivated his lightsaber and met with Cody, [Clone Commander](/wiki/Clone_Commander "Clone Commander") [CC-3636](/wiki/Wolffe "Wolffe"), and as well as Clone Captain Rex regarding the [Hisseenian parliament](/wiki/Hisseen%27s_parliament "Hisseen's parliament") as well as a [Hisseenian](/wiki/Hisseenian "Hisseenian") [premier](/wiki/Unidentified_Hisseenian_premier "Unidentified Hisseenian premier") who was to meet with Count Dooku and Asajj Ventress, which could potentially lead to Dooku dissolving the government on Hisseen and allow him to control the planet.[[70]](#cite_note-Clone_Wars_1-70)

With that, Kenobi informed the clones that they would need to hold that position while the three went after Dooku and Ventress. With that, the three Jedi left to confront Dooku and Ventress. Meanwhile, Rex told a story about him and Skywalker during a [mission](/wiki/Mission_to_Benglor "Mission to Benglor") on [Benglor](/wiki/Benglor "Benglor").[[70]](#cite_note-Clone_Wars_1-70) Eventually, the three managed to find Dooku, leading Skywalker to enter a duel with him while Koon contacted trooper [Boost](/wiki/Boost "Boost") requesting immediate aid.[[71]](#cite_note-Clone_Wars_2-71) As Skywalker and his fellow Jedi chased Dooku and Ventress, they received a distress call from Rex, leading to the Jedi breaking off their pursuit to help their soldiers. Upon rescuing their clones, it was clear the day had been won for the Republic[[72]](#cite_note-Clone_Wars_5-72) because the soldiers had rescued the [Hisseenian parliament](/wiki/Hisseen%27s_parliament "Hisseen's parliament") from Dooku's droids.[[73]](#cite_note-Clone_Wars_3-73) Skywalker and his allies then departed Hisseen to return to Coruscant.[[72]](#cite_note-Clone_Wars_5-72)

#### Battles at Corvair sector and Kudo III

:   "*…Let's finish this.*"
:   ―Anakin Skywalker[[74]](#cite_note-AoR-AS1-74)

 [![Anakin Skywalker after defeating the Separatist fighters](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/e7/AnakinBattleOfCorvair-AORAnakin1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190220212632) [![Anakin Skywalker after defeating the Separatist fighters](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/e7/AnakinBattleOfCorvair-AORAnakin1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20190220212632)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/e7/AnakinBattleOfCorvair-AORAnakin1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190220212632) 

Anakin Skywalker after defeating the Separatist fighters

 

Skywalker later led several of his bombers and fighters [against](/wiki/Battle_of_Corvair "Battle of Corvair") the Separatists in the [Corvair sector](/wiki/Corvair_sector "Corvair sector"). After defeating the separatist fighters, Skywalker spoke with Admiral Yularen aboard the *Resolute*. Yularen confirmed that the Separatist contingent came from the [droid foundry](/wiki/Kudo_droid_foundry "Kudo droid foundry") on [Kudo III](/wiki/Kudo_III "Kudo III"). Skywalker agreed to attack the foundry quickly before Separatist reinforcements arrived. However, Skywalker did not approve of the attack's high casualties that included the [Kudon](/wiki/Kudon "Kudon"). Yularen suggested that they should do a surgical strike on the foundry's generator.[[74]](#cite_note-AoR-AS1-74)

Skywalker spoke with Master Kenobi about his plan for attack, who reminded Skywalker to trust his feelings and the Force. Skywalker took R2 with him aboard his [interceptor](/wiki/Anakin_Skywalker%27s_Delta-7B_Aethersprite-class_light_interceptor "Anakin Skywalker's Delta-7B Aethersprite-class light interceptor") and made his way to Kudo. After Skywalker landed, he made his way into the foundry and saw the Kudon being used as slave labor. Skywalker [fought](/wiki/Mission_to_Kudo_III "Mission to Kudo III") the battle droids and freed the Kudon. Skywalker was able to convince the Kudon to arm themselves and fight the battle droids. The mission was a success, and Skywalker returned to the *Resolute*.[[74]](#cite_note-AoR-AS1-74)

#### Battle of Christophsis

:   "*You're reckless, little one. You never would have made it as Obi-Wan's Padawan… but you might make it as mine.*"
:   ―Anakin Skywalker to Ahsoka Tano, following the Battle of Christophsis — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/b9/RecklessLittleOne-TCWf.flac/revision/latest?cb=20250404190255)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:RecklessLittleOne-TCWf.flac "File:RecklessLittleOne-TCWf.flac"))[[19]](#cite_note-CloneWarsFilm-19)

 [![Skywalker pilots the stealth ship against the Invincible.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/59/AnakinStealthShip.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20100418230914) [![Skywalker pilots the stealth ship against the Invincible.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/59/AnakinStealthShip.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/276?cb=20100418230914)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/59/AnakinStealthShip.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20100418230914) 

Skywalker pilots the stealth ship against the *Invincible*.

 

A few months into the war,[[75]](#cite_note-Boba_Fett_and_Other_Bounty_Hunters_and_Criminals-75) Skywalker and his former master, Kenobi, were tasked by the Jedi Council to [break](/wiki/Battle_of_Christophsis "Battle of Christophsis") the [Separatist blockade](/wiki/Christophsis_blockade "Christophsis blockade") on [Christophsis](/wiki/Christophsis "Christophsis"), and assist [Alderaanian](/wiki/Alderaanian "Alderaanian") Senator [Bail Organa](/wiki/Bail_Prestor_Organa "Bail Prestor Organa") on his relief effort on the planet's surface. Initially overwhelmed, Kenobi presented Skywalker with a Republic [stealth ship](/wiki/IPV-2C_Stealth_Corvette "IPV-2C Stealth Corvette") prototype with a [cloaking device](/wiki/Cloaking_device "Cloaking device") and tasked him with flying it past the blockade, in order to deliver supplies to Organa. Accompanied by Yularen, Skywalker chose instead to engage Separatist Admiral [Trench](/wiki/Trench "Trench") directly and divert his attention from Organa on the surface.[[76]](#cite_note-Cat_and_Mouse-76)

De-cloaking his stealth ship, Skywalker launched torpedoes at the dreadnought *[Invincible](/wiki/Invincible "Invincible")*, but his [missiles](/wiki/Missile "Missile") were repelled by the ship's powerful [thermal shields](/wiki/Thermal_shield "Thermal shield"). After successfully evading Trench's return fire, Trench sent a message over an open frequency, warning that he had faced this kind of ship before and that they should retreat before they were destroyed. Using the information supplied by Kenobi, Skywalker surmised that Trench would lock onto the ship's magnetic signature to destroy it and so, Skywalker de-cloaked once more, firing another volley of missiles at Trench's dreadnought. Trench took the bait and locked onto the stealth ship's magnetic signature, firing several [tracking torpedoes](/wiki/Tracking_torpedo "Tracking torpedo"). Skywalker steered the ship straight at the *Invincible*, scraping right past its hull before Trench's missiles struck the [bridge](/wiki/Bridge_(starship) "Bridge (starship)"). As Trench had just fired the missiles, his ship's shields were still recharging, and the dreadnought was destroyed. After defeating Trench, Skywalker delivered the supplies to Organa.[[76]](#cite_note-Cat_and_Mouse-76)

 [![Skywalker with Clone Captain CT-7567, "Rex"](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/f2/Anakin_and_Rex_on_Christophsis.png/revision/latest?cb=20121013052604) [![Skywalker with Clone Captain CT-7567, "Rex"](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/f2/Anakin_and_Rex_on_Christophsis.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/278?cb=20121013052604)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/f2/Anakin_and_Rex_on_Christophsis.png/revision/latest?cb=20121013052604) 

Skywalker with Clone Captain CT-7567, "Rex"

 

After breaking the blockade, Kenobi joined Skywalker and the rest of the Republic forces on Christophsis' surface and together, they planned an ambush on the advancing droid army; instead, they were ambushed and forced to evacuate. Aware of a possible with a traitor amidst them, the Jedi duo decided to go behind enemy lines in order to seek information, leaving Rex and Cody to find the traitor. In the empty [Separatist headquarters](/wiki/Christophsis_Separatist_headquarters "Christophsis Separatist headquarters"), Skywalker and Kenobi ran into Asajj Ventress, whom they dueled before flying two [STAPs](/wiki/Single_Trooper_Aerial_Platform "Single Trooper Aerial Platform") back to base. They soon arrived to discover Rex and Cody apprehending [Sergeant](/wiki/Clone_Sergeant "Clone Sergeant") [Slick](/wiki/Slick "Slick"), the double agent.[[77]](#cite_note-The_Hidden_Enemy-77)

As the battle raged, [Skywalker's squad](/wiki/Skywalker%27s_squad "Skywalker's squad") and the rest of the Republic forces managed to force the Separatists into a temporary retreat, but the need for reinforcements was evident. Instead, a young Togruta girl, [Ahsoka Tano](/wiki/Ahsoka_Tano "Ahsoka Tano"), arrived to relay Master Yoda's message for them to return to Coruscant for a new [mission](/wiki/Mission_to_Jabba%27s_Palace_(Clone_Wars) "Mission to Jabba's Palace (Clone Wars)"), presenting herself as Skywalker's new Padawan, much to his dismay. The impending Separatist threat made it impossible for them to leave their post, so Skywalker and Tano (whom Skywalker nicknamed "Snips") went behind enemy lines to destroy their droids' [deflector shield](/wiki/Deflector_shield "Deflector shield") generator while Kenobi stalled for time by holding a fake surrender negotiation with General [Loathsom](/wiki/Whorm_Loathsom "Whorm Loathsom"). Despite having to fight a few droids that protected the generator, the two managed to destroy it, allowing the Republic army to finish off the droids and win the battle. Only then did Skywalker and Tano find common ground, and he accepted the responsibility of mentoring her.[[19]](#cite_note-CloneWarsFilm-19)

#### Battle of Teth

:   "*So, this is where the fun begins.*"  
    "*Race you to the top.*"  
    "*I'll give you a head start.*"  
    "*Your mistake.*"
:   ―Ahsoka Tano and Anakin Skywalker — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/8e/RaceYouToTheTop-TCWf.flac/revision/latest?cb=20250404190252)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:RaceYouToTheTop-TCWf.flac "File:RaceYouToTheTop-TCWf.flac"))[[19]](#cite_note-CloneWarsFilm-19)

As Yoda arrived with reinforcements, Skywalker, Kenobi, and Tano were informed that [Jabba Desilijic Tiure](/wiki/Jabba_Desilijic_Tiure "Jabba Desilijic Tiure")'s son, [Rotta](/wiki/Rotta "Rotta") had been kidnapped, and Skywalker and Tano were to go to [Teth](/wiki/Teth "Teth") to search for the Huttlet, whereas Kenobi would speak with Jabba on Tatooine.[[19]](#cite_note-CloneWarsFilm-19)

 [![Skywalker and Tano fighting their way on a cliff towards the monastery](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/54/Skywalker_Teth_cliff.png/revision/latest?cb=20170101183937) [![Skywalker and Tano fighting their way on a cliff towards the monastery](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/54/Skywalker_Teth_cliff.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/248?cb=20170101183937)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/54/Skywalker_Teth_cliff.png/revision/latest?cb=20170101183937) 

Skywalker and Tano fighting their way on a cliff towards the monastery

 

With a time limit of only one planetary rotation to deliver Rotta, Skywalker and his Padawan landed in Teth, where they were flanked by battle droids. [Fighting](/wiki/Battle_of_Teth "Battle of Teth") their way up a cliffside, they made their way into a [monastery](/wiki/B%27omarr_Order_Monastery "B'omarr Order Monastery"); once inside they discovered that it was Asajj Ventress who had kidnapped the Huttlet. With considerable effort, the Master-Padawan pair seized Rotta and escaped aboard an abandoned [G9 *Rigger*-class light freighter](/wiki/G9_Rigger-class_light_freighter "G9 Rigger-class light freighter"), the *[Twilight](/wiki/Twilight "Twilight")*. They saw that help had arrived and planned to take the Huttlet to one of their [Star Destroyers](/wiki/Star_Destroyer "Star Destroyer") for help, as he had gotten sick. Unfortunately, the cruiser was destroyed, forcing them to take Rotta to his father on their own.[[19]](#cite_note-CloneWarsFilm-19)

#### Missions in Hutt territory

:   "*—that means we have a little bit of time to enjoy the cruise.*"  
    "*Annie, we're supposed to be discreet!*"  
    "*What better disguise than a couple in love on a romantic getaway?*"
:   ―Anakin Skywalker and Padmé Amidala aboard the *Halcyon*[[78]](#cite_note-HL_3-78)

 [![Skywalker and Tano briefly part ways on Tatooine.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d0/Dune_Sea_parting_ways.png/revision/latest?cb=20121013051010) [![Skywalker and Tano briefly part ways on Tatooine.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d0/Dune_Sea_parting_ways.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/242?cb=20121013051010)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d0/Dune_Sea_parting_ways.png/revision/latest?cb=20121013051010) 

Skywalker and Tano briefly part ways on Tatooine.

 

Upon arriving on Tatooine, they were attacked by [MagnaGuards](/wiki/IG-100_MagnaGuard "IG-100 MagnaGuard") and, though they defeated them, the *Twilight* crashed, forcing them to travel through the desert. Choosing to split up in the [Dune Sea](/wiki/Dune_Sea "Dune Sea"), Tano took Rotta to [Jabba's Palace](/wiki/Boba_Fett%27s_Palace "Boba Fett's Palace"), whereas Skywalker was confronted by Count Dooku. After a brief duel, Skywalker stole Dooku's [speeder bike](/wiki/Speeder_bike "Speeder bike"), knowing his Padawan was in trouble and reached Jabba's Palace, where he was told that Rotta had not been delivered and that he would be killed. Just then, Senator Amidala contacted the Hutt [crime lord](/wiki/Crime_lord "Crime lord") and informed him that his uncle [Ziro](/wiki/Ziro_Desilijic_Tiure "Ziro Desilijic Tiure") was involved with the kidnapping, just for Tano to arrive along with Rotta, resolving matters to Jabba's satisfaction.[[19]](#cite_note-CloneWarsFilm-19)

Sometime after the [treaty](/wiki/Hutt%E2%80%93Republic_treaty "Hutt–Republic treaty") between the Republic and [Hutt Clan](/wiki/Hutt_Clan "Hutt Clan") was finalized, Skywalker and Amidala were sent to meet with [Lannik](/wiki/Lannik_(species) "Lannik (species)") senator [Zast Tri'vak](/wiki/Zast_Tri%27vak "Zast Tri'vak") on the luxury [MPO-1400 *Purgill*-class star cruiser](/wiki/MPO-1400_Purgill-class_star_cruiser "MPO-1400 Purgill-class star cruiser") *[Halcyon](/wiki/Halcyon "Halcyon")* and ensure that he would not sway [Lannik](/wiki/Lannik "Lannik") to align with the Separatists and cut off Republic supply routes. After assisting a [Logistics droid](/wiki/Logistics_droid "Logistics droid") named [D3-O9](/wiki/D3-O9 "D3-O9"), Skywalker and Amidala observed Tri'vak as he hurriedly returned to his cabin. Knowing that Kenobi had the ship's destination staked out with a unit of clones due to reports of Separatist agents, the couple decided to enjoy their time together on the Star Cruiser. They went on to flirtatiously duel each other in the sparring room and observe a local [puffer pig](/wiki/Puffer_pig "Puffer pig") before it expanded and blocked their path. As they relaxed in the [Climate Simulator](/wiki/Climate_Simulator "Climate Simulator"), Skywalker suddenly sensed Ventress on the ship and realized that she was there to extract Tri'vak. He and Amidala then broke into the senator's cabin and discovered a hole cut into the floor. Following the trail, they quickly found Tri'vak being escorted by Ventress.[[78]](#cite_note-HL_3-78)

 [![Skywalker and Ventress duel](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/82/SkirmishOnTheHalcyon-HalcyonLegacy1.png/revision/latest?cb=20220203034448) [![Skywalker and Ventress duel](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/82/SkirmishOnTheHalcyon-HalcyonLegacy1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20220203034448)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/82/SkirmishOnTheHalcyon-HalcyonLegacy1.png/revision/latest?cb=20220203034448) 

Skywalker and Ventress duel

 

As Skywalker dueled Ventress, he and Amidala were threatened by a few guards before Amidala stunned them with the help of a young [Tholothian](/wiki/Tholothian "Tholothian") boy named [Shorr Komrrin](/wiki/Shorr_Komrrin "Shorr Komrrin"). Just then, the fighting was stopped by a Hutt who had the combatants surrounded by security. When the Hutt threatened to end the Hutt Clan's treaty with the Republic, Amidala explained to him that they were there to root out a traitor and reminded him of the Mid Rim trade routes they each benefited from. While Tri'vak begged the Hutt for mercy, Ventress stabbed the senator in the back and used her lightsabers to shatter a nearby window, leaping out into space and escaping in her fanblade starfighter. Amidala held onto Shorr's hand as Skywalker sealed the opening with the Force. She then commended the boy for his bravery while Skywalker watched as Ventress flew away.[[78]](#cite_note-HL_3-78)

Following the [Battle of Hypori](/wiki/Battle_of_Hypori "Battle of Hypori"), Kenobi, Cody, and the [212th Attack Battalion](/wiki/212th_Attack_Battalion "212th Attack Battalion") were sent to aid Commander [Mekedrix](/wiki/Mekedrix "Mekedrix") and his [forces](/wiki/Mekedrix%27s_company "Mekedrix's company") from [Roon](/wiki/Roon "Roon") at a [battle](/wiki/Battle_of_Abrion_Bridge "Battle of Abrion Bridge") on [Abrion Major](/wiki/Abrion_Major "Abrion Major"). As he went to meet with Yularen, Kenobi contacted Skywalker and the Jedi wished each other luck before Kenobi left for his mission.[[79]](#cite_note-Obi-Wan_3-79)

#### The *Malevolence*

:   "*That's your plan? Just fly there, land, hope they don't spot us and walk in the door?*"  
    "*Basically.*"  
    "*Oh. Brilliant. Let's get going.*"
:   ―Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/f/f3/AnakinMalevolencePlan.flac/revision/latest?cb=20251109031215)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:AnakinMalevolencePlan.flac "File:AnakinMalevolencePlan.flac"))[[80]](#cite_note-Malevolence_3-80)

 [![Anakin and Padmé fleeing pursuing troops on Malevolence](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d8/Malevolence_Struggle.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141025204825) [![Anakin and Padmé fleeing pursuing troops on Malevolence](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d8/Malevolence_Struggle.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/276?cb=20141025204825)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d8/Malevolence_Struggle.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141025204825) 

Anakin and Padmé fleeing pursuing troops on *Malevolence*

 

When news reached them of the [destruction](/wiki/Battle_of_Abregado "Battle of Abregado") of Jedi Master Plo Koon's [fleet](/wiki/Fleet "Fleet") in the [Abregado system](/wiki/Abregado_system "Abregado system"), Skywalker and his Padawan set out to rescue him and any survivors in spite of his orders to rendezvous with Kenobi's fleet. Though he sent his ships and most of his men, Skywalker himself and Tano used the *Twilight* to rescue Koon and three other clones, who told them of a new Separatist [superweapon](/wiki/Superweapon "Superweapon"), the [*Subjugator*-class heavy cruiser](/wiki/Subjugator-class_heavy_cruiser "Subjugator-class heavy cruiser") *[Malevolence](/wiki/Malevolence "Malevolence")*, which was commanded by Grievous.[[81]](#cite_note-Malevolence_1-81)

After yet [another attack](/wiki/Battle_of_the_Ryndellia_system "Battle of the Ryndellia system") from the *Malevolence*, Skywalker decided to lead the [Shadow Squadron](/wiki/Shadow_Squadron "Shadow Squadron") into an [attack](/wiki/Battle_of_the_Kaliida_Nebula "Battle of the Kaliida Nebula") against the heavy cruiser, only to narrowly escape the *Malevolence*'s [ion cannon](/wiki/Ion_cannon "Ion cannon"), which left too many [bombers](/wiki/Bomber "Bomber") destroyed or incapacitated. Forced to change the plan, Skywalker and the bombers dropped their payload on the ion cannon, forcing it to overload, damaging the ship and causing the *Malevolence* to retreat from its attack on a [Republic medical station](/wiki/Kaliida_Shoals_Medical_Center "Kaliida Shoals Medical Center").[[82]](#cite_note-Malevolence_2-82) While making his escape, Grievous captured Senator Amidala, who entered the [system](/wiki/Star_system "Star system") in the belief she was sent to negotiate with the [InterGalactic Banking Clan](/wiki/InterGalactic_Banking_Clan "InterGalactic Banking Clan") Supreme Executive, rather than a trap. Ordering their ships to halt their fire, Skywalker and Kenobi boarded the *Malevolence* to rescue her. While on the ship, Skywalker [sabotaged](/wiki/Saboteur "Saboteur") the ship's [navigation system](/wiki/Navigation_computer "Navigation computer") to cause the ship to crash into a moon should the hyperdrive be engaged, before escaping the ship alongside Amidala and Kenobi.[[80]](#cite_note-Malevolence_3-80)

Following the [battle](/wiki/Defense_of_Rishi_Station "Defense of Rishi Station") wherein a group of clones from [Rishi Station](/wiki/Rishi_Station "Rishi Station") prevented a surprise attack on Kamino, Skywalker and Kenobi awarded [medals](/wiki/Medal "Medal") to two of its survivors, newcomers [Echo](/wiki/Echo "Echo") and [Fives](/wiki/Fives "Fives"), with Skywalker welcoming them onto the 501st Legion.[[83]](#cite_note-Rookies-83)

At some point, Skywalker and Kenobi crashed their [Y-wing](/wiki/BTL_Y-wing_starfighter "BTL Y-wing starfighter") into a shield protecting a city near the [Senatorial Palace](/wiki/Senatorial_Palace "Senatorial Palace") as they investigated the activities of some rogue Nightsisters on [Rodia](/wiki/Rodia "Rodia"). When the shield was abruptly activated, the starfighter was entirely destroyed, while the dome remained unaffected.[[84]](#cite_note-Mustafar_and_Other-84)

#### R2-D2 lost

:   "*So let me get this straight, Anakin. You risked the mission, all your men, even your* Padawan*, to save a droid?*"  
    "*Artoo found the listening post,* and *he saved our lives. We couldn't just leave him there, Obi-Wan.*"  
    "*Oh, Anakin,* one day*…*"
:   ―Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/7f/ToSaveADroid-DotD.flac/revision/latest?cb=20250329120614)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:ToSaveADroid-DotD.flac "File:ToSaveADroid-DotD.flac"))[[85]](#cite_note-Duel_of_the_Droids-85)

Following [numerous Separatist victories](/wiki/Skytop_Station_campaign "Skytop Station campaign") from General Grievous, and the [defeat of](/wiki/Battle_of_Falleen "Battle of Falleen") the [Falleen battle group](/wiki/Falleen_battle_group "Falleen battle group"), Skywalker attempted to stop the [cyborg](/wiki/Cyborg "Cyborg") from taking his [sector](/wiki/Sector "Sector") and planned an [ambush](/wiki/Battle_of_Bothawui "Battle of Bothawui") for the Separatist forces as they were passing through [Bothawui](/wiki/Bothawui "Bothawui")'s [asteroid field](/wiki/Fervse%27dra_asteroid_belt "Fervse'dra asteroid belt"). Placing [AT-TEs](/wiki/All_Terrain_Tactical_Enforcer "All Terrain Tactical Enforcer") on the nearby [asteroids](/wiki/Asteroid "Asteroid"), he managed to destroy the Separatist frigates and forced Grievous to retreat in the *[Soulless One](/wiki/Soulless_One "Soulless One")*, resulting in a pursuit by Skywalker. However, debris from the destroyed Separatist frigates damaged his ship, leaving him to be rescued by Rex at the cost of losing R2-D2. Though he was supplied with a new [astromech](/wiki/Astromech_droid "Astromech droid") droid, [R3-S6](/wiki/R3-S6 "R3-S6"), Skywalker was saddened by the loss of his friend and did not take to the new droid, and felt something suspicious on its true allegiance. Instead, he launched a search, scouring the battlefield; unable to find R2-D2, they [boarded](/wiki/Ambush_on_the_Vulture%27s_Claw "Ambush on the Vulture's Claw") a nearby scavenger ship, the *[Vulture's Claw](/wiki/Vulture%27s_Claw "Vulture's Claw")*, only to leave empty-handed as [Gha Nachkt](/wiki/Gha_Nachkt "Gha Nachkt") delivered R2-D2 to Grievous.[[86]](#cite_note-Downfall_of_a_Droid-86)

 [![Skywalker engaging an IG-100 MagnaGuard](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/2f/Skywalker_vs_MagnaGuard.png/revision/latest?cb=20120921021008) [![Skywalker engaging an IG-100 MagnaGuard](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/2f/Skywalker_vs_MagnaGuard.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/264?cb=20120921021008)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/2f/Skywalker_vs_MagnaGuard.png/revision/latest?cb=20120921021008) 

Skywalker engaging an IG-100 MagnaGuard

 

With all hope lost, Skywalker attempted to continue life without the droid, [scouting](/wiki/Mission_to_suspected_Confederate_space "Mission to suspected Confederate space") for a possible Separatist listening outpost,[[86]](#cite_note-Downfall_of_a_Droid-86) until R2-D2 sent a message revealing his location at [Skytop Station](/wiki/Skytop_Station "Skytop Station"). Upon arrival, Skywalker ordered Tano and Rex to fulfill the [mission](/wiki/Raid_on_Skytop_Station "Raid on Skytop Station") objective—to destroy the station—while he went to find his lost droid. Though Skywalker engaged several MagnaGuards, he found R2-D2 and met up with Rex and [Denal](/wiki/Denal "Denal"), who told him that Tano was gone to distract Grievous alone while they completed the mission. It was then, as Anakin already suspected about R3-S6's true allegiance, that R3 revealed himself to be Grievous' [spy](/wiki/Spy "Spy") and set several vulture droids and super battle droids against them. As they resisted, Tano rejoined the group, only to be scolded by her master for engaging the droid general alone; R2-D2 opened the hangar doors, defeating R3-S6 in the process, to be retrieved by a happy Skywalker, delighted to have his longtime friend back safe.[[85]](#cite_note-Duel_of_the_Droids-85)

Following [Viceroy](/wiki/Viceroy "Viceroy") [Nute Gunray](/wiki/Nute_Gunray "Nute Gunray")'s [capture](/wiki/Mission_to_Rodia "Mission to Rodia") in Rodia by Amidala, Skywalker separated from Tano, who went onto serve as Gunray's escort alongside [Luminara Unduli](/wiki/Luminara_Unduli "Luminara Unduli"). Although the two [failed](/wiki/Rescue_on_the_Tranquility "Rescue on the Tranquility") in their task, Skywalker reunited with Tano at the rendezvous point.[[87]](#cite_note-Cloak_of_Darkness-87)

#### Captured on Florrum

:   "*You should be more patient, Master. After all, the Count is an elderly gentlemen, and doesn't move like he used to.*"  
    "*I suppose you're right."*  
    "*I would kill you both right now if I did not have to drag your bodies.*"
:   ―Skywalker and Kenobi mock Dooku as the three attempt to escape — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a9/AniObiDookuBanter-TGG.flac/revision/latest?cb=20250329114402)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:AniObiDookuBanter-TGG.flac "File:AniObiDookuBanter-TGG.flac"))[[88]](#cite_note-The_Gungan_General-88)

 [![Dooku's incarceration confirmed by Skywalker and Kenobi](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/47/Epguide11.png/revision/latest?cb=20120924044609) [![Dooku's incarceration confirmed by Skywalker and Kenobi](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/47/Epguide11.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/281?cb=20120924044609)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/47/Epguide11.png/revision/latest?cb=20120924044609) 

Dooku's incarceration confirmed by Skywalker and Kenobi

 

Together with Kenobi, Skywalker spearheaded an [attempt](/wiki/Skirmish_at_Vanqor "Skirmish at Vanqor") near the planet [Vanqor](/wiki/Vanqor "Vanqor") to capture Count Dooku, where Skywalker let himself be captured by Dooku's [*Munificent*-class star frigate](/wiki/Munificent-class_star_frigate "Munificent-class star frigate") and taken to a prison cell, only for Kenobi to come and rescue him. The two Jedi then gave chase to Dooku, who escaped in his [solar sailer](/wiki/Solar_sailer "Solar sailer"), with a [*Sheathipede*-class transport shuttle](/wiki/Sheathipede-class_transport_shuttle "Sheathipede-class transport shuttle"). After taking direct hits to their shuttle, they were forced to crash-land on the planet. In a nearby cave, the two Jedi began to hunt for Dooku, but the Sith Lord ambushed them by causing a sudden collapse in the cave ceiling. While Dooku escaped the cave, they had to render a gundark unconscious, only to nearly succumb to poison gas released from a trapped pocket in the cave. They were saved just in time, as Tano and a detachment of clone troopers rescued them.[[89]](#cite_note-Dooku_Captured-89)

Later, as Supreme Chancellor Palpatine and his representatives were contacted by [Hondo Ohnaka](/wiki/Hondo_Ohnaka "Hondo Ohnaka") to receive a reward for capturing Count Dooku, Skywalker and Kenobi were assigned to verify the [pirate](/wiki/Pirate "Pirate") [gang's](/wiki/Ohnaka_Gang "Ohnaka Gang") custody of Dooku, agreeing to the pirates' condition to arrive unarmed. The Jedi were met at gunpoint in the *Twilight* and escorted to Ohnaka, who arranged a meeting with their prisoner. The Jedi mocked Dooku's imprisonment, and the Sith Lord warned them not to underestimate the [Weequay](/wiki/Weequay "Weequay"). Skywalker and Kenobi were invited to a "party" by the pirates, only to wind up passed out in a cell, chained together with Dooku.[[89]](#cite_note-Dooku_Captured-89) Despite several attempts by the Jedi and Sith to escape on their own, [Representative](/wiki/Junior_Representative "Junior Representative") Binks was the one to rescue them, though the [mission](/wiki/Mission_to_Florrum "Mission to Florrum") came at the cost of Senator [Kharrus](/wiki/Kharrus "Kharrus")' life and Dooku's escape. Obi Wan told Anakin not to harm Hondo and left peacefully.[[88]](#cite_note-The_Gungan_General-88)

Later, Skywalker heard about the situation on [Ridlay](/wiki/Ridlay "Ridlay"), where the entire planet stopped communicating for an unusual amount of time. He contacted Windu, who was already [there to investigate the situation](/wiki/Mission_to_Ridlay "Mission to Ridlay"). He offered his and Tano's assistance, but Windu denied their involvement.[[90]](#cite_note-Separation_Anxiety-90)

#### Quell and Maridun

:   "*This battle is inevitable. You can stand by your beliefs, but let us stand by ours.*"
:   ―Anakin Skywalker, to Tee Watt Kaa — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/8b/AnakinLemurBeliefs.flac/revision/latest?cb=20251109031705)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:AnakinLemurBeliefs.flac "File:AnakinLemurBeliefs.flac"))[[91]](#cite_note-Defenders_of_Peace-91)

 [![A gravely injured Skywalker, tended by Tano and Aayla Secura](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/32/AaylaAnakinAhsoka-TCWS01E13.png/revision/latest?cb=20120925234150) [![A gravely injured Skywalker, tended by Tano and Aayla Secura](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/32/AaylaAnakinAhsoka-TCWS01E13.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/281?cb=20120925234150)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/32/AaylaAnakinAhsoka-TCWS01E13.png/revision/latest?cb=20120925234150) 

A gravely injured Skywalker, tended by Tano and Aayla Secura

 

Sent in as reinforcements for Jedi Master [Aayla Secura](/wiki/Aayla_Secura "Aayla Secura")'s and Commander [Bly](/wiki/Bly "Bly")'s [forces](/wiki/Aayla_Secura%27s_task_force "Aayla Secura's task force"), which were heavily outnumbered and overpowered during the [Battle of Quell](/wiki/Battle_of_Quell "Battle of Quell"), Skywalker, Tano, Rex, and their forces assisted in an evacuation of Secura's cruiser as it fell under heavy Separatist fire. Meeting with Secura, a raging inferno ran through the cruiser, and Skywalker sacrificed himself to save the others, severely injuring himself in the process. Tano and Secura dragged Skywalker onto the evacuation frigate, where he was given medical treatment for his injuries. As they prepared to dock with the *Resolute*, an ambush by several vulture droids caused the ship's hyperdrive to activate, sending them into deep space. After narrowly avoiding an incoming [star](/wiki/Star "Star"), they crash-landed on [Maridun](/wiki/Maridun "Maridun"), where Skywalker was left in the care of Rex, while Secura, Tano, and Bly set out to ask the natives for medical support. Rex defended Skywalker from several vicious [mastiff phalones](/wiki/Mastiff_phalone "Mastiff phalone") until Tano arrived back with Bly and [Lurmen](/wiki/Lurmen "Lurmen") healer [Wag Too](/wiki/Wag_Too "Wag Too"), before a final confrontation against the vicious attackers.[[92]](#cite_note-Jedi_Crash-92)

Soon after their arrival, Separatist forces landed on the planet, and the Lurmen leader [Tee Watt Kaa](/wiki/Tee_Watt_Kaa "Tee Watt Kaa") accused the Jedi of bringing the war to their peaceful planet, ordering them to leave immediately. Though they did, the Jedi returned to the [Lurmen village](/wiki/Lurmen_village "Lurmen village") after learning about the Separatists' sinister objective—to test their new superweapon, the [defoliator](/wiki/Defoliator "Defoliator"), on the Lurmen. The group set up a shield generator to [protect](/wiki/Defense_of_Maridun "Defense of Maridun") the village from the blast of the weapon, as well as from the [incoming](/wiki/Squad_One_(Lok_Durd) "Squad One (Lok Durd)") [waves](/wiki/Squad_Two_(Lok_Durd) "Squad Two (Lok Durd)") [of](/wiki/Squad_Three_(Lok_Durd) "Squad Three (Lok Durd)") battle droids. As their shield was destroyed and the defoliator was being reloaded for another shot, Skywalker disabled the weapon before capturing Separatist General [Lok Durd](/wiki/Lok_Durd "Lok Durd"). The Jedi then left the planet, now peaceful again, on several Republic cruisers sent by Yularen.[[91]](#cite_note-Defenders_of_Peace-91)

#### Orto Plutonia

:   "*…and this is the planet's tropical zone.*"  
    "*It's not Tatooine, that's for sure.*"
:   ―Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker, on Orto Plutonia — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/69/NotTatooine.flac/revision/latest?cb=20251109032050)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:NotTatooine.flac "File:NotTatooine.flac"))[[93]](#cite_note-Trespass-93)

 [![Skywalker, dressed for Orto Plutonia's cold climate](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/1/1b/Rex_cold_assault_trooper.png/revision/latest?cb=20120928043858) [![Skywalker, dressed for Orto Plutonia's cold climate](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/1/1b/Rex_cold_assault_trooper.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/290?cb=20120928043858)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/1/1b/Rex_cold_assault_trooper.png/revision/latest?cb=20120928043858) 

Skywalker, dressed for Orto Plutonia's cold climate

 

After losing contact with a Republic [outpost](/wiki/Glid_Station "Glid Station") on [Orto Plutonia](/wiki/Orto_Plutonia "Orto Plutonia"), Skywalker, his droids C-3PO and R2-D2, and Kenobi were sent to investigate with a [squad](/wiki/Squad "Squad") of [cold assault troopers](/wiki/Clone_cold_assault_trooper "Clone cold assault trooper") under the command of Captain Rex, in the company of [Pantora](/wiki/Pantora "Pantora") Senator [Riyo Chuchi](/wiki/Riyo_Chuchi "Riyo Chuchi") and [Chairman](/wiki/Chairman "Chairman") [Chi Cho](/wiki/Chi_Cho "Chi Cho"). Skywalker and Kenobi investigated the outpost following the mysterious death of all its [clone troopers](/wiki/Orto_Plutonia_clone_security_force "Orto Plutonia clone security force"), and the two Jedi deduced that all the clones had been killed, but not by battle droids since another nearby [Separatist base](/wiki/Separatist_outpost_(Orto_Plutonia) "Separatist outpost (Orto Plutonia)") had also been attacked. Skywalker and Kenobi followed their clues to a nearby canyon, where they found a [village](/wiki/Talz_village "Talz village") inhabited by [Talz](/wiki/Talz "Talz"), who explained that they were only trying to protect their home as translated by C-3PO. Acting as a mediator, Kenobi proposed a peace meeting between the Talz and Chairman Cho, but the latter refused to share the [moon](/wiki/Moon "Moon") with the Talz, and declared war, despite the Jedi's efforts to bring forth peace. As a [battle](/wiki/One-Day_War "One-Day War") broke out amongst the clone troopers and the Talz, Senator Chuchi convened with the [Pantoran Assembly](/wiki/Pantoran_Assembly "Pantoran Assembly") and called Cho out of order. The battle came to an end when Cho was killed, and Chuchi gave a proposal to the Talz to share the moon with them.[[93]](#cite_note-Trespass-93)

#### Blue Shadow Virus

:   "*You must move cautiously if you—*"  
    "*There's no time for caution. My Padawan is trapped on there, and so is Padmé—I mean, Senator Amidala.*"
:   ―Gregar Typho and Anakin Skywalker, much to Kenobi's disapproving look — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/2e/AnakinAngryTypho.flac/revision/latest?cb=20251109032712)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:AnakinAngryTypho.flac "File:AnakinAngryTypho.flac"))[[94]](#cite_note-Mystery_of_a_Thousand_Moons-94)

Upon Amidala's petition to send Skywalker and Kenobi to assist them in locating suspected Separatist presence on Naboo, Skywalker, Kenobi, and Tano arrived to find that Amidala and Binks had gone to investigate the [eastern swamps](/wiki/Eastern_swamps "Eastern swamps").
