Sending the young Padawan with [Peppi Bow](/wiki/Peppi_Bow "Peppi Bow") to find them, the two Jedi were informed by Captain [Gregar Typho](/wiki/Gregar_Typho "Gregar Typho") that before losing contact with Amidala, she had informed them of the [laboratory's](/wiki/Trade_Federation_laboratory "Trade Federation laboratory") location and of [Dr.](/wiki/Doctor "Doctor") [Nuvo Vindi](/wiki/Nuvo_Vindi "Nuvo Vindi")'s intentions to release the dangerous [Blue Shadow Virus](/wiki/Blue_Shadow_Virus "Blue Shadow Virus") back into the galaxy. While Tano led an [attack](/wiki/Raid_on_Nuvo_Vindi%27s_laboratory "Raid on Nuvo Vindi's laboratory") on the southern entrance, providing a distraction for Kenobi and Skywalker to enter through the hatches undetected, Skywalker confronted Vindi, who electrified Amidala and Binks to make his escape. After saving the Senator, Skywalker pursued the [scientist](/wiki/Scientist "Scientist"), capturing him with the help of Peppi Bow and Kenobi on the swamp above.[[95]](#cite_note-Blue_Shadow_Virus-95)

 [![Skywalker and Kenobi, taunted by Nuvo Vindi](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/32/Vindi_taunts_Anakin_and_Obi-Wan.png/revision/latest?cb=20121002220437) [![Skywalker and Kenobi, taunted by Nuvo Vindi](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/32/Vindi_taunts_Anakin_and_Obi-Wan.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/284?cb=20121002220437)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/32/Vindi_taunts_Anakin_and_Obi-Wan.png/revision/latest?cb=20121002220437) 

Skywalker and Kenobi, taunted by Nuvo Vindi

 

Prepared to transport Vindi to Theed for his trial, they heard an alarm go off below them and Skywalker contacted Tano; she told him that Vindi's [servant droid](/wiki/LEP-series_service_droid "LEP-series service droid") had set off one of the [viral bombs](/wiki/Viral_bomb "Viral bomb"), liberating the virus, and that she along with the clones were trapped in the laboratory, just like Amidala was. Once in Theed, Captain Typho told the two Jedi that they had found a possible [antidote](/wiki/Antidote "Antidote") for the virus, a [reeksa](/wiki/Reeksa "Reeksa") root, but that it could only be found on the planet of [Iego](/wiki/Iego "Iego"). Despite Typho's warnings that it was [suicide](/wiki/Death "Death"), Skywalker set off alongside Kenobi aboard the *Twilight*.[[94]](#cite_note-Mystery_of_a_Thousand_Moons-94)

Upon arrival, Skywalker and Kenobi were greeted by a group of inoffensive [B1-series battle droids](/wiki/B1-series_battle_droid "B1-series battle droid") that had been reprogrammed to do the bidding of a local boy, [Jaybo Hood](/wiki/Jaybo_Hood "Jaybo Hood"); he told the Jedi that the planet was protected by a [deity](/wiki/Deity "Deity") known as [Drol](/wiki/Drol "Drol"), who would not let any who arrived on the planet leave again, but also instructed them on how to retrieve the reeksa roots. Though the plant attacked them, they obtained the root and bid farewell to Hood before taking off, only to be forced to turn back after encountering a [laser](/wiki/LaserWeb_Defense_Station "LaserWeb Defense Station") [web](/wiki/Laser_web "Laser web"), the work of the Separatists. On their second attempt, however, they used Hood's reprogrammed vulture droids, and Kenobi managed to shoot the laser generator, liberating the inhabitants of Iego. Skywalker and Kenobi then arrived in time to rescue their friends on Naboo.[[94]](#cite_note-Mystery_of_a_Thousand_Moons-94)

#### Battle of Ryloth

:   "*It was a trap, Snips. It was not your fault.*"  
    "*I lost so many of my pilots.*"  
    "*Take heart, little one. That's the reality of command.*"
:   ―Anakin Skywalker and Ahsoka Tano — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/bd/RealityOfCommand-SOR.flac/revision/latest?cb=20250329120030)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:RealityOfCommand-SOR.flac "File:RealityOfCommand-SOR.flac"))[[68]](#cite_note-Ryloth_1-68)

 [![Skywalker trying to bolster Tano's confidence](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/3b/AnakinAhsoka-StormOverRyloth.png/revision/latest?cb=20121003223137) [![Skywalker trying to bolster Tano's confidence](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/3b/AnakinAhsoka-StormOverRyloth.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/269?cb=20121003223137)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/3b/AnakinAhsoka-StormOverRyloth.png/revision/latest?cb=20121003223137) 

Skywalker trying to bolster Tano's confidence

 

During the [Battle of Ryloth](/wiki/Battle_of_Ryloth "Battle of Ryloth"), Skywalker gave Tano command of a [squadron](/wiki/Blue_Squadron_(Galactic_Republic) "Blue Squadron (Galactic Republic)") to fend off [Mar Tuuk](/wiki/Mar_Tuuk "Mar Tuuk")'s [blockade](/wiki/Ryloth_blockade "Ryloth blockade") to make way for Kenobi's ground assault, encouraging Tano to overcome her nervousness about leading her first squad. However, during the battle, she disobeyed her master's orders and lost many men, for which Skywalker reprimanded her when she arrived back at the *Resolute*, yet understood her good intentions. Skywalker then reported his losses to Windu and Kenobi. He gave her some time to recover but informed her that they needed to proceed with the attack on the blockade, which upset Tano because he was rushing the plan despite their recent losses. Though he told her to go cool off somewhere, Skywalker had an idea—he evacuated the damaged *[Defender](/wiki/Defender "Defender")*, which he would pilot by himself into the [Ryloth system](/wiki/Ryloth_system "Ryloth system") to distract the Separatists, while he gave Tano full command of the attack operation. By the time Turk realized the ruse, it was too late, for Skywalker had already escaped in an [escape pod](/wiki/Escape_pod "Escape pod") and let the *Defender* collide with Tuuk's control ship; though Tuuk escaped, Tano destroyed the Confederate fleet, and Skywalker was rescued from his escape pod.[[68]](#cite_note-Ryloth_1-68)

After Kenobi and his men were able to take out the proton cannons and allow the [transports](/wiki/Transport "Transport") to land,[[96]](#cite_note-Ryloth_2-96) whereas Windu headed for [Lessu](/wiki/Lessu_City "Lessu City") with his forces, Skywalker and his forces secured the space around [Ryloth](/wiki/Ryloth "Ryloth"), forcing the remaining Separatist cruisers to flee. He reported this in a holographic conference with Chancellor Palpatine, Yoda, Admiral Yularen, Senator [Orn Free Taa](/wiki/Orn_Free_Taa "Orn Free Taa"), and Windu. However, Separatist General [Wat Tambor](/wiki/Wat_Tambor "Wat Tambor") soon deployed [*Hyena*-class Droid Bombers](/wiki/Hyena-class_Droid_Fighter/Bomber "Hyena-class Droid Fighter/Bomber") to destroy Ryloth's villages and Skywalker engaged them in his [interceptor](/wiki/Interceptor "Interceptor"), accompanied by Tano and clones. Before Lessu was destroyed on Count Dooku's orders, Skywalker and Tano shot them down. Subsequently, Tambor was captured, and the Republic was victorious: Ryloth was finally free once more.[[97]](#cite_note-Ryloth_3-97)

#### Holocron heist

:   "*This could be a trap, Master. Are you sure you don't need us to go?*"  
    "*Of course it's a trap, Skywalker.*"
:   ―Anakin Skywalker and Mace Windu — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/ae/OfCourseItsATrapSkywalker-ChildrenOfTheForce.flac/revision/latest?cb=20250328195714)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:OfCourseItsATrapSkywalker-ChildrenOfTheForce.flac "File:OfCourseItsATrapSkywalker-ChildrenOfTheForce.flac"))[[98]](#cite_note-Children_of_the_Force-98)

 [![Republic forces retreating from Felucia](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/94/BattleOfFelucia-HH.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20090926192328) [![Republic forces retreating from Felucia](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/94/BattleOfFelucia-HH.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/266?cb=20090926192328)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/94/BattleOfFelucia-HH.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20090926192328) 

Republic forces retreating from Felucia

 

Skywalker and Clone Commander "[Wolffe](/wiki/Wolffe "Wolffe")" fought alongside each other during the [Battle of Khorm](/wiki/Battle_of_Khorm "Battle of Khorm"), where the [Clone Officer](/wiki/Clone_trooper_officer "Clone trooper officer") lost his right eye[[99]](#cite_note-FC_Wolffe-99) to Ventress.[[100]](#cite_note-Ultimate_SW-100) Sometime later,[[101]](#cite_note-Felucia_Batle_Date-101) during the [First Battle of Felucia](/wiki/First_Battle_of_Felucia "First Battle of Felucia"), Skywalker, Tano, and Kenobi fought against the Droid Army, but, while Tano was away on a jungle patrol, Skywalker, Kenobi, and their clones were surrounded. However, a Republic fleet[[102]](#cite_note-Holocron_Heist-102) commanded by Wolffe[[103]](#cite_note-Wolffe_Bio_Gallery_Image_4-103) was able to break past the [Separatist blockade](/wiki/Felucia_blockade "Felucia blockade"), so Skywalker and the others could be evacuated by Master Plo Koon. However, Tano refused to retreat, and Kenobi and Skywalker went to retrieve her before her forces were overrun by droids. While Skywalker and Tano argued about the retreat, as Tano believed the droids were retreating, she boarded the gunship in time, and the three Jedi watched as her abandoned vehicles were destroyed. Back at the Jedi Temple, Skywalker attempted to take the blame for her disobedience, citing that he had given her more freedom due to her skills. Still, the Council relegated her to guard duty in the [Jedi Archives](/wiki/Jedi_Archives "Jedi Archives") to reflect on what she had done.[[102]](#cite_note-Holocron_Heist-102)

When Yoda sensed that thieves would [arrive](/wiki/Raid_on_the_Jedi_Temple "Raid on the Jedi Temple") at the Temple, Skywalker, and Kenobi inaccurately deduced that their enemies were after their transmission codes and went to secure them, only to be proven wrong when they located the intruders' position at the ventilation shaft. They were misdirected then to the communication center, where they narrowly escaped an exploding [Todo](/wiki/Todo_360 "Todo 360"), and realized only too late that [Cad Bane](/wiki/Cad_Bane "Cad Bane") had stolen a holocron from the [Vault](/wiki/Holocron_Vault "Holocron Vault"). Furthermore, the bounty hunter that was assisting Bane, [Cato Parasitti](/wiki/Cato_Parasitti "Cato Parasitti") revealed that Bane's next target was [Bolla Ropal](/wiki/Bolla_Ropal "Bolla Ropal"), keeper of the [Kyber memory crystal](/wiki/Kyber_memory_crystal "Kyber memory crystal"), which contained a list of all known [Force-sensitive](/wiki/Force-sensitive "Force-sensitive") children in the Republic.[[102]](#cite_note-Holocron_Heist-102) Skywalker then volunteered himself and Tano to meet with Ropal, arriving in the [Devaron system](/wiki/Devaron_system "Devaron system") to [cut off](/wiki/Battle_of_Devaron "Battle of Devaron") the Separatist fleet that was assisting Bane, who already had captured Ropal and [tortured](/wiki/Torture "Torture") him to death in a [containment field](/wiki/Containment_field "Containment field") after he defiantly refused to open the holocron.[[104]](#cite_note-Cargo_of_Doom-104)

Skywalker, Tano, and Rex boarded [Bane's *Munificent*-class frigate](/wiki/Cad_Bane%27s_Munificent-class_star_frigate "Cad Bane's Munificent-class star frigate") and stormed its bridge, where R2-D2 accessed the ship's computer to locate Ropal, or rather, Ropal's dead body. After an explosion rocked the ship, the Jedi spotted Bane and chased him into a trap. After a duel with Tano, the [bounty hunter](/wiki/Bounty_hunter "Bounty hunter") took her as a hostage, and Skywalker was forced to bow to Bane's demands and open the holocron. Though he did so, Skywalker also pulled his and Tano's lightsabers to himself and attacked Bane. However, Bane distracted him by opening the [airlock](/wiki/Airlock "Airlock") on Tano's cell and escaped, while Skywalker saved his Padawan and made their way to the hangar, where troopers had stolen a shuttle the escape the exploding Separatist ship back to the *Resolute*, not before letting Bane enter, disguised in [trooper armor](/wiki/Phase_I_clone_trooper_armor "Phase I clone trooper armor").[[104]](#cite_note-Cargo_of_Doom-104) After landing on the *Resolute*, Rex later noticed [Duros](/wiki/Duros "Duros") blood in the shuttle, and pursued Bane, who nevertheless managed to escape in a [V-19 starfighter](/wiki/V-19_Torrent_starfighter "V-19 Torrent starfighter"). Skywalker and Tano returned to the Jedi Council to report their failure.[[98]](#cite_note-Children_of_the_Force-98)

 [![Skywalker and Tano rescue Force-sensitive children from Mustafar.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/be/EscapingMustafar-CotF.png/revision/latest?cb=20130806053959) [![Skywalker and Tano rescue Force-sensitive children from Mustafar.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/be/EscapingMustafar-CotF.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/278?cb=20130806053959)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/be/EscapingMustafar-CotF.png/revision/latest?cb=20130806053959) 

Skywalker and Tano rescue Force-sensitive children from Mustafar.

 

Skywalker, along with Kenobi, Windu, and Yoda, [meditated](/wiki/Meditation "Meditation") in hope of finding the children that Bane was after before he kidnapped them. Sensing the future, Skywalker and Tano were [assigned](/wiki/Attempted_kidnapping_of_Roo-Roo_Page "Attempted kidnapping of Roo-Roo Page") to Naboo to set a trap for Bane in [Jan-gwa city](/wiki/Jan-gwa_city "Jan-gwa city"), capturing him as he attempted to kidnap [Roo-Roo Page](/wiki/Roo-Roo_Page "Roo-Roo Page"). With the real child safe, the two Jedi took Bane to the *Resolute*, where Skywalker, Windu, and Kenobi interrogated the bounty hunter with a combined [mind trick](/wiki/Mind_trick "Mind trick"); exhausted, Bane gave them [coordinates](/wiki/Black_Stall_Station "Black Stall Station") that Kenobi and Windu were to [follow](/wiki/Mission_to_Black_Stall_Station "Mission to Black Stall Station"), while Skywalker reported the details to Palpatine on Coruscant. Soon, however, he reunited with his Padawan and R2-D2 and began to examine Bane's Starfighter, from which Skywalker and Tano deduced from the ashes on it and its refueling record that Bane had been to [Mustafar](/wiki/Mustafar "Mustafar"). With nothing else to do, the Jedi pair [left](/wiki/Mission_to_Mustafar_(Skywalker_and_Tano) "Mission to Mustafar (Skywalker and Tano)") on the *Twilight* for the planet, where they found the children. Though one of the droids set the building to be destroyed in the [lava](/wiki/Magma "Magma") on Sidious's orders, Skywalker and Tano saved the children and returned to Coruscant. Skywalker admitted to the Council that they were unable to find out who was behind the kidnappings, to which Yoda advised caution on the path ahead.[[98]](#cite_note-Children_of_the_Force-98)

#### Battle of Felucia

:   "*That's it. We'll just train the villagers to defend themselves.*"  
    "*But we are just simple farmers. Why are we paying bounty hunters to defend us if we're just going to end up doing it ourselves? Hush.*"  
    "*Trust me. We'll have you ready.*"
:   ―Anakin Skywalker and Dilanni — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9f/AnakinTrainFarmers.flac/revision/latest?cb=20251109033134)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:AnakinTrainFarmers.flac "File:AnakinTrainFarmers.flac"))[[105]](#cite_note-Bounty_Hunters-105)

 [![Skywalker and Kenobi helping bounty hunters on Felucia](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/88/Embo_hurt.png/revision/latest?cb=20120910211120) [![Skywalker and Kenobi helping bounty hunters on Felucia](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/88/Embo_hurt.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/260?cb=20120910211120)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/8/88/Embo_hurt.png/revision/latest?cb=20120910211120) 

Skywalker and Kenobi helping bounty hunters on Felucia

 

On a mission to investigate the [disappearance](/wiki/Destruction_of_the_Felucia_medical_station "Destruction of the Felucia medical station") of [Felucia Medical Station HCTFF2](/wiki/Felucia_Medical_Station_HCTFF2 "Felucia Medical Station HCTFF2") that was orbiting over [Felucia](/wiki/Felucia "Felucia"), their shuttle was attacked by a group of six vulture droids deployed from an [automated deployment station](/wiki/Automated_vulture_droid_deployment_station "Automated vulture droid deployment station"), forcing them to crash-land on Felucia. Trapped on the planet, they came across a [nysillin](/wiki/Nysillin "Nysillin") [farm](/wiki/Farm "Farm") village after searching around for a while. They soon realized that the [Felucian](/wiki/Felucian "Felucian") villagers were being protected by a [group of bounty hunters](/wiki/Sugi%27s_bounty_hunters "Sugi's bounty hunters") led by [Sugi](/wiki/Sugi_(bounty_hunter) "Sugi (bounty hunter)")—[Embo](/wiki/Embo "Embo"), [Rumi Paramita](/wiki/Rumi_Paramita "Rumi Paramita"), and [Seripas](/wiki/Seripas "Seripas"). The village elder,[[105]](#cite_note-Bounty_Hunters-105) [Casiss Midagatis](/wiki/Casiss_Midagatis "Casiss Midagatis"),[[7]](#cite_note-Join_the_Battle-7) explained to the Jedi trio that they had hired the bounty hunters because pirates had been taking their crops. After some debate amongst them, Skywalker, Kenobi, and Tano decided to help the farmers to defend themselves.[[105]](#cite_note-Bounty_Hunters-105)

That night they were visited by the pirates, Hondo Onaka's gang, familiar to Skywalker and Kenobi. Ohnaka then told the group that he would be back, but by then Skywalker had taught the Felucians how to fight with staffs—though slow at first, they eventually picked up the craft. After a few days, the Ohnaka Gang returned as promised, and a [skirmish](/wiki/Skirmish_on_Felucia "Skirmish on Felucia") ensued between the factions. During the confrontation, Skywalker dueled Ohnaka and his [electrostaff](/wiki/Electrostaff "Electrostaff"), leaving him hanging off a cliff and begging for mercy, to which the Jedi Knight pulled him up and Ohnaka realized that their efforts were no longer profitable, leaving on [his ship](/wiki/Corona-class_armed_frigate "Corona-class armed frigate"). Alongside the bounty hunters, the Jedi themselves left soon after as well, to reach the closest Republic outpost.[[105]](#cite_note-Bounty_Hunters-105)

#### The Zillo Beast

:   "*Well, you made the right choice. We got the fuel and you saved your creature. And now, he will be safe.*"  
    "*Let's hope we could say the same about Coruscant.*"
:   ―Anakin Skywalker and Mace Windu — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d3/AnakinWinduZillo.flac/revision/latest?cb=20251109033840)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:AnakinWinduZillo.flac "File:AnakinWinduZillo.flac"))[[106]](#cite_note-Zillo_Beast_1-106)

 [![Skywalker and R2-D2 fleeing from the Zillo Beast](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/35/Riding_Artoo2.png/revision/latest?cb=20120912024556) [![Skywalker and R2-D2 fleeing from the Zillo Beast](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/35/Riding_Artoo2.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/252?cb=20120912024556)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/35/Riding_Artoo2.png/revision/latest?cb=20120912024556) 

Skywalker and R2-D2 fleeing from the Zillo Beast

 

During the lengthy [campaign](/wiki/Battle_of_Malastare "Battle of Malastare") on [Malastare](/wiki/Malastare "Malastare"), Skywalker discussed with Palpatine, who contacted them via hologram, and Windu the effects of the new [electro-proton bomb](/wiki/Electro-proton_bomb "Electro-proton bomb"), just as the Separatist Droid Army prepared a new attack—with the Republic expecting to successfully defend the [Dugs](/wiki/Dug "Dug") and secure a treaty for their [fuel](/wiki/Fuel "Fuel"). Though exceedingly effective, the bomb created a crater, which Windu went to investigate whereas Skywalker was to ensure the treaty with [Doge](/wiki/Doge "Doge") [Urus](/wiki/Nakha_Urus "Nakha Urus"), only to be called by Windu to assist him with the scouting. The two soon discovered a gigantic creature whose armored skin was impervious even to lightsabers, the [Zillo Beast](/wiki/Zillo_Beast "Zillo Beast"), from which they fled, only to be told by Urus that they wanted it killed, even though it was previously thought to be extinct. With the use of [RX-200 *Falchion*-class assault tanks](/wiki/RX-200_Falchion-class_assault_tank "RX-200 Falchion-class assault tank"), the Republic forces put the creature to [sleep](/wiki/Sleep "Sleep"), convincing the Dugs that it was dead. With the treaty signed and Malastare now a member of the Republic, Palpatine ordered that the beast be shipped to Coruscant for study, despite Windu's objections.[[106]](#cite_note-Zillo_Beast_1-106)

After the Zillo Beast was brought to the Republic capital, Kenobi and Amidala asked Skywalker to speak with Palpatine about the fate of the creature; reluctantly, he agreed. When both he and Amidala met with the Chancellor, Palpatine and the [Vice Chair](/wiki/Vice_Chair "Vice Chair") [Mas Amedda](/wiki/Mas_Amedda "Mas Amedda") tried to justify that killing the beast was for the greater good—Amidala objected to their claims, but Skywalker chose to stay neutral, instead of opposing either his wife, Amidala, or his friend, Palpatine. Although Palpatine claimed that he wished to kill the beast, he in fact wanted to research it as he was intrigued by the durability of the Zillo beast's armor. However, the beast [escaped](/wiki/Zillo_Beast_incident "Zillo Beast incident") from captivity in Dr. [Boll's](/wiki/Sionver_Boll "Sionver Boll") laboratory and directly targeted the Chancellor himself for his attempts to kill it. Cornered by the beast, Skywalker and the others evacuated his office on his [executive shuttle](/wiki/H-2_executive_shuttle "H-2 executive shuttle"), only for the beast to grab it upon take-off. They were freed when Skywalker sliced the shuttle in half, causing everyone to fall out of the shuttle, with Skywalker saving Amidala from falling from the [Senate Building's](/wiki/Imperial_Senate_Building "Imperial Senate Building") roof. The Beast was ultimately killed when gunships fired gas at its mouth on Palpatine's orders.[[107]](#cite_note-Zillo_Beast_2-107)

### No end in sight

#### Another mission to Cato Neimoidia

:   "*Wait. Now give me back my disk.*"  
    "*Don't worry, Clovis. It's good to know you have a heart. I wish I could give you the disk, but I have a lot of faith in your survival skills.*"
:   ―Rush Clovis and Anakin Skywalker[[108]](#cite_note-Senate_Spy-108)

 [![Skywalker holding his poisoned wife, as Rush Clovis demands the antidote](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/2d/RushDemandsAntidote-SS.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20100713193241) [![Skywalker holding his poisoned wife, as Rush Clovis demands the antidote](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/2d/RushDemandsAntidote-SS.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/279?cb=20100713193241)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/2/2d/RushDemandsAntidote-SS.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20100713193241) 

Skywalker holding his poisoned wife, as Rush Clovis demands the antidote

 

Even as the Clone Wars continued with no end in sight,[[109]](#cite_note-Landing_at_Point_Rain-109) Skywalker was allowed a leave after a long tour of duty. After returning home to his wife's [apartment](/wiki/Padm%C3%A9%27s_Apartment "Padmé's Apartment") for a romantic evening, Skywalker was recalled to the Temple by the Jedi Council. Believing Senator [Rush Clovis](/wiki/Rush_Clovis "Rush Clovis") to be a Separatist supporter, they decided they needed a spy—in this case, Senator Amidala, of whom Clovis was an old friend. The next day, Skywalker met Amidala in the Senate and asked her about Clovis, who initially refused to do it until she heard that Clovis could be a Separatist. Skywalker accompanied her to the Jedi Council, where the Masters encouraged her to find out about his possible treachery. After learning that he was planning to go to Cato Neimoidia, Skywalker dressed as the pilot of Padmé's starship and took them there, all the while frustrating Clovis's attempts to get closer to his wife.[[108]](#cite_note-Senate_Spy-108)

During the [mission](/wiki/Mission_to_Cato_Neimoidia "Mission to Cato Neimoidia"), Skywalker and R2-D2 waited for Amidala to give them a signal; when she did, Skywalker sneaked into her quarters, where he saw Amidala and Clovis embracing. Though it prompted a surge of anger and jealousy in Skywalker, she discretely showed him the disk she had stolen from Clovis and gave it to Skywalker, after which the Jedi retreated. It was soon after that the [poison](/wiki/Poison "Poison") that Amidala had been given by [Lott Dod](/wiki/Lott_Dod "Lott Dod") began to set in, and she passed out. After Dod revealed to Clovis she was a spy, he helped Skywalker take her back to their ship, back to Coruscant, and forced Dod to give him the antidote, only for Skywalker to leave Clovis behind, stranded on the planet.[[108]](#cite_note-Senate_Spy-108)

#### Second Battle of Geonosis

:   "*I knew they were still alive. I told you not to give up on them.*"  
    "*It's not that I gave up, Skywalker, but unlike you, when the time comes, I am prepared to let my student go. Can you say the same?*"
:   ―Anakin Skywalker and Luminara Unduli[[110]](#cite_note-Weapons_Factory-110)

 [![Planning the second battle of Geonosis](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/52/GeonosisPlanning.png/revision/latest?cb=20120831044545) [![Planning the second battle of Geonosis](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/52/GeonosisPlanning.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/274?cb=20120831044545)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/52/GeonosisPlanning.png/revision/latest?cb=20120831044545) 

Planning the second battle of Geonosis

 

Immediately after [routing](/wiki/Engagement_near_Dorin "Engagement near Dorin") Separatists near [Dorin](/wiki/Dorin "Dorin"), Skywalker and Tano were sent to participate in the [Second Battle of Geonosis](/wiki/Second_Battle_of_Geonosis "Second Battle of Geonosis"), alongside Kenobi and Ki-Adi-Mundi, as the Republic returned to destroy the [Geonosian](/wiki/Geonosian "Geonosian") [primary droid factory](/wiki/Geonosis_primary_droid_foundry "Geonosis primary droid foundry"). Intending to make a three-pronged attack against the shield generator, Skywalker, Tano, and the 501st Legion set out to attack the Separatist defense lines from the south to reach the rendezvous point—with only Kenobi's forces arriving at the landing zone, as both Mundi's and Skywalker's transports were shot down and forced to make their way to Kenobi's position by foot. Though they encountered resistance, Skywalker's team met up with Mundi's forces. After contacting Yularen to deploy a squadron of [BTL-B Y-wings](/wiki/BTL-B_Y-wing_starfighter/bomber "BTL-B Y-wing starfighter/bomber") to help them, they reunited with Kenobi and his company, where they planned the assault on the shield generator.[[109]](#cite_note-Landing_at_Point_Rain-109)

They then improvised on their plan; leading the charge, Skywalker and Tano disabled the enemy cannons with [EMP grenades](/wiki/Electromagnetic_pulse_grenade "Electromagnetic pulse grenade"), enabling the AT-TEs to destroy the shield generator; as the gunships arrived, the Geonosians in the area surrendered. Though Mundi and Kenobi left for medical treatment,[[109]](#cite_note-Landing_at_Point_Rain-109) the Republic forces continued pushing towards the massive droid foundry, and Skywalker and Tano were joined by Luminara Unduli and her Padawan, [Barriss Offee](/wiki/Barriss_Offee "Barriss Offee"), who met as Skywalker and Tano angrily discussed Skywalker's lack of trust in Tano's dependability. As Offee and Tano were sent into the Geonosian catacombs under the factory to plant explosives, Unduli realized that Skywalker was unable to let go of Tano and put her at risk, rather than distrusting her. Nevertheless, the two Jedi generals went onto distracting the droid army by marching straight to the factory and engage the enemy.[[110]](#cite_note-Weapons_Factory-110)

As [Poggle the Lesser](/wiki/Poggle_the_Lesser "Poggle the Lesser") had his [super tanks](/wiki/Separatist_super-tank_prototype "Separatist super-tank prototype") deployed, Skywalker and Luminara left their men behind and destroyed the bridge, only to learn that their Padawans had not returned yet. Cornered by droids coming from the factory, Skywalker was contacted by Tano and she apologized, uncertain that she and Offee would survive their ordeal, before using a super tank to destroy the factory. Refusing to let his Padawan die, Skywalker ordered to have them found; Unduli, however, told him that he needed to let go of his attachment to her if she were to be dead. Fortunately for them, Skywalker was contacted by Tano; after locating them, they rescued the two Padawans.[[110]](#cite_note-Weapons_Factory-110)

 [![Skywalker and Luminara Unduli escaping from Karina's brainless servants](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/46/JediEscapeKarina.png/revision/latest?cb=20120902025200) [![Skywalker and Luminara Unduli escaping from Karina's brainless servants](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/46/JediEscapeKarina.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/278?cb=20120902025200)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/4/46/JediEscapeKarina.png/revision/latest?cb=20120902025200) 

Skywalker and Luminara Unduli escaping from Karina's brainless servants

 

Sending Tano and Offee to recover out of the battlefield, Kenobi and Mundi returned to join in the clean-up of Separatist forces. For her part, Unduli left in search of Poggle before he could escape, when a [sandstorm](/wiki/Sandstorm "Sandstorm") broke out. Forced to wait until the storm lifted after her last contact, Skywalker and Kenobi went to Unduli's last known location, the [Progate Temple](/wiki/Progate_Temple "Progate Temple"). Entering the catacombs below, not only they discovered [undead Geonosian warriors](/wiki/Zombie "Zombie"), they also encountered the captive Unduli, Poggle, and the Geonosian [Queen](/wiki/Queen "Queen"), [Karina the Great](/wiki/Karina_the_Great "Karina the Great"). Setting up their men to surround the Queen and her brethren, Skywalker and Kenobi tried to negotiate with Karina, for Kenobi wanted to know how the undead warriors were created. After discovering her use of [parasitic](/wiki/Parasite "Parasite") [brain worms](/wiki/Brain_worm "Brain worm")), they freed Unduli, captured Poggle and fled from the Queen, with Rex and Cody burying the Queen in her lair.[[111]](#cite_note-Legacy_of_Terror-111)

With Poggle in Republic custody, the four Jedi generals prepared to deliver him to Coruscant, while they sent Tano and Offee on a mission to transport medical supplies from a [medical station](/wiki/Ord_Cestus_medical_station "Ord Cestus medical station") near [Ord Cestus](/wiki/Ord_Cestus "Ord Cestus") to Mace Windu on [Dantooine](/wiki/Dantooine "Dantooine"). Unbeknownst to them, one of the troopers, [Scythe](/wiki/Scythe_(clone_trooper) "Scythe (clone trooper)"), was infected with one of the Queen's brain worms and boarded their [*Pelta*-class frigate](/wiki/Pelta-class_frigate "Pelta-class frigate"), the [TB-73](/wiki/TB-73 "TB-73"), forcing the two Padawans to [fend off](/wiki/Skirmish_aboard_TB-73 "Skirmish aboard TB-73") the infected clones. When the ship failed to report in as scheduled, Skywalker believed there to have been a complication, and was proven right when Tano contacted him to tell him about the situation.[[112]](#cite_note-Brain_Invaders-112)

 [![Skywalker, choking Poggle the Lesser during interrogation](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/90/Anakin_choke_Poggle.png/revision/latest?cb=20190324203718) [![Skywalker, choking Poggle the Lesser during interrogation](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/90/Anakin_choke_Poggle.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/285?cb=20190324203718)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/90/Anakin_choke_Poggle.png/revision/latest?cb=20190324203718) 

Skywalker, choking Poggle the Lesser during interrogation

 

Angered, Skywalker went to Poggle's cell on his own and told the guard troopers to leave them alone. He demanded that Poggle answer his questions with a mind trick, but the [archduke](/wiki/Archduke "Archduke") informed him that it would have no effect on a Geonosian like him. It was then that Skywalker resorted to physical violence, attacking the captive Geonosian; with Poggle still unwilling to talk, Skywalker gave in to his anger and began to [Force choke](/wiki/Force_choke "Force choke") him. Only then did Poggle tell the Jedi Knight, through a [translator droid](/wiki/TC-326 "TC-326"), that the worms were affected by the cold. Skywalker relayed this information to his Padawan, telling her through her [comlink](/wiki/Comlink "Comlink") to rupture the cooling system. Thanks to his advice, Tano was able to defeat the worms as they reached the medical station. Skywalker rushed to her encounter, where he consoled Tano on her doubts about sparing her friend's life.[[112]](#cite_note-Brain_Invaders-112)

#### Saleucami

:   "*Where there is Kenobi, you will always find Skywalker not far behind.*"
:   ―Grievous[[113]](#cite_note-Grievous_Intrigue-113)

Following the [capture](/wiki/Capture_of_Eeth_Koth "Capture of Eeth Koth") of Jedi Master [Eeth Koth](/wiki/Eeth_Koth "Eeth Koth") in the Outer Rim, General Grievous sent a holo-transmission to the Jedi Council, in which Grievous stated that he did not care about the Jedi's [politics](/wiki/Politics "Politics"), nor their Republic, concluding that he lived only to see them all die. As Kenobi decoded Koth's hand signals that told them of their location at the [Saleucami system](/wiki/Saleucami_system "Saleucami system"), Skywalker, Kenobi, and [Adi Gallia](/wiki/Adi_Gallia "Adi Gallia") were dispatched on a mission to rescue him. As a distraction, Admiral Yularen and Kenobi [engaged](/wiki/Battle_of_Saleucami "Battle of Saleucami") Grievous's forces over [Saleucami](/wiki/Saleucami "Saleucami"), with Kenobi allowing the *[Surrogator](/wiki/Surrogator "Surrogator")* to be boarded by Grievous. Discreetly, Skywalker, Gallia, Rex, and a group of clone troopers would execute a hyperspace jump into the system in an [ambassador shuttle](/wiki/Eta-class_shuttle "Eta-class shuttle") that would bring them right alongside Grievous's cruiser.[[113]](#cite_note-Grievous_Intrigue-113)

 [![Skywalker and Adi Gallia fighting droid commandos](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/cf/GalliaSkywalkerBackToBack-GI.png/revision/latest?cb=20201015053513) [![Skywalker and Adi Gallia fighting droid commandos](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/cf/GalliaSkywalkerBackToBack-GI.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/266?cb=20201015053513)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/cf/GalliaSkywalkerBackToBack-GI.png/revision/latest?cb=20201015053513) 

Skywalker and Adi Gallia fighting droid commandos

 

Once they boarded it, Skywalker and Gallia made their way to the stern of the cruiser, where they encountered a [T-series tactical droid](/wiki/T-series_military_strategic_analysis_and_tactics_droid "T-series military strategic analysis and tactics droid") with a group of [BX-series droid commandos](/wiki/BX-series_droid_commando "BX-series droid commando"). The two Jedi destroyed all the droids and rescued Koth, with Skywalker taking the injured Koth back to the shuttle. When Kenobi reported that Grievous had defeated him and escaped, Gallia left them to help Kenobi flank Grievous and capture him once and for all. Unsuccessful in their endeavor, Skywalker picked the two up at the hangar with their shuttle, only to leave for the *Resolute*,[[113]](#cite_note-Grievous_Intrigue-113) where he waited while Kenobi conducted a search mission for Grievous on the planet below alongside Cody, Rex, and other troopers.[[114]](#cite_note-The_Deserter-114)

Sometime later, Skywalker and his Padawan spearheaded a mission to [Coruscant's underworld](/wiki/Coruscant_Underworld "Coruscant Underworld") to apprehend [Car Affa](/wiki/Car_Affa "Car Affa"), an arms dealer selling Republic weapons to the Separatists. When they arrived at a [cantina](/wiki/Cantina "Cantina") where Affa was hiding, Skywalker instructed Tano to wait outside while he apprehended the fugitive. The confrontation, however, caused a crowd to leave the bar at once—during which Tano lost her lightsaber, which prompted her to seek the help of Jedi Master [Tera Sinube](/wiki/Tera_Sinube "Tera Sinube") when they went back to the Temple, as she did not want Skywalker to find out she had lost her weapon.[[115]](#cite_note-Lightsaber_Lost-115)

#### Mandalore

:   "*What will you do? If you shoot me, you prove yourself a hypocrite to every pacifist ideal you hold dear. And you, Kenobi, you are no stranger to violence. You'd be hailed as a hero by everyone on this ship—* Almost *everyone. Come on, then. Who will strike first and brand themselves a cold-blooded killer?*"
:   ―Tal Merrik, to Obi-Wan Kenobi and Satine Kryze, before being killed by Skywalker[[116]](#cite_note-Voyage_of_Temptation-116)

 [![Skywalker engaging an assassin probe](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d5/AnakinAssassinProbe.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110922231013) [![Skywalker engaging an assassin probe](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d5/AnakinAssassinProbe.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/261?cb=20110922231013)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/d5/AnakinAssassinProbe.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110922231013) 

Skywalker engaging an assassin probe

 

Following allegations that [Mandalore](/wiki/Mandalore "Mandalore") had [allied](/wiki/Attack_on_a_Republic_cruiser "Attack on a Republic cruiser") with the Separatists, and Kenobi was sent to the planet to speak to his old friend, [Duchess](/wiki/Duchess "Duchess") [Satine Kryze](/wiki/Satine_Kryze "Satine Kryze"), Skywalker joined them to escort the Duchess on her journey to Coruscant aboard the *[Coronet](/wiki/Coronet "Coronet")*.[[117]](#cite_note-The_Mandalore_Plot-117) On the ship, Skywalker and Kenobi told their men to be on alert, when Kryze requested their presence before her, and Skywalker correctly surmised that Kenobi had strong feelings for her just as his former master told him of their past together. When R2-D2 picked up readings in the cargo hold, the two generals were informed by Rex, and Skywalker went to investigate—only to be [attacked](/wiki/Skirmish_aboard_the_Coronet "Skirmish aboard the Coronet") by [assassin probes](/wiki/SD-K4_assassin_droid "SD-K4 assassin droid"). After destroying two of them, Skywalker informed Kenobi that there might be a traitor on board the ship, and Skywalker returned to sweep the hold in search of more.[[116]](#cite_note-Voyage_of_Temptation-116)

After Kenobi lured the traitor out, [Tal Merrik](/wiki/Tal_Merrik "Tal Merrik"), and Skywalker destroyed another probe, he helped search the *Coronet* for Merrik and Kryze, now his hostage, until several B2 super battle droids sent by the [Death Watch](/wiki/Death_Watch "Death Watch") boarded the ship. Leaving Kenobi to save his "girlfriend," he destroyed the droids and then went to find Kenobi, who like Kryze, hesitated to kill Merrik; Skywalker, however, had no such compunctions and impaled Merrik, branding himself a "cold-blooded killer," to retrieve the Senator's [detonator](/wiki/Detonator "Detonator") before he could destroy the ship. With no further complications, they arrived at Coruscant; as Kryze complimented Kenobi, Skywalker noted that she was quite the remarkable woman.[[116]](#cite_note-Voyage_of_Temptation-116) Following the [Mandalore Defense Resolution](/wiki/Mandalore_Defense_Resolution "Mandalore Defense Resolution"), Skywalker and Kenobi escorted Amidala to a meeting with the Chancellor in which he thanked her, but also apologized to Kryze, before leaving Kenobi and Kryze alone.[[118]](#cite_note-Duchess_of_Mandalore-118)

#### Trapped on Vanqor

:   "*That kid destroyed an entire cruiser trying to get to you, and you're just gonna let it go?*"  
    "*Is there something else I should be doing, Skywalker?*"  
    "*How about tracking him down?*"  
    "*So I should behave as this child does. I should seek revenge.*"  
    "*No. How is it revenge if you stop this kid and bring him to justice?*"
:   ―Anakin Skywalker and Mace Windu, on Boba Fett[[119]](#cite_note-Lethal_Trackdown-119)

Preparing to rendezvous with a Republic frigate, Skywalker and Mace Windu traveled aboard the *[Endurance](/wiki/Endurance "Endurance")*, on which they greeted a squad of clone [cadets](/wiki/Cadet "Cadet"), with an infiltrated [Boba Fett](/wiki/Boba_Fett "Boba Fett") among them. After Fett [sabotaged](/wiki/Sabotage_of_the_Endurance "Sabotage of the Endurance") the ship and everyone had to evacuate in escape pods, including himself before being rescued by [Bossk](/wiki/Bossk%27wassak%27Cradossk "Bossk'wassak'Cradossk") and [Aurra Sing](/wiki/Aurra_Sing "Aurra Sing") on the *[Slave I](/wiki/Slave_I "Slave I")*, Skywalker and Windu rescued the missing cadets' damaged pod.[[120]](#cite_note-Death_Trap-120) As the survivors were being transferred to medical frigate, the two [went](/wiki/Mission_to_Vanqor "Mission to Vanqor") to the *Endurance*'s crash site, where they searched for Admiral [Kilian](/wiki/Shoan_Kilian "Shoan Kilian") and any other survivors. As the bridge appeared relatively intact, they resolved to enter the wreckage, even with R2-D2's misgivings, which prompted Windu to chastise Skywalker for encouraging individuality in his astromech.[[121]](#cite_note-R2_Come_Home-121)

 [![Skywalker approaching Jango Fett's explosive-rigged helmet](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9c/VanqorTrap-R2CH.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20101208180722) [![Skywalker approaching Jango Fett's explosive-rigged helmet](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9c/VanqorTrap-R2CH.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/259?cb=20101208180722)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9c/VanqorTrap-R2CH.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20101208180722) 

Skywalker approaching Jango Fett's explosive-rigged helmet

 

Leaving R2-D2 and [R8-B7](/wiki/R8-B7 "R8-B7") to scan for life forms, Skywalker and Windu entered the bridge to find the survivors executed, with Skywalker noticing a [Mandalorian helmet](/wiki/Mandalorian_armor "Mandalorian armor"). With Windu correctly surmising that it was bait set by Boba Fett, he saved Skywalker from taking the full brunt of the explosion set off by touching the helmet. Now trapped under the rubble, the wounded Skywalker and the unconscious Windu were soon found by R2-D2, whom Skywalker told to call the Temple for help. As they waited for the astromech to come back, Windu told Skywalker why Fett wanted him dead: he sought revenge for killing his father, Jango, during the first battle of Geonosis.[[121]](#cite_note-R2_Come_Home-121)

As the *Endurance* began to collapse, they were rescued by Tano, Plo Koon, and a clone squad, thanks to R2-D2 delivering the message at the Temple itself.[[121]](#cite_note-R2_Come_Home-121) After spending time in a [bacta tank](/wiki/Bacta_tank "Bacta tank") at the Temple, Skywalker urged Windu to track Fett down and bring him to justice. The Jedi Master did not agree, until Koon and Tano showed them a message from Fett and Sing, with hostages—one of them, [Ponds](/wiki/Ponds "Ponds"), killed in cold blood by Sing. Though Windu decided to go, Koon said that he would take the [mission](/wiki/Second_mission_to_Florrum "Second mission to Florrum"), alongside Tano, since both Windu and Skywalker were still recovering from their injuries. As they arrived on Coruscant with Bossk and Fett in custody, Skywalker was present as Fett apologized for causing so much destruction, but claimed he would never forgive Windu for killing his father,[[119]](#cite_note-Lethal_Trackdown-119) before they were taken away to the [Republic Judiciary Central Detention Center](/wiki/Republic_Judiciary_Central_Detention_Center "Republic Judiciary Central Detention Center").[[122]](#cite_note-Deception-122)

#### Balith

:   "*I hope this assignment was not too boring for you.*"  
    "*Ah, it had its moments.*"  
    "*Huh, like the one where you convinced untrained children to help you overthrow a corrupt government?*"  
    "*That was a highlight.*"  
    "*It sounds pretty risky. You're lucky you didn't get hurt.*"  
    "*Nothing you wouldn't have done.*"
:   ―Anakin Skywalker and Ahsoka Tano[[123]](#cite_note-The_Academy-123)

 [![Skywalker and Tano are received on Mandalore](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/3c/S3E6-AnakinAndAhsokaGreetedOnMandalore.png/revision/latest?cb=20201207001825) [![Skywalker and Tano are received on Mandalore](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/3c/S3E6-AnakinAndAhsokaGreetedOnMandalore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/261?cb=20201207001825)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/3c/S3E6-AnakinAndAhsokaGreetedOnMandalore.png/revision/latest?cb=20201207001825) 

Skywalker and Tano are received on Mandalore

 

Following his wife's [mission](/wiki/Skirmish_at_the_Sundari_docks "Skirmish at the Sundari docks") to discover a [conspiracy](/wiki/Mandalorian_black_market_conspiracy "Mandalorian black market conspiracy") on Mandalore,[[124]](#cite_note-Corruption-124) Skywalker and Captain Rex escorted Tano to her solo mission on Mandalore to instruct cadets at the [Royal Academy of Government](/wiki/Imperial_Academy_of_Mandalore "Imperial Academy of Mandalore") at the behest of Duchess Kryze and the Jedi Council. Upon their arrival at [Sundari](/wiki/Sundari "Sundari"), Skywalker presented Tano to the Duchess and [Prime Minister](/wiki/Prime_Minister "Prime Minister") [Almec](/wiki/Almec "Almec"). Before leaving to join with [Kit Fisto](/wiki/Kit_Fisto "Kit Fisto"), Skywalker took his Padawan's lightsaber to respect Mandalore's laws. After Tano exposed Almec's [black market](/wiki/Black_market "Black market") operation, Skywalker reunited with his Padawan, to whom he returned her lightsaber.[[123]](#cite_note-The_Academy-123)

Back in the Jedi Temple, the Jedi Council congratulated Tano on her courage and strength, but also ordered Skywalker to command the [Third Legion](/wiki/Third_Legion "Third Legion") on [Balith](/wiki/Balith "Balith") to give assistance in their [civil war](/wiki/Balith%27s_Civil_War "Balith's Civil War"). Told by the Council to stay behind so she could give them her full report, Tano pleaded to Skywalker to let her come along, but he told her that she should use this time in the library to prove him wrong about his assertion that she learned more on the battlefield than in the Temple, before leaving for Balith with Rex.[[125]](#cite_note-Assassin-125)

Skywalker returned to Coruscant to greet, along with Yoda, his Padawan, Amidala, and Bail Organa after the [Alderaan Refugee Conference](/wiki/Alderaan_Refugee_Conference "Alderaan Refugee Conference"), during which Tano captured Aurra Sing. Wondering who would pay for Amidala's assassination, Yoda had Tano use her improved precognitive abilities to find out who was behind the assassination attempt. With her description, Amidala realized who it was—Ziro the Hutt. Skywalker and his Padawan then went to the Judiciary Detention Center to question Ziro, who was tricked by Tano into confessing that he had hired Sing for the job. Satisfied, Skywalker and his Padawan then left the Hutt to his misery.[[125]](#cite_note-Assassin-125)

#### Battle of Kamino

:   "*I suppose you expect me to surrender.*"  
    "*Actually, I plan to let the clones execute you. Right now.*"  
    "*Not this time.*"
:   ―Asajj Ventress and Anakin Skywalker[[126]](#cite_note-ARC_Troopers-126)

 [![Skywalker against Asajj Ventress on Kamino](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a8/AnakinVentressDuel-Kamino.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110211131008) [![Skywalker against Asajj Ventress on Kamino](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a8/AnakinVentressDuel-Kamino.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/209?cb=20110211131008)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/a/a8/AnakinVentressDuel-Kamino.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110211131008) 

Skywalker against Asajj Ventress on Kamino

 

Forewarned by the [destruction](/wiki/Defense_of_Rishi_Station "Defense of Rishi Station") of [Rishi Station](/wiki/Rishi_Station "Rishi Station")[[83]](#cite_note-Rookies-83) and an intercepted transmission between Asajj Ventress and General Grievous, Skywalker and Kenobi traveled to Kamino to warn [Shaak Ti](/wiki/Shaak_Ti "Shaak Ti") and Prime Minister [Lama Su](/wiki/Lama_Su "Lama Su") of an [upcoming Separatist attack](/wiki/Battle_of_Kamino "Battle of Kamino"), with Rex, Cody, Echo, Fives, and the rest of the 501st Legion in their company. Shortly, Grievous's fleet arrived and Skywalker led the Republic space forces, scoring several serious hits against the enemy. On the planet below, [Tipoca City](/wiki/Tipoca_City "Tipoca City") was attacked by [*Trident*-class assault ship](/wiki/Trident-class_assault_ship "Trident-class assault ship") and [AQ-series battle droids](/wiki/AQ-series_battle_droid "AQ-series battle droid"), prompting Kenobi to recall Skywalker to the city. Soon after returning, Skywalker engaged Ventress, who had stolen the prime [DNA](/wiki/DNA "DNA") sample of the clones' template, Jango Fett. With the aid of clone trooper [platoon](/wiki/Platoon "Platoon"), Skywalker recovered the sample from Ventress, but she, like Grievous, managed to escape yet again.[[126]](#cite_note-ARC_Troopers-126)

#### The blockade of Pantora

:   "*Should you really proceed without the Council's approval?*"  
    "*We do it all the time. Don't we, Snips?*"  
    "*Yup.*"
:   ―Amidala, Skywalker and Tano discuss the kidnapping of Papanoida's daughters[[127]](#cite_note-Sphere_of_Influence-127)

Skywalker was later informed by his apprentice that Pantora Chairman [Papanoida's](/wiki/Notluwiski_Papanoida "Notluwiski Papanoida") daughters had been [kidnapped](/wiki/Kidnapping_of_the_Papanoida_daughters "Kidnapping of the Papanoida daughters"). Knowing that the Jedi could not get officially involved, he slyly gave her permission to rescue them due to "personal concerns"; this turned out to be successful, with both daughters being safely returned to their father.[[127]](#cite_note-Sphere_of_Influence-127)

#### Senate crisis

:   "*Young Skywalker… Not so impressive without your lightsaber, are you, Jedi?*"
:   ―Cad Bane to an unconscious Skywalker — ![20?cb=20250116042720](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/ee/Quote-audio.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20250116042720) [Link](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/99/SkywalkerNotSoImpressive.flac/revision/latest?cb=20250329120347)▶️ ([file info](/wiki/File:SkywalkerNotSoImpressive.flac "File:SkywalkerNotSoImpressive.flac"))[[46]](#cite_note-Hostage_Crisis-46)

 [![Skywalker, trying to ease his wife's mind](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/6a/AmidalaSkywalker-EvilPlansEpisode.png/revision/latest?cb=20130515014947) [![Skywalker, trying to ease his wife's mind](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/6a/AmidalaSkywalker-EvilPlansEpisode.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/229?cb=20130515014947)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/6/6a/AmidalaSkywalker-EvilPlansEpisode.png/revision/latest?cb=20130515014947) 

Skywalker, trying to ease his wife's mind

 

Supposed to be on a meditative retreat,[[46]](#cite_note-Hostage_Crisis-46) Skywalker spent some time with his wife on her apartment, observing as Amidala anxiously arranged a party for Senator [Aang](/wiki/Aang "Aang"), who held the deciding vote on the [Military Oversight Committee](/wiki/Military_Oversight_Committee "Military Oversight Committee"). Skywalker tried to ease her mind, telling her that the party would work out and that she should relax, when they saw C-3PO being fuzzy about the arrangements. At Amidala's request, Skywalker sent the protocol droid and R2-D2 to buy the [jogan fruit](/wiki/Jogan_fruit "Jogan fruit") that the latter had forgotten to buy for Aang's favorite dessert, [jogan fruitcake](/wiki/Jogan_fruitcake "Jogan fruitcake"). Although they were delayed, Amidala nevertheless hosted the party all the same, with her and Skywalker waiting for the two droids to come back—who did so just in time to present the cake to Senator Aang.[[128]](#cite_note-Evil_Plans-128)

Not too long after, Skywalker went to the Senate Building to convince Amidala to go away together for two [weeks](/wiki/Standard_week "Standard week"), to a faraway place where no one would recognize them, so that they could actually be husband and wife, instead of Senator and Jedi. Amidala, however, rejected the idea, for she was preparing an important bill for the Senate. Skywalker retorted that the bill seemed more important than their love, but Amidala countered that it was not, just that they both lived to serve the Republic. However, Skywalker stated that there was nothing more important than the way he felt about her, and proved it by giving Amidala his lightsaber, which, Kenobi had told him once, was his "life." Though she believed he was teasing her, Skywalker was sincere about his feelings, and the two shared a kiss.[[46]](#cite_note-Hostage_Crisis-46)

 [![Amidala, using Skywalker's lightsaber to free him](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/78/Padme_uses_lightsaber.png/revision/latest?cb=20121006052422) [![Amidala, using Skywalker's lightsaber to free him](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/78/Padme_uses_lightsaber.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/264?cb=20121006052422)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/78/Padme_uses_lightsaber.png/revision/latest?cb=20121006052422) 

Amidala, using Skywalker's lightsaber to free him

 

They were soon interrupted by C-3PO and Senator Organa's voices, prompting Skywalker to hide under her desk and Amidala to hide his lightsaber in her sleeve. As she went to the lobby to attend a meeting about the [Enhanced Privacy Invasion Bill](/wiki/Enhanced_Privacy_Invasion_Bill "Enhanced Privacy Invasion Bill"), only to be [taken hostage](/wiki/Senate_hostage_crisis "Senate hostage crisis") along with several other Senators by Cad Bane and his team. Following her, Skywalker saw the situation, when Bane spotted him and sent his henchmen to capture him, but Skywalker avoided them long enough to contact Palpatine and defeat an [IG-86 sentinel droid](/wiki/IG-86_sentinel_droid "IG-86 sentinel droid") empty-handed, before being shocked into unconsciousness by [Robonino](/wiki/Robonino "Robonino") and Aurra Sing and brought before the Senators. After the bounty hunters planted bombs that would go off if their laser detectors were triggered and left the building, Skywalker woke up and Amidala returned his lightsaber. He then used it to cut a hole in the floor, dropping all the senators one floor down into safety, just before Bane triggered the bombs and escaped alongside the now-freed Ziro.[[46]](#cite_note-Hostage_Crisis-46)

#### Meeting Madam Synata

:   "*I'm still not convinced this trip is a good idea, Anakin...*"
:   ―Padmé Amidala[[129]](#cite_note-Intermission_1-129)

 [![Skywalker and Amidala meet Risha Synata.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/50/AnakinPadmemeetSynataAdventures11.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20181024021848) [![Skywalker and Amidala meet Risha Synata.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/50/AnakinPadmemeetSynataAdventures11.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/217?cb=20181024021848)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/50/AnakinPadmemeetSynataAdventures11.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20181024021848) 

Skywalker and Amidala meet Risha Synata.

 

Following the crisis, Skywalker went with Amidala to [Caamas](/wiki/Caamas "Caamas") to board legendary actress Madam [Risha Synata](/wiki/Risha_Synata "Risha Synata")'s [private ship](/wiki/Risha_Synata%27s_ship "Risha Synata's ship"). However, they were late to see Madam Synata's play about [Darth Krist-Ov](/wiki/Darth_Krist-Ov "Darth Krist-Ov"). After they arrived, Skywalker and Amidala met Synata. Skywalker agreed to see [her museum](/wiki/Madam_Synata%27s_Genius_of_A_Thousand_Faces_Museum "Madam Synata's Genius of A Thousand Faces Museum"), despite Amidala's reluctance. Skywalker took Amidala to her room. The next day, Skywalker and Amidala went to the museum. There, Skywalker and Amidala saw a display of [Varykino](/wiki/Varykino "Varykino"),[[129]](#cite_note-Intermission_1-129) where they exchanged their vows.[[14]](#cite_note-Episode_II-14) Skywalker and Amidala came under attack by several robots from the displays. Skywalker fought them off and helped Amidala escape them. Skywalker and Amidala then discovered a Separatist banner and a hologram of Count Dooku.[[129]](#cite_note-Intermission_1-129)

Skywalker and Amidala discovered that Synata was collaborating with Dooku and the Separatists. Skywalker then took one of the Separatist agents while Amidala discovered a list of anti-Separatist senators. Skywalker and Amidala discovered that along with Amidala, Synata planned to kill them with [Dioxis](/wiki/Dioxis "Dioxis") gas. Skywalker and Amidala fought several LEP servant droids to stop Synata from killing the senators. With assistance from R2-D2, Skywalker and Amidala reached the theater.[[130]](#cite_note-Intermission_2-130)

 [![Skywalker defeats Synata.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/e0/AnakindefeatsSynata.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20181024021644) [![Skywalker defeats Synata.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/e0/AnakindefeatsSynata.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/197?cb=20181024021644)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/e/e0/AnakindefeatsSynata.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20181024021644) 

Skywalker defeats Synata.

 

As Amidala told the audience to run, Skywalker borrowed a mask and helmet from an actor before confronting Synata, who had her own lightsaber. Skywalker fought Synata until he held her at the end of his lightsaber. Skywalker and Amidala then reported their trip to the Jedi Council.[[130]](#cite_note-Intermission_2-130)

#### Intense training

:   "*Look, I know this is tough, but…[sigh]…I want it to be difficult. This is about life and death. And as your master, I'm responsible for you. The best way I can protect you is to teach you how to protect yourself.*"
:   ―Anakin Skywalker, to Ahsoka Tano[[131]](#cite_note-Practice_Makes_Perfect-131)

 [![Skywalker and Tano talking after her training session.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/cc/PracticeMakesPerfect.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20221026194908) [![Skywalker and Tano talking after her training session.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/cc/PracticeMakesPerfect.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/242?cb=20221026194908)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/c/cc/PracticeMakesPerfect.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20221026194908) 

Skywalker and Tano talking after her training session.

 

After arriving late to one of Tano's training sessions, Skywalker became frustrated with the simplicity of the exercises. In turn, he told her to meet with him later for an actual training session. Later, Skywalker took Tano to an isolated area with Rex and the 501st. He then had the clones surround Tano and fire stun bolts at her. The sessions continued for hours until Tano told Skywalker that the battle droids weren't nearly as good as the clones. Skywalker explained that this was the point and that he wanted her training to be difficult so that she would know how to protect herself. Tano would continue the sessions with Rex and the 501st throughout the war.[[131]](#cite_note-Practice_Makes_Perfect-131) Sometime later, Skywalker was sparring with Tano, teaching her how [to fight with two lightsabers](/wiki/Jar%27Kai "Jar'Kai"). She struggled to consciously utilize the other lightsaber, but Skywalker reassured her. When Master Yoda entered to spar with her, Skywalker watched as she struggled against Yoda, but ultimately learned how to use Jar'Kai more effectively.[[132]](#cite_note-Teach_You,_I_Will-132)

#### Unexpected Company

 [![Skywalker, Amidala, and the univited Tano during the Mission to Alderaan.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/5d/PadmeAhsokaAnakin-UC.png/revision/latest?cb=20210219042331) [![Skywalker, Amidala, and the univited Tano during the Mission to Alderaan.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/5d/PadmeAhsokaAnakin-UC.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/242?cb=20210219042331)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/5/5d/PadmeAhsokaAnakin-UC.png/revision/latest?cb=20210219042331) 

Skywalker, Amidala, and the univited Tano during the Mission to Alderaan.

 

Sometime later, Skywalker was assigned to a [mission with Amidala](/wiki/Mission_to_Alderaan_(Clone_Wars) "Mission to Alderaan (Clone Wars)") to [Alderaan](/wiki/Alderaan "Alderaan"). It took Skywalker a lot of work to get the mission with her, but they were both happy to spend some time alone together. That is until, Tano ran up to them, saying that she was encouraged help with the mission by Kenobi. They all get on a T-6 shuttle, where Skywalker charted a shorter course in order to speed up the mission. Tano warned him that the Separatist fleet was spotted on that flight path, and that they shouldn't take it. It was too late, however, and Skywalker's ship exited hyperspace in the midst of the fleet. Skywalker took control and tried to maneuver around oncoming fire, while Amidala and Tano took control of the laser turrets. Despite their best efforts, stray laser fire hit Amidala's side of the ship. Skywalker jumped to protect Amidala, which resulted in them embracing in a hug. Tano was able to take control of the ship and jumped into hyperspace. Upon their arrival on Alderaan, Skywalker told her that he was glad she came. Amidala mentioned that her and Skywalker made a good team, with Tano returning the compliment.[[133]](#cite_note-Unexpected_Company-133)

#### Trouble with Tomarian

The showman [Tomarian](/wiki/Tomarian "Tomarian") later requested Skywalker as a Jedi escort for his [Annual Festival of Light Gala](/wiki/Tomarian%27s_Annual_Festival_of_Light_Gala "Tomarian's Annual Festival of Light Gala"). Skywalker thought that there would be an actual threat at the event, but in actuality Tomarian had requested him to impress his guests. Skywalker was then surprised to see Senator Amidala dressed up for the occasion. They both talked, glad to see each other. Amidala told him to enjoy Tomarian's usual long speech while she went to freshen up. Skywalker, along with Tomarian, walked into [the theater](/wiki/Tomarian%27s_theater "Tomarian's theater") where the gala was being held. Suddenly, the room went dark and Skywalker ignited his saber. He asked Tomarian if this was apart of the show, to which he answered no and put on a gas mask. Skywalker, along with everyone else, fell unconscious as the room filled with a noxious gas.[[134]](#cite_note-The_Incident_1-134)

 [![Skywalker and Amidala finding each other during the attack on the 17th Annual Festival of Light Gala.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/37/Anakin_and_Padme_SWA_2020_6.png/revision/latest?cb=20240330082239) [![Skywalker and Amidala finding each other during the attack on the 17th Annual Festival of Light Gala.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/37/Anakin_and_Padme_SWA_2020_6.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/242?cb=20240330082239)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/3/37/Anakin_and_Padme_SWA_2020_6.png/revision/latest?cb=20240330082239) 

Skywalker and Amidala finding each other during the attack on the 17th Annual Festival of Light Gala.

 

As he started to wake up, he overheard [Telsla](/wiki/Telsla "Telsla") threatening Tomarian over a box of [beskar](/wiki/Beskar "Beskar") that he promised him. Tomarian tried to talk his way out of it, but Telsla ordered [Fleecs](/wiki/Fleecs "Fleecs"), a member of [his crew](/wiki/Telsla%27s_crew "Telsla's crew"), to tie him up. Telsla then set off a bomb in the venue, the commotion allowing Skywalker to escape unnoticed.[[134]](#cite_note-The_Incident_1-134) He managed to catch up with Amidala, who had escaped the gas attack and stolen a blaster from [one of Telsla's goons](/wiki/Belk "Belk"). He snuck behind her, scaring her, before he offered to get her out of there. She denied his request as she didn't want to leave anyone in the building behind. After they argued they agreed to hide in the scaffolding to come up with a plan. Amidala tried to contact ["Checker"](/wiki/C1-1KR "C1-1KR"), who was unresponsive. As more explosives went off, she tried to contact him again, but there was massive feedback that revealed their position. They fought off Telsla, causing him to flee. They jumped down and killed Fleecs before chasing after Telsla. Just as Telsla was about to blow up the music hall where most of the guests were, Skywalker stopped him. He bargained with Telsla, saying that he would make Tomarian talk in exchange for one bar of beskar. Meanwhile, Amidala snuck up behind Telsla and pressed her blaster against his back. He swung at her, dropping the explosive detonator. Checker was able to catch it, and Amidala confidently placed Telsla under arrest, making Skywalker fall in love with her a little more. After everyone had woken up, Skywalker complimented the senator on her performance. Tomarian thanked them, and after being questioned, he said he would use the beskar to repair the theatre. After Skywalker glared at him, he backtracked and also said he would donate a lot of it to charity. Amidala wished him luck, and Skywalker asked her out for dinner, to which the senator agreed.[[135]](#cite_note-The_Incident_2-135)

#### Jedi Ceremony

 [![Skywalker looking at Tano's new padawan braid extensions.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9c/AnakinAhsoka_FOD_The_Padawan_Path.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20240330093119) [![Skywalker looking at Tano's new padawan braid extensions.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9c/AnakinAhsoka_FOD_The_Padawan_Path.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/242?cb=20240330093119)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/9c/AnakinAhsoka_FOD_The_Padawan_Path.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20240330093119) 

Skywalker looking at Tano's new padawan braid extensions.

 

One day, Skywalker was waiting with Master Yoda in the Jedi temple grounds for Tano. Once she arrived, Skywalker reprimanded her for being late, but Yoda praised her for helping out and proceeded to extend her Padawan braid.[[136]](#cite_note-Padawan_Path-136) Following a debate in the senate about a [financial reform bill](/wiki/Republic_financial_reform_bill "Republic financial reform bill"), Skywalker was asked by Amidala to persuade the Jedi Council to speak with Palpatine about denying the continuation of the war. Skywalker allowed Tano to go with Amidala in order for her to learn more about politics. After an apparent Separatist [attack](/wiki/Bombing_of_Coruscant%27s_central_power_distribution_grid "Bombing of Coruscant's central power distribution grid"), Skywalker confronted his apprentice about her and Amidala's meeting with [Onderon](/wiki/Onderon "Onderon")'s senator [Mina Bonteri](/wiki/Mina_Bonteri "Mina Bonteri") on [Raxus Secundus](/wiki/Raxus_Secundus "Raxus Secundus") and how foolish it was. Despite that, Skywalker's apprentice learned that politics were not as black and white as she had previously thought.[[137]](#cite_note-Heroes_on_Both_Sides-137)

#### Dathomirian threat

:   "*Warrior-like men, witches—this place has all kinds of fun.*"
:   ―Anakin Skywalker to Obi-Wan Kenobi, on Dathomir[[138]](#cite_note-Witches_of_the_Mist-138)

Skywalker and Kenobi commanded Republic forces in a [battle](/wiki/Battle_of_Sullust "Battle of Sullust") against Asajj Ventress's fleet in the [Sullust system](/wiki/Sullust_system "Sullust system"). Directly participating in the battle with their starfighters, Kenobi was singled out and attacked by Ventress, whose [*Ginivex*-class fanblade starfighter](/wiki/Ginivex-class_fanblade_starfighter "Ginivex-class fanblade starfighter") was, in turn, disabled by Skywalker. As Kenobi and Ventress crashed in the hangar of the Separatist command ship, Skywalker soon landed to assist his former master; together, the two Jedi engage Ventress in a duel. They were interrupted, however, by the destruction of the ship, secretly ordered by Count Dooku. The two Jedi fled in their interceptors, presuming Ventress to be doomed.[[139]](#cite_note-Nightsisters-139)

 [![Skywalker and Kenobi, about to face Savage Opress on Toydaria](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/be/ShowdownOnToydaria-WOTM.png/revision/latest?cb=20130524040641) [![Skywalker and Kenobi, about to face Savage Opress on Toydaria](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/be/ShowdownOnToydaria-WOTM.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/242?cb=20130524040641)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/b/be/ShowdownOnToydaria-WOTM.png/revision/latest?cb=20130524040641) 

Skywalker and Kenobi, about to face Savage Opress on Toydaria

 

After the [massacre](/wiki/Devaron_massacre "Devaron massacre") on [Devaron](/wiki/Devaron "Devaron"),[[140]](#cite_note-Monster-140) Skywalker and Kenobi were sent to [Dathomir](/wiki/Dathomir "Dathomir"), as footage had shown the Council of a [Dathomirian's](/wiki/Savage_Opress "Savage Opress") role during the attack on Devaron. Once on Dathomir, they made their way to a [village](/wiki/Nightbrother_village "Nightbrother village"), where they were ambushed by the [Nightbrothers](/wiki/Nightbrothers "Nightbrothers") until Skywalker took [their leader](/wiki/Viscus "Viscus") hostage; the Zabrak then told the Jedi that a [Nightsister](/wiki/Nightsisters "Nightsisters") had taken one of them to their [fortress](/wiki/Nightsister_lair "Nightsister lair"), prompting the Jedi to go there. Skywalker and Kenobi questioned Mother [Talzin](/wiki/Talzin "Talzin"), who told them his name—Savage Opress—and whereabouts. The two Jedi then headed to [Toydaria](/wiki/Toydaria "Toydaria") where they confronted Opress, but failed to stop him from killing [King](/wiki/King "King") [Katuunko](/wiki/Katuunko "Katuunko"). Using the king's ship as theirs was destroyed, Skywalker and Kenobi caught up with their target on Dooku's Separatist flagship; however, Opress managed to overpower them, forcing the two to retreat and leave the ship.[[138]](#cite_note-Witches_of_the_Mist-138)

#### Killing a defector

:   "*Master, I didn't mean to--*"  
    "*It's all right, Anakin. You did nothing wrong.*"  
    "*Don't…hold it against me, boy. It merely seemed…the quickest way back…to the sunrise…*"
:   ―Anakin Skywalker, Obi-Wan Kenobi and Mekedrix[[141]](#cite_note-Obi-Wan_4-141)

 [![Mekedrix gave Skywalker no choice but to kill him.](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/df/AnakinKillsMekedrix-ObiWan4.png/revision/latest?cb=20240908203100) [![Mekedrix gave Skywalker no choice but to kill him.](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/df/AnakinKillsMekedrix-ObiWan4.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/242?cb=20240908203100)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/d/df/AnakinKillsMekedrix-ObiWan4.png/revision/latest?cb=20240908203100) 

Mekedrix gave Skywalker no choice but to kill him.

 

Following their encounter with Opress, Skywalker and Kenobi were called away from a blockade at [Herdessa](/wiki/Herdessa "Herdessa") to meet with Yularen. The admiral informed them that Mekedrix had gone missing. In addition, an execution squad known as the [Death Wind](/wiki/Death_Wind "Death Wind") had been striking at Republic and Separatist targets. The group's namesake, the [Death Wind Corridor](/wiki/Death_Wind_Corridor "Death Wind Corridor") also passed by Mekedrix's home planet of Roon, creating a possible link. Yularen went on to say that the Death Wind may have taken up a covert position on [Ando](/wiki/Ando "Ando"). As such, Skywalker and Kenobi were to [locate](/wiki/Mission_to_Ando_(Mekedrix) "Mission to Ando (Mekedrix)") the Death Wind and kill Mekedrix if he was involved with them. Skywalker initially refused, believing that killing a potential ally would make the Jedi like the Separatists. Kenobi assured Skywalker that they would attempt to find a peaceful solution before they departed for Ando. After arriving on the planet and pushing through the local swamplands, the Jedi came upon empty sets of clone armor being used as effigies. Upon reaching the terminus of a river, they discovered an outpost built from the ruins of a Sith temple. They were then met by the Death Wind, who allowed the Jedi to see their leader in exchange for their lightsabers. Entering the outpost, Skywalker and Kenobi came upon Mekedrix, seated on a throne and wielding a sword. Mekedrix claimed he had saved his victims by showing them the truth; that the purpose of existence was to kill and die. When Mekedrix revealed that his sword was made from the bones of a clone trooper, Kenobi asked him what the clone's name was. Kenobi went on to claim that life gave the galaxy meaning and that death had no use for a sunrise, a name, a home or a friend. Mekedrix then lunged at Kenobi, but Skywalker retrieved his lightsaber and stabbed Mekedrix through the chest. Skywalker expressed regret over killing him, but Mekedrix assured that this was the quickest way back to the sunrise before he passed away.[[141]](#cite_note-Obi-Wan_4-141)

### Personal and wartime conflicts

#### The Destiny of the Chosen One

:   "*You are the Chosen One. You have brought balance to this world. Stay on this path and you will do it again… for the galaxy. But beware… your heart…*"
:   ―The Father's last words, to Anakin Skywalker[[31]](#cite_note-Ghosts_of_Mortis-31)

 [![The figure of his mother, Shmi, appearing before him on Mortis](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/94/ShmiAnakinCloneWars.png/revision/latest?cb=20130524220440) [![The figure of his mother, Shmi, appearing before him on Mortis](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/94/ShmiAnakinCloneWars.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/218?cb=20130524220440)](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/9/94/ShmiAnakinCloneWars.png/revision/latest?cb=20130524220440) 

The figure of his mother, Shmi, appearing before him on Mortis

 

When the Jedi Council received a 2,000-year-old Jedi [distress signal](/wiki/Distress_signal "Distress signal"), Skywalker, along with Kenobi and Tano, were [sent](/wiki/Mission_to_Mortis "Mission to Mortis") by the High Council to the [Chrelythiumn system](/wiki/Chrelythiumn_system "Chrelythiumn system"), where they were supposed to meet up with Captain Rex and an armed cruiser. Though they both made it to the rendezvous point, neither Rex's nor the Jedi's ship could see each other. In fact, the Jedi's ship was guided to a mysterious planet, [Mortis](/wiki/Mortis "Mortis"), where they met by a [mysterious figure](/wiki/Force_wielder "Force wielder") called the [Daughter](/wiki/Daughter "Daughter"), who asked Skywalker if he was "the one" and who wanted to lead them to the [Father](/wiki/Father_(Mortis) "Father (Mortis)"), when Skywalker was separated from Kenobi and Tano, and the Daughter.[[59]](#cite_note-Overlords-59)

Skywalker tried to follow her, only to reach the [monastery](/wiki/Mortis_monastery "Mortis monastery"), where he met the Father and was given shelter for the night. As he tried to sleep, the figure of his mother, Shmi, appeared before him and encouraged him to tell her of his pain and guilt—that he was too late to save her, and that he had failed as a Jedi and that he had failed her, having tasted only vengeance when he slaughtered so many to avenge her death. But, as he mentioned his wife, who he claimed was "everything" to him, the figure finally revealed itself to be the [Son](/wiki/Son "Son"), briefly assuming a monstrous appearance before disappearing.[[59]](#cite_note-Overlords-59)
